Title: Grayswood Cowshed in stunning Grounds
Description:
A beautiful barn conversion in picturesque Stonor Valley 10 mins from Henley-on-Thames. The barn is surrounded by a 5 acre garden shared with our farmhouse and enjoys spectacular views. Use of tennis court & indoor pool. The space The space
As you enter the barn through tall glass doors you come into an open-plan sitting room with double height ceiling and a comfortable seating area.

To the right and still part of this open plan room is a dining table that seats up to 12 and a fully equipped kitchen with fridge freezer oven hob and a dishwasher.

Also on the ground floor are two double bedrooms and a bathroom.

Upstairs the barn is made up of two large mezzanine rooms accessed by two staircases flanking the fire place. To the right above the kitchen and dining area is a large family bedroom (described under Accommodation) and to the left on the mezzanine is a Games Room with a full sized billiard table.

The fire place is a focal point of the open plan living room and is in good working order logs will be provided although the barn is centrally heated.

There is no washing machine or tumble dryer but a laundry service can be provided at an additional cost by the owner.

Accommodation:
This property is advertised for 12 it is ideal for that number if shared between two families with children but for an adult group wanting their own space and privacy we would recommend it for a group of 6 two in each of the three rooms.

There are two single sofa beds (x2 singles) if guests are not couples and want their own bed please advise if these are required. There is a single bed in Master with one truckle below) and doubles (x 5 across x 3 rooms). Please note there is only one bathroom!

The bathroom is spacious with loo sink bath and separate wet-room shower and plenty of hot water.

The accommodation comprises:

x 1 double bedroom that sleeps 3 (1 double bed and a single bed there is a truckle under this single bed so could work for two children)

x 1 double bedroom that sleeps 2 (1 double bed)

x 1 family bedroom / childrens room - this is located on the mezzanine level and sleeps 7 (x 3 double beds and one single sofa bed). Please note that this is on a mezzanine and open to the living area below it is perhaps a consideration for those with young children who are light sleepers and likely to be disturbed by light or noise from the main sitting room below.

A travel cot is also available for small infants.

In the Games Room there is a further single sofa bed if required.

Tennis Court:
This is right next door to the guest house and can be used by guests as they please.

Swimming Pool:
The indoor pool is attached to the farmhouse and must be accessed via the house therefore it will be offered to guests between the hours of 8am and 7pm. Pool towels are provided. Guest access Guest access
You will have exclusive access to the converted barn. This will be approached from a shared drive with the farmhouse. You will have full access to the 5 acre garden which is shared with the farmhouse.

Parents of small children should be aware that there is a small shallow pond that is a good distance from the barn but is not covered.

Plenty of parking is available. Other things to note Other things to note
Bed linen bath and pool towels will provided by a hire company and charged at cost ¬£55 to be left in cash in the provided envelope at depart regardless of group size.

No stag parties or all male group celebrations sorry guys! You are welcome on another occasions. We do not hire the grounds for weddings or larger scale events although we have accommodated many brides grooms and families before and after their big day.

Title: A cabin retreat in Kingston upon Thames - London
Description:
Situated in glorious countryside on a smallholding is Stable cottage surrounded by our own meadows beautiful local walks and rolling countryside. Constructed in local cotswold stone this traditional cottage dates from the 17th century and once was the stable for the cart horses for the farmhouse! We have a small heated outdoor swimming pool available for our guests (1 June-1 Sept) and we accept well behaved dogs.
We have a conservatory (ideal for cooler months) and pretty garden. The space The space
Stable cottage sits adjacent to a Jacobean farmhouse with banked wild flower meadows rising above the cottage and lovely views with mixed traditional woodland. It is a nature lovers paradise and the location is peaceful and tranquil.
We are passionate about the environment and preserving the countryside.
The cottage has two bedrooms (once the old hayloft) and is open plan to some extent to the living area. There is one a double room (en studio) and the other a small twin. It is important to note that access for the twin bedroom is through the double room (see our gallery page) The double room has lovely views of the banked cottage garden whilst the twin bedroom has a velux window. Downstairs we have a cosy living room with woodburning stove and include logs in your rental. We have a well equipped kitchen and downstairs bathroom with bath and overhead shower.
The conservatory is ideal for the cooler months and doors open to a cotswold stone patio and steps to the pretty garden and views of the fields adjacent to the farmhouse and surrounding countryside. Guests are welcome to explore our fields but please observe the Countryside code!
Out of season we are very happy to consider short breaks or weekends (min 3 nights) Please send us a message and we will send over a special offer with the correct rates for shorter periods.

Title: Woodland Lodge
Description:
Architecturally stunning (designed by whiteBOX Architectural firm) and idyllically located Copse Road is inspired by the luxury hotels of London with entertaining in mind. ideally situated halfway between the buzzing cities of Bath and Bristol. Sleeping 10 guests across 4.5 bedrooms with a wonderful open plan kitchen/living area and a luxurious heated pool Indoor Sauna beautiful gardens design by Karena Batstone compromising California cool Copse Road is perfect for groups and families. The space The space
The space was painstakingly designed with hosting and entertaining in mind. Cantilevered glass expensive finishes Copse road oozes sophistication but doesnt compromise on practicality. The house is clean and modern but warm and welcoming set in a beautiful garden with its own heated pool sauna private bbq sunken seating area pizza oven.

Dogs: Up to 2 well-behaved dogs are welcome at Copse Road at an additional cost of ¬£30 per dog. Please let us know if you will be bringing a dog(s) and we will then revise your booking confirmation.

This property can accommodate 12 guests if you also hire our garden studio this is another room with a king size bed in the gardens of the property. This room is ¬£175 per evening. Please enquire.

 Sleeps 10 (or 12 if garden studio is also rented)
 4 Bathrooms: 1 family bathroom 1 ensuite 1 downstairs statement toilet & 1 downstairs shower room.
 Private secure parking for 7 cars.
 Private walled garden and outdoor kitchen
 Heated outdoor swimming pool (Heated but struggles in freezing temperatures)
 Outdoor sunk seating area
 Indoor sauna
 Pizza oven and outdoor cooking
 All bed linen bath towels and tea towels provided
 Robes and slippers
 Hairdryers
 Dining table + seating for 10
 Welcome Pack: tea coffee sugar
 Kitchen essentials: dishwasher tablets cloth washing up liquid bin bags kitchen roll baking foil cling film salt + pepper
 Bathroom starter pack: hand soap toilet paper
 Heating and hot water via gas/oil central heating with individual thermostat controls.
 Free Virgin high-speed Wi-Fi
 65‚Äù Flat Screen TV in living area TV in bedrooms
 Dog friendly - maximum 2 dogs
 Fully equipped kitchen with toaster kettle utensils crockery cutlery glassware (champagne flutes tumblers and wine and water glasses) cafeti√®re bakeware food preparation (grater jug sieve saucepans etc).
 4 x wall-mounted ovens
 Food Steamer
 Built in coffee machine
 Microwave
 Dishwasher
 American style fridge
 Washer/dryer
 Ironing board + iron
 Vacuum cleaner
 Safety equipment: fire extinguisher fire blanket carbon monoxide monitor smoke alarm First Aid kit.

Situated 20 minutes from Bristol City centre and just 10 minutes from Bath City centre you are able to enjoy bars restaurants and night life from either city at arms reach. There are Uber and taxi services that run in and out of Bath for around ¬£15. I have created small guest book of some of my favourite bars and restaurants to explore during your stay. No Guest access Guest access
While staying at Copse road you will have full exclusive access to the house and gardens. The property has a large secure driveway for parking with secure coded electronic gates.

There is a large heated outdoor pool that is available for use. We enforce a strict policy of no use of the pool after 10pm for the safety of our guests. Please note use of the pool is to your own risk. Other things to note Other things to note
We want our guests to enjoy the use of the property and have a memorable time while staying at Copse road. We have a few house rules to note and those are as follows;

- No parties of any nature
- No private events.
- Strictly no stag dos.
- No use of the pool after 10pm.
- Please specify the pet before booking.
- No groups under 28.
- No music after 10pm
- No Unauthorised additional guests

Unfortunately our swimming pool can only be heated to a maximum of 27 degrees we cannot increase this temperature due to our pool being of domestic liner construction. This is a lovely temperature for swimming all year around.

Title: The Hay Loft - luxury converted barn nr Haslemere
Description:
The Coach House forms part of Bretforton Manor which has features dating from Tudor times. We only have the one property which is luxurious and spacious for a one bedroomed apartment.

Guests have access to our incredible facilities (5 acres of grounds- Walled Garden an indoor swimming pool and a tennis court). Bretforton is an idyllic village which is a brilliant base to explore the Cotswolds Stratford upon Avon Oxford. The space The space
There is a large sitting room with two sofas (1 is a double sofa bed). It has fully equipped kitchen/dining room. There is a utility room with a machine and tumble dryer. There is a king size bed in the main bedroom. There is a also a dressing area/place to do hair and make up. The bathroom has a bath/shower and there is a second downstairs WC and basin. WiFi (fast broadband)is and there is desk for working on the mezzanine level as well as space for a travel cot. Guest access Guest access
Guests can access 5 acres of gardens including a lake pond lots of exotic herbaceous borders an orchard ancient listed stocks and the beautiful Walled Garden where they can eat al fresco or enjoy a sundowner! There is also a private swimming pool (which is open April until end of October) and a tennis court. For an extra charge there are alpaca experiences hire of a Tudor barn tours of the house and use of a gym. Other things to note Other things to note
This is our sole Airbnb property. It sleeps up to 4 (although two would have to sleep on a sofa bed). We don‚Äôt allow children under 12 (accept for young infants).

Title: Entire Garden Annex with Breathtaking Views
Description:
Character single-story barn-conversion just three miles from the historic town of Stratford-upon-Avon with good access into Warwick and Leamington Spa. With shared hot tub and indoor swimming pool. Award winning artisan Farm Shop with caf√© butchers and bakery all on site.

Keys are collected using a code for a keybox so this gives you flexibility on arrival and departure times. The space The space
All ground floor. One double bedroom with king size bed TV & Freeview & en-suite bathroom (down two deep steps) with bath shower over basin WC & small range of complimentary toiletries. Open plan living area with kitchen with Nespresso machine dining area & sitting area; all with vaulted beamed ceilings. Guest access Guest access
The cottage and its garden are is exclusively for your use.

You will share access to the indoor heated pool and the outdoor hot tub with guests in our two other holiday cottages. This will be between 9:00 ‚Äì 18:00 daily. 

There is a diary planner in the pool house where you can reserve private hourly time slots simply write your name or cottage name next to the time you would like to use the facilities. Other things to note Other things to note
We are really lucky as we have an award winning Farm shop next door. They also do takeaway pizzas and Sunday lunches picnics etc. We have a great little village shop called Snitterfield Stores and they are open every day with a very good selection.

The next closest places to eat are No.19 Restaurant which is 1 mile and The New Inn which is an award winning pub run/owed by the villagers in Norton Lindsey. Stratford Warwick Leamington Spa and Henley in Arden all have a fabulous range of restaurants so something for everyone. If you dont want to eat out we can recommend other food deliveries private chefs or takeaways.

Snitterfield boasts two impressive USGA golf courses within 5 minutes of the village. The Ingon Manor golf club has a 18-hole par 72 championship course. The Stratford Oaks golf club is a welcoming and friendly club with our guests. With lots of other activities in the local area including horse riding tennis bowling fishing gliding and cycling. The Monarchs Way runs across the entrance drive giving walkers access to some stunning countryside.

Title: A Cosy Cottage With A Fabulous View Close To TW.
Description:
The Pool House has been expertly interior designed in a Mediterranean style. This fully equipped accommodation has a separate bedroom with a quality kingsize bed an en suite bathroom and shower open plan living and dining area and kitchen with a range cooker.
The Pool House opens on to the Patio with seating and a purpose built Barbecue. It is very close to the Swimming Pool Jacuzzi and Sauna. The bedroom overlooks the large garden gazebo and fields of grazing horses. The space The space
Surrounded by the Cotswold and Malvern Hills yet conveniently located close to the historic towns of Cheltenham Spa Tewkesbury and Gloucester this fully equipped accommodation has a separate bedroom with a quality kingsize bed an en suite bathroom and shower open plan living and dining area and kitchen.
The Pool House opens on to the Patio with seating and a purpose built Barbecue. There is a large front garden with a gazebo fire pit tables and chairs so you can relax whilst making plans for the rest of your stay!
The accommodation features use of an onsite heated Swimming Pool Jacuzzi and Sauna.
Manor Barn is close the historic towns of Tewkesbury Cheltenham and Gloucester. Ancient sites including Neolithic barrows hill forts and Roman remains are nearby. We are near to the Cotswold Way so if you like walking you can follow one of the walks from the National Trail which can be downloaded from their website. The Malvern Hills are nearby and provide pleasant walks and spectacular views. The River Severn the Coombe Nature Reserve and Canal is a short walk away.Guest access
Self-contained accommodation.
Swimming pool Jacuzzi and Sauna.
Gym.
Patio.
Barbecue.
Fire Pit.
Gardens.
Gated courtyard.
Private parking.
Bus routes close by.
Good train services to and from Cheltenham and Gloucester.

Title: Lakeside Retreat- The Boat House
Description: Our rural retreat is a fabulous recently renovated barn situated on an organic farm and with stunning views of the Somerset countryside. It is the perfect weekend get away and offers every amenity in a luxurious environment. The barn is Grade II listed and full of character with exposed beams natural brick floor and exposed natural stone walls. Imaginative interior design and great attention to detail make this the perfect place to relax in a stunning setting. The space The space\nThe barn is adjacent to the farmhouse and shares a courtyard. The views are stunning and you might catch a glimpse of the deer and hares red kites and buzzards. There is a pretty garden and a terrace with outdoor table and seating. There is also a swimming pool that may be made available on request. Please note that the pool is only heated between June and September.

Title: French Gypsy Caravan
Description:
Luxury modern two bedroom stone barn conversion with access to a private spa including heated indoor swimming pool sauna steam room gym tennis court and library.

Situated on the exclusive gated Wellesley Park estate in Dulcote Wells The Parlour is the perfect place to explore the charming City of Wells Somerset with its historic cathedral twice weekly market boutique shops restaurants and bars as well as the nearby Mendip Hills Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty. The space The space
The Parlour is a newly refurbished luxury modern barn conversion with an open plan living space super fast wifi smart TV Sonos Beam soundbar and DVD player.

The kitchen is fully equipped and has a fridge freezer gas hob electric oven and grill microwave kettle toaster dishwasher breakfast bar and everything you need to cook and serve a family meal. For little ones a highchair is provided as well as kids plates cups and cutlery.

Upstairs there are two bedrooms and two bathrooms. The master bedroom is a double with ensuite shower room. The second bedroom can be configured as a double or twin based on preference and there is also a large family bathroom. A travel cot is provided for little ones and can be placed in either room as required. Both bedrooms have stunning countryside views and blackout blinds.

The Parlour has underfloor heating throughout and both bathrooms have heated towel rails. Other things to note Other things to note
All guests must read and respect the estate rules at all times. These are available in both the house and the spa building.

There is no life guard at the swimming pool and the spa is not staffed so guests may use these facilities at their own risk. All visitors to the spa must sign in and sign out and a maximum of 4 guests may use the spa during your stay. Guests are not permitted to use the spa facilities after check out.

Please only use eco-friendly cleaning products (provided) and no bleach as waste water is treated on site using a septic tank.

No pets smoking parties or events.

Commercial vehicles and camper vans are not allowed on the estate.

The house and garden (including BBQ) must be left in a clean and tidy condition.

Any damage to the property or its contents that occur during your stay must be disclosed and paid for.

Title: Orchard Field Lodge
Description:
A cosy clean warm and light annexe with its own walled garden. Situated on a beautiful private road a short walk from the historic cobbled streets of Guildford town centre with its numerous boutique shops and quality independent restaurants.

Ty Bach is on the edge of the beautiful Surrey Hills (a designated Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty) and the Rivey Wey. It is the perfect destination for walkers mountain bikers and lovers of the outdoors. Dog walking and country pub heaven! The space The space
Ty Bach is a compact but well-designed property. Downstairs there is an open plan kitchen and living area with french doors leading out to the private walled garden. The dining table seats four comfortably for a delicious meal prepared in the well equipped kitchen. There is also a small but smart shower room with W.C. Upstairs Ty Bach has one bedroom with a double bed and plenty of storage. A sofa bed in the kitchen means it is possible to accommodate four people if needed.

The property enjoys its own sunny private walled garden complete with bistro table and chairs to make the most of an al fresco lifestyle.Guest access
Whole property including private walled garden.

Title: Old Fox Inn Annexe,Grade 2 listed, near Cambridge.

Title: Country estate lodge/cabin on the River Thames
Description:
** Now with access to the onsite Spa facilities **

A holiday cottage situated on the 500 acre private nature reserve the Lower Mill Estate has much to offer during your stay. Perfect for family activity holidays for all generations or a relaxing break in the countryside. Onsite there is a heated indoor pool two heated outdoor pools plus eco pool fishing sports facilities and lakes on your doorstep plus a luxury onsite Spa. The space The space
Oakleigh Cottage offers a cosy and contemporary feel featuring an open plan living/dining room with wood burner which opens up through double french doors to the enclosed outside decking area. There is a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher fridge freezer and microwave plus a useful utility room with WC and a washing machine and tumble dryer for your use. Upstairs there are four bedrooms which sleeps up to eight people which includes two master rooms each with en-suite and balcony a cosy double room and an adult bunk room and a family bathroom.

Technology such as unlimited ultrafast fibre broadband (300 Mbps) is available to use for all your devices plus there are Smart TVs with complimentary access to Netflix X-box (plus games and films) and Bluetooth speaker are provided.

Travel cot stair gate high chair bed guard baby bath seat and toddler feeding utensils are also available. (Please note the cot is a standard travel cot and does not include a full size mattress).

Luxury hotel linen plus bath and hand towels are provided for eight people. Please bring your own pool/beach towels and linen for the travel cot if you require it.

Essential starter items are provided eg tea coffee sugar milk dishwasher tablets tea towels toilet roll complimentary toiletries and hand soap. (Please note we do not re-stock these items for you when/if you run out during your stay and there is an onsite store or a local shop near by their details are found in our digital guide sent on booking).

For the warmer months there is a BBQ with a starter kit on the back decking and during the autumn/winter months wood coal and fire lighters will be included for the wood burner and if you require more supplies during your stay there is a general store on the estate that sells firewood.

The Experience

Lower Mill Estate is situated on a 500 acre nature reserve which includes several lakes interspersed with walking/cycle paths including the Thames Path which runs past the cottage.

Included with the cottage rental there is the free use of an indoor heated pool at the onsite Spa two further outdoor heated pools (30c) plus an eco pool (two of the outdoor pools are closed Christmas to Easter but the other two heated pools are open all year). There is also two saunas steam room gym three tennis courts astro turf table tennis two playgrounds and several fishing and sporting lakes all a couple of minutes walk away from the cottage.

At the onsite award winning Spa there are also a variety of treatments available (charges apply) for everyone to enjoy including teens and expectant mums so you have the chance to really unwind and relax during your stay.

For those who enjoy an active holiday there are varying activities available to enjoy on the water including fishing boating paddle boarding and kayaking. All equipment for these water sports (except fishing) and bike hire is available from the Activity Hub located on the estate (charges apply). The Activity Hub also offers lessons events and group activities during peak season to include paddle board lessons kayak safaris and yoga.

From Mill Lake opposite the cottage is the start of the children‚Äôs Miss Mouse nature trail and treasure hunt. You are also able to swim in Mill Lake which includes a beach area on the far side which has a gentle slope for paddling.

For rainy days or lazy evenings in front of the fire there are a selection of board games and Netflix films available for all ages.

The Ballihoo Restaurant and Clubhouse is a few minutes walk away from the cottage and is open for drinks meals take away and general supplies.


For the safety and comfort of our guests we only accept bookings with a maximum of 8 guests (adults or children) plus two infants who sleep in travel cots.

We welcome well behaved dogs (no cats) over the age of 24 months - max 2 dogs. Please do let us know on booking if you wish to bring a dog with you adding the number of pets to your booking via the Airbnb guest numbers section. The are some lovely dog walks onsite and the Estate is dog friendly. Please note the Lower Mill Estate is a nature reserve so there is no fencing between each of the properties but there are grassed areas around the cottage. We have details in our digital guide of a dog sitter/walker who is known on the Estate who can help with looking after you dog during your stay should you require it.

We do not accept Hen or Stag bookings.

If you have any queries about your stay please do get in touch our guests are very important to us. I am currently working a couple of shifts per week volunteering in our local hospital so if I do not respond to your query straight away I will do so as soon as my shift ends. Thank you. Guest access Guest access
You will have the whole cottage to yourselves during your stay. You also have access to the private 500 acre nature reserve and Spa for paddle boarding fishing kayaking picnics cycling swimming etc. There is parking very near to the cottage for one car and overflow car parks within the gated estate for any other vehicles in your group. Other things to note Other things to note
We provide a comprehensive digital guide at the time of booking for our guests for the facilities on the Lower Mill Estate and also the local area to help guests start planning their holiday to ensure they make the most of their time away.

Title: Snug & Secluded Lakeside shepherds hut
Description:
This is a 1960s house sympathetically decorated with original period furniture directly outside is a pool with decking where you can swim and sunbathe. The space The space
The Poolhouse

Set in the Cotswold village of Rodborough this unique holiday retreat is a five minute walk from Rodborough Common an area owned by the National Trust and consisting of nearly 300 acres of grassland.

The Poolhouse was built in the late 1960‚Äôs in glass timber and Cotswold stone (reputed to have originated from Prinknash Abbey) It is southwest facing to ensure maximum sun through out the day.

The Poolhouse has recently been refurbished to a high standard. The interior has been sympathetically restored to reflect the period it was built comprising of mid-century fittings furniture and original posters.

The house consists of one double bedroom and a shower room. The open plan living space comprises of a kitchen with a breakfast bar a dining area a large settee a TV and DVD player and a wood-burning stove. There is also a utility room with a washer/dryer.

Externally the house consists of a private unheated swimming pool surrounded by cedar decking several seated tables including what was part of an old stone cider press and also a large table near the shade of two ancient apple trees; a perfect place to eat outside or just admire the view. The house is set in grounds shared by the owner but is discretely tucked away.

The pool will be open from April 1st.

Rodborough Common set in open grassland on the Cotswold escarpment commands impressive views of Stroud and the Severn Vale. In the summer cattle roam free often wandering across roads. In the rambling 19th century golf course it is not uncommon to see cattle blocking golfers as they try to take shots. To admire the view visit The Lodge pub in the middle of the common or have an ice cream at Winstones Cotswold Ice Cream factory.

In the village of Rodborough is the pub The Prince Albert; a couple of minutes walk from the Poolhouse The Albert is a busy characterful pub that has regular music nights with musicians of repute as well as comedy nights.

The house is a mile from the small bustling market town of Stroud with its independent shops pubs and caf√©s. Once the industrial centre of the Cotswold‚Äôs and the wool industry it is still very much a working town. There are regular arts and music festivals held here as well as a weekly award winning farmers market.

Close by is Tetbury known for its antique shops and 12 miles away is the spa town of Cheltenham famous for its racecourse which hosts the annual Gold Cup as well as its many cultural festivals. Gloucester with its medieval Cathedral is 10 miles away and the ancient market town of Cirencester is also 10 miles away

Nearby is the village of Slad immortalized by the author Laurie Lee in his novel Cider with Rosie and its pub The Woolpack as well as the villages of Bisley Minchenhampton and Painswick with its famous churchyard of 99 clipped yew trees. The surrounding Cotswolds‚Äô also has a wealth of houses and gardens open to the public.

Walkers can access the famous Cotswold Way 102 miles along the Cotswold escarpment stretching from Chipping Campden to Bath with sweeping views and passing through picturesque villages in Cotswold stone.

Further afield the city of Bath and the city of Bristol are both a 45-minute drive away.

Transport links: Stroud train station is less than a mile away; there are hourly trains to London Gloucester and Cheltenham. Paddington is 90 minutes away by train.

The house would be ideally suited to a couple. Due to the proximity of the pool to the house it is unsafe for younger children and no pets. Guest access Guest access
The Poolhouse is set in its own private space within our garden. The main drive is shared then the Poolhouse drive branches off. This is where you can park your car.

Title: Woodland cabin in Stoke Newington, Central London.
Description:
Set in an acre of garden with LARGE OUTDOOR POOL in a picture postcard setting overlooking the village pond. The Grand Design style 120sqm kitchen extension to the rear with sliding glass wall and level access to the pool and patio makes this a perfect family holiday venue. The space The space
SWIMMING POOL: The swimming pool measures 20 x 40 ft. Its depth is between 4ft and 10ft.
The pool is open and available from April 1st to October 31st weather permitting and can be heated on request at a charge of ¬£30.00 per day (charges apply for the entirety of the rental period).
The pool is not fenced off but has an alarm.
The enormous level back garden has a 15ft trampoline and a set of goal posts.
The patio area has a mixture of loungers and sunbeds firepit enormous charcoal BBQ 12 seater oak table and chairs ping pong table and football table.
Please note:
Bedroom 6 is a small downstairs double. We added it in 2022 in response to frequent requests for a downstairs bedroom for guests with limited mobility who find stairs difficult.
It is located directly adjacent to the kitchen and has one step down to access. Guest access Guest access
All areas of the property are completely private and accessible.

Title: Luxurious converted stable.
Description:
Shepherds Pye is a unique 1920s Railway Carriage. Rescued from a local farm as a neglected frame it has been lovingly restored by ourselves into a cosy modern retreat on the edge of the New Forest.

The hut is set in a secluded private spot on our farm overlooking a lake. It is self contained and finished to a high standard; including a comfy double bed heating mains electrics and a fully equipped kitchen and en-suite bathroom supplying all you need for rural yet comfortable stay.The space
We are a family run cattle and sheep farm explore the farm during your stay use our well stocked course fishing lakes or make use of our indoor heated swimming pool which has just been newly renovated.
Due to the huts excellent insulation electric heater & heated towel rail the hut is cosy all year round and so is perfect for both summer and winter stays.

Inside the hut there is:
- A comfy double bed
- Soft bed linen and towels
- A TV/DVD player
- Electric heating & heated towel rail in the bathroom
- Plenty of storage
- Fridge/freezer
- Oven with hob
- A clever pull-out table
- Roberts Revival DAB Digital radio
- Butler sink
- Shower
- Toilet
- Basin
- Fully insulated and triple glazed windows & doors
- Kettle and toaster
- Crockery cutlery and glasses
- Pots pans and trays
- Salt & pepper

Outside the hut there is:
- Decking area
- Rustic fire bowl: we can provide a bbq arm and a fire basket which includes firelighters matches and fire logs at an extra cost of ¬£15 (please confirm if you would like the fire basket before you arrive).
- Bistro table and chairs for 2
- Sun parasol
- A lake on the huts doorstep
- Beautiful surroundings with neighbours such as sheep cows ducks moorhen geese and heron!

Please note there is no WIFI as the hut is in a remote location and we feel it is more peaceful without it.
However there is a TV and a Roberts Radio to keep you entertained on rainy days. Guest access Guest access
Guests will have their own private lake which they are welcome to fish or to just sit relax and enjoy the picturesque surroundings. You are also invited to explore the farm and use the indoor heated swimming pool which is just a short walk from the hut. The pool has recently been newly renovated.

Private hourly swimming sessions in the swimming pool are bookable when you arrive.
The laundry room is shared with the guests in the self catering barns. Other things to note Other things to note
Dogs are welcome but please note there is an extra charge of ¬£15 if bringing dogs. Please also read my house rules before booking.

Please note that the hut is located in a field away from the main farm buildings and swimming pool (a short walk of no more than 5 minutes). There is also a small step onto the the decking and another step into the hut. It is therefore probably not suitable for the elderly.

We also have Cottage Pye & Bramble Pye; two luxury barn conversions suitable for larger groups (each sleeping 6-8 adults plus infants) as well as four other cottages available for stays please see our website pyesmead farm for more info or visit us on insta; pyes_holiday_cottages

Takeaways unfortunately dont deliver to us but you can have supermarket deliveries. There is a local shop close by as well as a farm shop selling groceries locally produced meats bread and cakes.
If you dont fancy cooking the local shop sells ‚Äòcook‚Äô high quality frozen meals which are designed to be just like homemade food.
If you fancy eating out there is a great selection of pubs and restaurants nearby the ones we recommend are listed in the welcome pack in the hut.

Title: Luxury Cabin on Private Lake
Description:
This fully renovated two-storey apartment with Scandinavian decor is just a few minutes from Deauville Casino and from the promenade des Planches (1.5 km).

A large equiped terrace with a unique view of the sea.

The apartment is perfectly equipped: tv washing machine dishwasher toaster coffee machine ironing board terrasse with see view access to indoor swimming-pool. The space The space
The apartement was recently renovated and has a beautiful view over Deauville and sea. The terrace is large and well equiped. Guest has access to private indoor swimming pool and jacuzzi. Guest access Guest access
The whole flat is at the disposal of guest. Other things to note Other things to note

Title: Tudor Barn conversion
Description:
Part of the SummerHouse Luxury Holiday Lets complex Old Stables is a grand house in the middle of the Chew Valley overlooking the stunning Mendip foothills. Old Stables boast use of a heated indoor swimming pool with a hot tub steam room & changing rooms. There are four lux bedrooms three are en-suite comfortably sleeping eight people with additional small pull-out beds for three plus a pair of sofa beds for four more in our spacious reception rooms. Pictures dont do Old Stables justice!The space
To the left of the front door are two reception rooms the breathtaking Garden Room with a Knowle sofabed a chaise longue a pair of sofas a pair of round tables and a highly polished Victorian sideboard. The spacious Sitting Room has a pair of sofas of which one is a sofabed. There is a large 4K TV with a Playstation Android TV box and a Blu-Ray player. Both rooms have French doors that leads to the garden.

Opposite the front door is a flight of stairs taking you to 3 luxury en-suite bedrooms. The largest is Chestnut - a super-king bed with a bijou pull-out bed with a superb bathroom containing a freestanding slipper bath walk-in shower and his 
\ hers basins. The next largest Oak has a super-king bed with a bijou pull-out bed. Oak\s en-suite is a shower room. The cosy Silver Birch has a double bed and the en-suite has a freestanding bath and a separate shower.

Going to the right of the front door leads you to Damson a small bedroom with full size bunk-beds and a bijou pull-out bed. There is access to a downstairs washroom.

The kitchen is extremely large with hand-made wooden units granite worktop slate floor a 7 burner Smeg range a dishwasher and a wooden dining table that comfortably seats 8. There is additional seating around the central island that seats 8 more. There are French doors leading to the patio overlooking the landscaped garden. The kitchen also leads to the shared laundry room which has a pair of washing machines a pair of dryers and an additional dishwasher for those large parties!

In our grounds you will find a 200-year old converted stables a Georgian horse wash a well and a purpose built swimming pool. The pool complex houses a ten-metre swimming pool with a Fluvo jet to exercise against a hot tub which takes 5 people (at a squeeze) a shower and steam cubicle robes slippers spa towels hair dryer. The temperature of the pool is 88 ¬∞F / 31 ¬∞ C and the temperature of the hot tub is 101 ¬∞ F / 38 ¬∞ C. Bring your own CDs use ours or listen to the radio or Bluetooth; feel free to just sit in the pool room to read relax or meditate. Groups are to book sessions for exclusive use of the pool complex - ask for details. We have personally approved people to offer you Massages Aromatherapy Treatments and Personal Trainer Assessment which can be arranged by yourselves at an extra charge if required. Other things to note Other things to note
Please note that we do 7 night stays from Fridays to Fridays all year round bookable on Airbnb however between November to March inclusive we offer stays of 3 nights Fridays to Mondays and 4 nights Mondays to Fridays. Please contact us directly to book this.

Also please note that the Garden Room does not have curtains and has ceiling-to-floor windows on 3 walls so privacy would be at a minimum.

Title: 'Stable Cottage' - Beautiful family accommodation
Description:
Very nice little self catering chalet house for holidays in the Blackdown Hills. On the picturesque grounds of a westcountry smallholding with a swimming pool. The space The space
Real peace and quiet but easy to get to. Guest access Guest access
Enjoy the use of the grounds around and look at the stars at night. Other things to note Other things to note
We are happy to try and accomodate people and are flexible in arrival times

Title: The perfect rural village escape in Sussex
Description:
Quirky open-plansplit level self-contained annex attached to a 16th century farmhouse (with tennis court) which is situated on a nature reserve lake. 15 min drive to Central Reading and a 20 min walk (1 Mile) to Theale train station-38 mins to London Pad (please not that part of the walk there is not a pavement so it maybe be best to come by car or taxi). The space The space
A self contained open-plan split level annex with separate entrance and small private garden area full of character with wooden beams set in the beautiful Berkshire countryside. Kitchen and private bathroom with shower/bath. Superkingsize bed sky television and wifi available. Use of private outdoor tennis court (overlooking lake which is a nature reserve not suitable for swimming or SUP) and direct access to nature reserve walks via the main garden. Guest access Guest access
Private access to guest annex and own garden area . We have a tennis court too which can be used by guests but will need to be booked in on arrival (for guests only). Sleeps two but if required we have a blow up bed/travel Cot for baby if required for a short (overnight) stay it is all open plan so its probably only suitable for a small child/baby. Not suitable for older children.

For guests staying 3 nights or more if notice is given prior to arrival keys can be supplied for our indoor heated swimming pool. (Pool is fitted with an electronic safety cover for children safety). Please check if the pool is on if you would like to use it as we tend to turn it off over the deep winter months.Other things to note
We are situated just off the the M4 corridor which has great access to London Ascot Windor Bath Bristol Oxford and the Cotswolds depending on what you plan on doing on your stay we are ideally located to really get the most of your vacation here in the UK.

Title: A unique property in a beautiful location
Description:
NEW for 2022 - baby/toddler package - bed guard travel cot booster high chair provided free of charge if required

NEW for 2022 - beach/pool towels provided

Our privately owned 2 bedroom holiday home is just perfect for everyone who loves the freedom of self catering holidays but the quality and standards of a good hotel.
Coastal Retreat is fitted out to provide you with home from home comfort. Guests in 2021 agreed we really had thought of everything. The space The space
Our modern & well looked after holiday home has a relaxing & peaceful feel.

The holiday home sleeps 4 comfortably as is ideal for a family or two sets of friends.
You will find good quality fixtures & fittings - exceeding the typical standard you may find in many other holiday homes. Just because its a caravan doesnt mean you cant have some home comforts. We want our guests to enjoy a fun & relaxing holiday with everything you might need during your stay.

Accommodation includes -

Living room -
The bright & airy comfortable & cosy lounge with plenty of seating is a perfect place to relax & chill after a busy day exploring the local beaches towns & villages. Patio doors lead on to the decking. Fitted with a feature fireplace & electric fire for cosy nights watching TV reading or playing games.

Kitchen & Dining area -
Fitted with a full size fridge/freezer (with the important wine bottle rack!) electric oven & grill & built in microwave oven toaster kettle and equipped with plenty of crockery glasses pot/pans & utensils. Enough to cook a meal or dish up a take away and hopefully everything you will need for your stay.
The dining area consists of a proper dining table & 4 chairs - not wobbly stools!

We provide you with a good stock of kitchen essentials for cleaning & washing up & managing the bins & recycling as well as tin foil cling film & food bags for picnics & days out. We also supply toilet rolls to start you off kitchen towel & similar items for your arrival. There are also bottles of hand soap & hand sanitiser. You just need to bring your own toiletries & personal care items.

When you arrive you can expect a food welcome pack waiting for you to get you started.

Master bedroom en suite bathroom -
The master bedroom is fitted with a king size bed. The room has a large fitted wardrobe with plenty of hanging space & coat hangers provided. There is also a chest of drawers with TV & a dressing table & stool.
An ensuite bathroom with bath & shower over wc & basin.

Second bedroom -
The second bedroom can be made up in a twin with 2 single beds or as a double. When made up as a double we push the two single beds together & use a topper & double fitted sheet to create a second double bed. The room has a small wardrobe (coat hangers & shelf hanger provided) for your holiday clothes.
(When booking please let us know the configuration of the second bedroom so we know how you would like the beds made up)

All bedding is provided for both bedrooms - mattress toppers mattress protectors hypoallergenic duvets hypoallergenic pillows & feather pillows pillow protectors all duvet covers & pillow cases.

Family shower & WC -
With wash basin and WC mirrored cabinet & a large shower cubicle.

Both bathrooms have fitted central heating towel rails ideal for warming through towels & robes (2 supplied for master bedroom guests) & making them nice to use all year round.

Towels & laundry -
We provide the following for your use during your stay -
1 bath sheet per person
1 hand towel per person
1 hair turban per bedroom
1 bath mat per bathroom (plus a rubber non slip shower/bath mat)
NEW FOR 2022 - 1 beach/pool towel per person
1 bath robe for each guest in the master bedroom
Kitchen - tea towels hand towels oven gloves

We launder all of the linen & towels at each changeover. We do not provide a daily service for making beds/cleaning etc.

Outside deck -
Surrounded by glass its easy to fasten back the main door & double patio doors & let the sunshine in. The large sunny decking with plenty of space to sunbathe or eat dinner is the perfect place to sit back chill & relax. Enjoy a coffee glass of wine or dinner sat at the rattan effect table & 4 chairs.
There is a storage box to stow away cushions to keep them dry & always useable.

There is plenty of parking in the adjacent parking area.


Leisure facilities -
A Leisure Club pass is available at ¬£50 for up to 6 guests for up to 7 nights ... excellent value for a family. This allows use of the indoor pool outdoor pool gym and entertainment facilities. We will send you a form to complete prior to your stay in order for us to apply for the passes for you as our guests.

We recommend you read all our information the booking terms & conditions and the site rules before booking your holiday at Coastal Retreat. Guest access Guest access
There is plenty of on site parking around the home with 2 parking areas within walking distance of the home and no designated parking spaces.
Hoburne Park is in a great central position for exploring Christchurch Mudeford Bournemouth & surrounding villages. A 10-15 minute walk will take you to a choice of great local beaches. A 5 minute drive and youll be in the beautiful New Forest. Other things to note Other things to note
Your holiday home will be completely set up and ready for your arrival with good quality bed linen and towels provided in the nightly price plus other homely extras for your stay. We also include robes for guests in the master bedroom.
NEW We now provide 1 pool/beach towel per guest
NEW To save you loading your car to the roof and bringing everything except the kitchen sink ......... We can now provide a travel cot bed guard booster high chair - please request these when booking.

A welcome pack will be waiting for you - exact items included depend on the number of guests age etc .. Your surprise awaits!!!

All water and electric charges are included in your holiday rental charge.

***** Special Occasions *****
Whatever the occasion we can help to make your stay extra special - balloons cream tea hamper celebration hamper a choice of breakfast packs. Just send us a message after youve made your booking for further information and prices

Title: The Cabin, a Gorgeous Hideaway in Henley on Thames
Description:
A private gate takes you directly onto the South Downs with some lovely foot and cycle paths on your doorstep. Close to the beach and city Chichester Portsmouth Southhampton Winchester Goodwood and Witterings beaches are in easy reach while Liphook station takes you to Waterloo in an hour. Ripsley is a place to get away from it all. Great for cyclists walkers couples and families. The space The space
The Cottage has a private entrance and parking for up to three/four cars. It is a 30 second walk through the grounds to the private gate that takes you onto the South Downs as there are no roads to cross walks and cycle rides are easy with children .

Guests have exclusive use of a private patio area with BBQ and a large garden outside of the cottage (there are garden games football posts swing ball Badminton croquet etc). Guests also have use of the azalea grove where the fire pit is located - a great place to relax in the evening and logs are in full supply from the log shed.

There are two sitting areas one in the kitchen/dining area upstairs and downstairs in the main sitting room/games room where French doors lead onto the patio garden and azalea grove.

In the sitting room/games room there is a 52 smart TV with Netflix great for cosy nights of film watching a woodburning stove and DVD library that includes some of the latest releases as well as a large double sofa bed downstairs w/c and table tennis and pool table. There are also garden toys/board games and indoor toys available for children of all ages.

Apart from central heating there are two woodburning stoves - one in the sitting room/games room the other in the master bedroom.

The kitchen has a dining table for seven (a high chair is available)an American fridge freezer and kitchen amenities including a dishwasher cafetiere and blender. To ease your way into your stay with us we supply a starter 3 day supply of goodsincluding: coffee tea sugar dishwasher tablets washing up liquid toilet roll rubbish bags and basic cooking ingredients - oil salt/pepper/spices.

There is a shower room upstairs with power shower and w/c a w/c downstairs and an ensuite bath to the master bedroom with a roll top bath and basin.

In the master bedroom there is a woodburning stove and king size bed. In the second bedroom there is a double bed and a French sleigh/day bed that can be used as a bed for a child up to aged 9yrs. For a seventh and eight adult guest there is room in both bedrooms for two additional single bed truckle mattresses.

We know babysitters we can recommend for your stay housekeepers for extra help and a masseur who will make home visits. We supply a PDF of the area including recommended places to visit/ walks local recommended pubs/restaurants and things to do. Guest access Guest access
The entire cottage patio and lawn outside of the cottage leading up the main house is available to guests.

The gate that leads from the grounds directly onto the South Downs is a thirty second walk from the cottage through the grounds.

The cottage has a private patio area with a BBQ and space for sitting outside. Children are welcome to play in the azalea and the grove and on the sunny garden leading up to the main house at any time. This has a tree swing swing ball and football net and we leave outside toys in the cottage.

If two guests would like to use both bedrooms there is an additional payment of ¬£25. If three guests would like to use two bedrooms and the sofa bed/ truckle mattress there is an additional payment of ¬£25. If extra beds are usedwe can prepare linens for ¬£20.

Due to family life the cottage is not recommended to guests who would like to entertain visitors. Other things to note Other things to note
We have a family dog a 5 yr old chocolate labrador called Maddie. She has no access to the cottage. but if she set you she may come up and say hello.

We offer a housekeeping service. Our housekeeper will wash and press clothes for ¬£13 per hour. Otherwise there is a laundromat and laundry service available.

For guests staying longer than a week linens/towels are changed weekly and there is a weekly ¬£26 ( 2 hr) cleaning fee paid directly to the housekeeper after the first week.

Sorry legalese but if you do wish to use the garden games/fire pit you use them at your own risk and are solely responsible for the health and safety of your guests and other party members during the stay.

There is an ordinance survey map at the cottage and links in the PDF sent prior to your arrival for you to plan walks/trips prior to your stay. We also recommend local pubs/restaurants and send contact info. for local things to do.

The cottage is a shoe-free zone thank you!

If you would like any more information or require anymore help please message us and well do our best to help.

Title: Beautiful Winterberry Barn ,Romsey
Description:
A beautiful hut within its own private garden with a bbq area fire pit and bench overlooking paddock.

It has a kitchen with fridge microwave two hot plates a cafeteriakettletoaster a table stools a comfortable 6ft 6 in by x 4ft double bed as well as a shower with sink and loo fully plumbed in.

A small TV/DVD and wood burning stove just perfect for rainy days and wifi connection.

For those who love being close to nature with all the luxury of being at home.

No pets allowed. The space The space
For people looking for a cosy break from the hassle of life these days. Guest access Guest access
During the months that our wonderful pool is open (usually between early June and early September) you are welcome to share it with our family and guests in our cottage.

It reaches a max temperature of 26 degrees by early July. Please bring your own swimming towels. Kindly replace cover if the day is chilly.

It is our family pool and as a courtesy we invite you to share it. Please do not expect to have this to yourself although often you may. We do not charge for the use and rules apply as with the use of table tennis/ skittles and darts in covered barn. Other things to note Other things to note
You may hear the cockerel and horses and some road noise from farm vehicles during the day.

Title: The Dairy   A Beautiful Cosy Country Retreat
Description:
Relax and soak in the peace and quiet at Shrove Cottage an idyllic little gem of a property which is self-contained with its own private entrance roomy modern bathroom with underfloor heating fully equipped kitchen and bedroom/sitting room area with beautiful views up the Chedworth Valley. A perfect central location for work rest and play. Breakfast with home-made bread included for you to prepare and eat at your leisure.
Available at Shrove Cottage Pancake Hill.
(URL HIDDEN) The space The space
Our pool and sun patio area are both for your exclusive use during your stay. The pool is 3m wide 5.5m long and 87cm deep. It is heated naturally by the sun.
The property is totally self-contained and is set out as an open-plan loft apartment with a fully equipped kitchen and bedroom/dining room area. Downstairs is the hall and the bathroom which has a generous size shower and underfloor heating. Guest access Guest access
There is safe off-road parking on the driveway for your vehicle which is large enough to park five cars. You have use of all the patio area around the pool where seating and tables are provided for your enjoyment and the property itself is totally separate from our house. The patio is a secluded private space surrounded by hedges and clematis-covered fencing.

Title: The Barn at The Grove
Description:
BS31 3ET Bath and north east Somerset council.
Superb detached period home located in a secluded position on the outskirts of the pretty village of Saltford. Immaculate accommodation comprises 5 bedrooms 4 reception rooms.
The house has 3 acres private use including a lake. You will also have access to the 230 acres farm and the owners small holding or animals
* Hot Tub
* BBQ area
* Heated Pool (summer only)
* Suitable for family groups only The space The space
Centrally located in the swathe of countryside that connects the beautiful cities of Bath and Bristol the Farm House is the largest and grandest of the Avon Farm Cottages.
The farm house 3 acres for your private use including a lake. You will also have access to the 230 acres or arable land and the owners small holding or animals.
The current owners have owned and previously lived in the property since 2005. Sleeping 10 guests across 5 bedrooms is ideal for families and groups looking for some extra space. Offering everything that you could want from fabulous holiday home features 3 bathrooms (2 en-suite) a wonderful fully-equipped kitchen snug off the kitchen large living room dining area for 8 and an impressive outdoor space with plenty of seating a gas BBQ private swimming pool (May 19th to October 31st) with changing room and bathroom and your own private 6-seater hot tub!
The 230 acres farm also houses Avon Farm Cottages which comprises six individual holiday cottages that can be booked separately or all together to accommodate larger groups and families.
Please note no properties at Avon Farm are suitable for events or parties. No additional guests allowed unless previously agreed. A list of approved contractors will be sent out after booking has been confirmed.

INTRODUCTION

Once you have reached the bottom of the tree-lined you will immediately be struck by the property‚Äôs impressive Georgian stature water feature within the turning circle as well as the 3 acres of land that surround the property. Some of the original parts of the building standing at over 400 years old.

Recently refurbished to a very high standard Avon farm has everything that you could need for a comfortable and relaxing break. The property is immaculately designed clean lines glass and chrome furnishings spotlights as well as plenty of natural light ‚Äì the Farm House is for guests who love a modern twist on country living. With five king size double beds in the main house there‚Äôs plenty of space for a good night‚Äôs sleep. single z beds can be available on request for flexible sleeping arrangements.

FACILITIES

- Sleeps 10 in 5 bedrooms
- 4.5 bath or shower rooms
- Private parking for 5-6 cars.
- Private garden with private use of the swimming pool
- Hot tub use in strict compliance with hot tub rules
- Outdoor seating
- All bed linen bath towels and tea towels provided
- Hairdryers
- Dining table
- Welcome Pack: cereal bread biscuits butter milk tea coffee sugar
- Kitchen essentials: dishwasher tablets cloth washing up liquid bin bags salt + pepper
- Bathroom starter pack: hand soap toilet paper shampoo conditioner and shower gels for each guest.
- Heating and hot water via gas/oil central heating with individual thermostat controls.
- Free Wi-Fi
- 65‚Äù Flat Screen Bang and Olufsen TV in living area with sky. bedroom
- Fully equipped kitchen with toaster kettle utensils crockery cutlery glassware (champagne flutes tumblers and wine and water glasses) cafeti√®re bakeware food preparation (grater jug sieve saucepans etc).
- 4 x wall-mounted ovens /microwave
- Dishwasher
- American style fridge/freezer with ice dispenser
- Washer
- Ironing board + iron clothes airer
- Vacuum cleaner
- Safety equipment: fire extinguisher fire blanket carbon monoxide monitor smoke alarm.

FULL DESCRIPTION
Ground Floor

Entrance Hall


to the left‚Ä¶

Living room

Dining room

Kitchen

A light bright and contemporary space offering guests the chance to cook relax and dine together with stunning views over the land and great sunsets thanks to the glass walls. The kitchen has everything you will need to cook a fabulous meal range oven and hobs American-style fridge/freezer kettle toaster microwave and plenty of crockery glasses utensils and cookware! A large dining table with bench seat and additional chairs is the perfect place to enjoy a meal together

Snug



Back into the hallway and‚Ä¶

Upstairs

Straight along the corridor to‚Ä¶

Bedroom One
Master bedroom ensuite
master Bedroom dressing room

Bedroom Two

Bedroom Three

A cosy beamed bedroom decorated in light refreshing cream tones with a comfy king size bed bedside tables chest of drawers and beautiful garden views.

Into the‚Ä¶
Bedroom Four
A spacious double bedroom with comfy bed large wardrobe and flat screen television. This lovely bedroom has beautiful views of the front garden thanks to two large windows.

Bedroom five

Outside:

There‚Äôs plenty of outside space and seating at Avon Farm for you to enjoy including the large decking area with an under cover all year round hot tub the heated swimming pool (generally available May 19th to October 31st please note the pool will be partially drained outside of these times). Children should be supervised at all times and not allowed onto the field with the animals.

Pool room:

The pool room offers a space to get changed ready for the pool or the hot tub and includes pool towels for your use.

The pool room also includes a shower toilet and sink.

BBQ Area:

Next to the pool room is partially enclosed (covered) outdoor BBQ area. Gas is provided. Please only use this BBQ if you are confident in using the equipment and are happy with the fire safety pre-cautions.

Lake:

In the adjoining field to the house is the lake with a basic lake house. Fishing here or on the river is permitted during fishing season but not we do not provide equipment.

Around the Farm:

See guest access. We also hire bicycles payable locally.

For a tour of the house take a look on my insta at holidayletmyhome. Guest access Guest access
Enjoying the Farm and our Facilities
One of the biggest benefits about staying on a farm is there‚Äôs loads to see and do without even leaving the site it‚Äôs great for families friends and couples alike!
Please help yourselves to chicken eggs. The chickens are beyond the car park through the opening onto the fields.
Not far from the chickens are a family of goats. They like being fed vegetables fruit even bananas!.
Walk past the past the goats follow the path down to the river and take a riverside walk either way along the public foot paths.
The horses do not belong to the farm and are looked after by their owners who come daily to see them. Please do not feed the horses but they are always happy for a stroke on the nose and a hello.
Next to the chickens is the poly tunnel and when there is fresh produce you‚Äôll find some in your welcome pack and can refill this when there is plenty. Feeling green fingered?
The grounds of the farm are always in need to something so feel free to help us keep the farm looking lovely. Whether that be a bit of weeding dead heading or just advice we will welcome any help!
All around this field are many blackberry bushes please help yourselves when they are ripe.
There are other tenants on the farm that either live with us in the converted barns or just let a stable and field. They are all very nice and always happy to answer any questions!

Title: Rural retreat in the sticks.
Description:
Spa complex with indoor swimming pool jacuzzi & Tennis Astro Court. For parties and families wanting relaxed & civilised luxury stays. Wonderful walking cycling and country pubs local babysitter spa lady.
Cheltenham Festivals Worcestershire and Gloucestershire The space The space
This is a perfect place to work from with strong wifi and peaceful areas. Please contact me for great deals on longer bookings.
Spa complex with an indoor swimming pool jacuzzi & Astro Court (Tennis & Football). The cottage is set within 80 acres at the edge of the Cotswolds and at the foot of Bredon Hill with beautiful walks scenery and country pubs.
Our family home is adjacent and the property has an Astro Court (Tennis Court April - Oct Football pitch Nov - March) Indoor Swimming Pool Steam room and Jacuzzi which you are welcome to use. The Pool and Spa are attached to the cottage so you don‚Äôt have to go outside to access it and can come down in your dressing gowns to relax and swim. and it is specifically for your use as guests in the cottage and for our family only there are no other properties with access to the Spa which makes it a unique luxury stay! The cottage has its own garden facing out onto fields and beautiful views. We are a family with 3 young children and have designed this cottage as an ideal holiday cottage which we would want to stay in - comfort luxury but practical living with lots of activities to do to keep everyone happy - Swimming Tennis Walking (Bredon Hill The Malverns) Cycling Football Pub and Farm Shop Eating Culture & Shopping (Shakespeare country 40 mins Broadway 15 mins Cheltenham 40 mins) We are 20 minutes from Cheltenham Race Course with room to land a helicopter if required and 40 minutes from Soho Farmhouse.
If you give us details about your group and / or family we will cater your stay towards you and make every effort to provide extras such as toys games bikes baby equipment etc to help you bring less and enjoy your stay more. We are happy to help you organise babysitters spa treatments etc.
The master bedroom and 2nd bedroom can either be used with twin beds or Super King. All sheets are 300 thread 100% cotton.
If you are a slightly larger group - dependent on your make up we are able to offer 2 more beds available in the property. (e.g. family of 5 plus grandparents).
As per the house rules one well behaved dog in the uncarpeted areas per party. Dependent on the make up of the party we may on occasions allow a 2nd dog but this needs to be approved in writing before you book the property.
This is the perfect place to come and cycle - mountain or racing bikes and we have a secure lock up to keep your bikes.

Finally although our set up offers something similar to a boutique hotel offering - we are not a hotel and the cottage is part of our home and should be treated as such we do the cleaning and changeovers ourselves and expect you to leave the cottage as you found it.

If you are looking for more of a spoiling hotel type stay and would rather have other people clear up after yourselves then we can recommend a lovely hotel called Dormy House just down the road in Broadway. Guest access Guest access
Our family home is adjacent and the property has an Astro Court Indoor Swimming Pool Jacuzzi and Steam Room which you are welcome to use.
The Astro Tennis Court is accessible via the back of the house without having to go through our private garden. Other things to note Other things to note
Check in is any time from 3pm - please whats app your eta when you are on your way so that we can try and be here to welcome you.

Check out is before 10am on the day of your departure.

If you or any of your party are showing any symptoms of Coronavirus please cancel your booking. Please take COVID tests before you arrive at Well Furlong to ensure that you are negative.

The Cottage and Spa are deep cleaned between each party of guests. The chemical levels in the pool and jacuzzi are checked daily using high strength chemicals. Before and after we clean everything is sprayed with antibacterial solution including all handles door knobs tv. remote keys key pads etc. We operate a self check in and out following advice on social distancing.

Title: Beautiful barn in the hills and woods nr Brighton
Description:
Welcome to our lovely home with indoor tropically heated swimming pool and hot tub - Situated within a 15 minute walk or a 2 minute car drive from the Goodwood estate. We have 3 en-suite bedrooms and 2 smaller rooms - 4 bathrooms and masses of parking. The house is set in the historic village of Boxgrove with great walks and a pub with a lovely warm fire. Ideal for a short break.

We also have a small room suitable for two at our annexe in Strettington - Look for Goodwood Barn on Airbnb The space The space
The house is perfect for a get away - We have an indoor security covered swimming pool heated to 30 degrees and hot tub and luxury bathrooms with power showers.

The house as 5/6 bedrooms with 3 double ensuite bedrooms with shower and/bath. Additional shower room and loo downstairs.

TV in large sitting room and conservatory large American fridge and open fire in sitting room. Garden has BBQ and ample seating.

Driveway for 6 cars - Electronically Gated and secure

Outside there is a BBQ and Outdoor seating

Nearby attractions :-

- Tennis - 3 minute drive Our private house has its own private Tennis court for your use at any time during your stay

- Goodwood Aerodrome - 2 minute drive - Fly a spitfire or take a pleasure flight around the Isle of Wight

- Goodwood Motor circuit - 2 minute drive - Take your car around the historic track. The only original track in the world

- Goodwood Golf - 1 minute drive - Two high quality courses and driving range

- Goodwood Races 5 minute drive - The premier flat raving in the country

- Goodwood House - 2 minute drive. A fine example of a blend of Jacobean and Edwardian architecture - The Seat of the Duke of Richmond. Take afternoon tea there!

Tinwood Vinyard - 2 minutes - try our very own local fizz with regular tasting and cheese afternoons - Not to be missed!

- West Wittering Beach - 20 minutes the UK‚Äôs finest sandy beach

We have another property just down the road in Strettington. - See Goodwood Barn with Tennis Guest access Guest access
Swimming Pool hot tub gated home Other things to note Other things to note
Its a brilliant place to be so near Goodwood with a super pub up the road! The Anglesey Arms is not to be missed for their food is awesome!

Title: Gamekeeper's Cottage, near Sissinghurst Castle
Description:
Set within the grounds of our Georgian Manor house The Pool House provides a wonderful retreat for those looking to escape to the country whilst being a short drive from the seaside town of Sidmouth and nearby city of Exeter. The Pool House has just been renovated (May 2021) to a very high specification providing spacious contemporary accommodation with use of heated outdoor swimming pool (June to September) and sauna. The space The space
Guests will love the modern comfortable decor in the Pool House. Downstairs offers a great opportunity to drink your morning coffee at the kitchen bar enjoying the vaulted ceilings and natural light from the bifolding doors leading straight onto the pool area. A huge walk in shower marble counters complete the newly renovated bathroom. Upstairs is a very cosy living area and bedroom with magical views over the church and fields opposite. Guest access Guest access
Guests are welcome to enjoy the pool area (shared) and the front gardens. The rear gardens are not for guests use other than when accessing the Pool House. Other things to note Other things to note
The kitchen area includes a 2 ring induction hob and microwave for cooking. It does not have a oven or dishwasher.

Title: The Acorn - Deep cleaned and FLEXIBLE C-19 changes
Description:
Wraysbury is a beautiful village. Ideally located for Heathrow Windsor Ascot and mainline trains to London (45 mins)
LEGOLAND Thorpe Park and Chessington.

Our apartment is walking distance of all village faclities and the station is a 15 min walk.

The property offers exclusive use of the pool during summer months.

The property has 1 double bedroom open living area with smart TV incl Amazon Prime and Netflix and modern kitchen with granite worktops with views of the pool and gardens. The space The space
IMPORTANT

Hot tub
For new bookings from 12th March 2022 for March and April 2022. Charges for use for jacuzzi will be payable upon arrival.

Charges will be ¬£30 per overnight stay use from 8.00am to midnight.

24 hours notice required to ensure water is 38-40oC on arrival.


We do not allow parties of any type and do not tolerate bad behaviour or excessive noise.

*** New Inflatable hot tub area open from 1st October - End April*** The hot tub is then closed and the pool opened.


Pool open 1st May - closes 30th September. The pool is heated but heating is only switched on when outside temperatures are in the late teens. For further information please refer to guess access.


The apartment has a modern interior and layout. Comprising a large open plan living dining and kitchen space. One double bedroom with double bed and compact en-suite bathroom with modern shower basin & WC.

It is ideally suited to accomadate 2 adults or 2 adults & 2 children The children would sleep on the very large corner sofa (see pics) or a folding bed can be provided.
Maximum 3 adults or 2 adults and 2 children.

Facilities include a 55 inch smart tv Netflix and free view channels blue tooth sound system and free access to the Internet. A modern kitchen with hob microwave combination and granite work tops crockery etc.
Thermostaticly controlled electric heating throughout. Bedding and towels provided.
Please look at our photos for more details.

Please note due to close proximity to Heathrow. Guests may incur aeroplane noise. Guest access Guest access
Guests have exclusive use of our heated outdoor swimming pool during the summer months (May-September) and exclusive e cross to the hot tub during from October to end April) (local charges apply). Use of all the facilities within the barn to prepare meals and make yourself comfortable. All we ask is that you respect the fixtures and fittings so that they are in as good a condition for the next guest as you found them during your stay. Other things to note Other things to note
We do not allow parties of any type and do not tolerate bad behaviour or excessive noise.

Title: Stansted Airport - Luxury Annexe with Parking
Description:
This really is the most beautiful of getaways - The space is beautifully decorated cosy and clean.
Easily accessible under 2 miles from junction 27 M5 and Tiverton Parkway.
Musicians and Writers find this a useful retreat to work in.
Dogs are not allowed in the bnb but they are welcome to stay with our dogs in the lobby next to the bnb where they can be as wet and muddy as they please just so long as they are well behaved. The space The space
Although it is easily accessible we are in the heart of the countryside surrounded by farmland. There are no street lights so the stars look wonderful most nights.
The pool has a swim pump that was developed for Olympic swimmers so it can be fierce - or as gentle as you like. There is a boat building workshop on the premises and I am about to renovate the old stable so there is usually something going on though you have your private space with a garden. There are plenty of herbs growing and I have labelled most of them so do help yourselves. Guest access Guest access
You have the annex and there is a private garden just for guests. Other things to note Other things to note
If you would like to bring your dog please contact me. Your dog can stay in the lobby next to the annex with my dogs (or I can put my dogs in my kitchen) or in a stable or your car under shelter if they prefer.
If you want to bring a horse I have separate stables paddocks and an arena. You will need to contact me to make arrangements and I would prefer it if you could visit first.

Title: Charming cottage with stunning views -dog friendly
Description:
Courage Cottage is a two bedroom detached barn conversion in a Georgian farmyard.The barn was converted in 2013 so has all modern conveniences including underfloor heating. It is very individual and situated in a quietrural setting. It has two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms. The village of Martinstown has an excellent pub shop and Post Office. Dorchester is 2 miles away and has every facility including good rail connections in all directions.Swimming pool (shared ) open May to Sept. The space The space
This quiet valley in an Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty is located between Dorchester and Weymouth and therefore within easy reach of shops restaurants museums and the numerous seaside activities available in and around Weymouth. The Abbotsbury Swannery and gardens are within easy reach as are many footpaths leading to the coast as well as the many remote beaches reached situated along the famous Jurassic Coastline which is a World Heritage Site. The properties are in the old farmyard and reached down a private road and therefore well away from traffic.

Golf: Several Golf courses within a few miles in stunning scenery Guest access Guest access
The heated swimming pool is available form May 1st to September 30th. We can‚Äôt guarantee it will be available outside of these times.
Guests are free to enjoy the old walled garden which is a quiet secluded haven. Other things to note Other things to note
The second bedroom has a steep spiral staircase which is perfectly accessible but not for anyone who is a little unsteady on their feet.
The swimming pool is only shared with owners who use it rarely. It is outdoor and open from May to September only.

Title: Luxurious Shepherds Hut + Private Garden & Views
Description:
Priors Mesne Coach House is a converted open plan loft barn space romantically located on a secluded farm estate half a mile down a lime tree avenue and 100 yards from the main house. Breathtaking views over the Severn it is the perfect get away for a couple (plus dog) with easy access to walking and cycling in the Wye Valley and Forest of Dean or canoeing on the Wye. Dog walking and a picnic table are available in the adjacent field and there is a boules pitch with small terrace and seating. The space The space
The Coach House living space is located on the first floor accessed by an external stone staircase. The accommodation is open plan with far reaching views over the estuary. A cosy sitting room area equipped with log burner TV DVD and a large sofa and daybed. There is a candle lit dining table adjacent to a king size bed in the sleeping area with another TV and DVD. Micro kitchen for cooking heating small meals with oven sink 4 hobs microwave fridge freezer kettle toaster and kitchen utensils cutlery plates etc. There is a separate bathroom with toilet bath and shower. Guest access Guest access
- Outside seating on Boules pitch garden
- Dog walking field with picnic table
- Tennis by arrangement
- Swimming by arrangement (Mid May until beginning of September ) Other things to note Other things to note
There are long walks from the house as the Gloucestershire Way runs along the wood above.
We provide in the kitchen some bread milk eggs filter and instant coffee tea and sugar for your arrival as well as a basket of logs and kindling. More logs can be bought at the petrol station on the A48 in Alvington.

Title: Idyllic Shepherd's Hut near Chieveley
Description:
Edge of village converted stable at Flos Cottages for 2 only 2K from town countryside setting with rural views. A bolthole for couples with countryside walks from the doorstep.

A fully equipped kitchen living area shower room and indoor heated pool.

Enjoy the patio in the evening sun enjoy the views or grab a blanket snuggle up & enjoy a beautiful starry evening after a day out exploring the local countryside & coastline. The space The space
Only 10 minutes from the A303 but utterly peaceful The Little Stable is tucked away down a quiet country lane on the edge of picturesque East Coker only a mile from Yeovil. There are 2 pubs in walking distance (20 minute stroll) and plenty of excellent places to eat nearby and the beautiful Jurassic coast only half an hour away.

The heated indoor pool is just a few steps away with access reserved for Stable guests 9am-1pm. At 13 metres long it‚Äôs enough to get a few laps in!

Please note The Little Stable is not suitable for babies toddlers or children. It is what it says on the tin so if you‚Äôre after something palatial The Little Stable might not be what you‚Äôre looking for!Guest access
