Title: The Wendy House a 1960s chalet by the sea
Description:
The Pool House is a contemporary spacious private hideaway perfect for a romantic getaway or just a stay to explore the surrounding area. Styled with a shabby chic vibe.

THE SPACE IS ONLY SUITABLE FOR TWO ADULTS & TWO CHILDREN AGE 12 AND UNDER

NEW FROM MARCH 22 A LUXURY HOT TUB SPA IS NOW AVAILABLE ALL YEAR ROUND.

PLEASE NOTE THE POOL & POOL AREA IS CLOSED FROM OCTOBER TO THE 29th OF APRIL 22The space
Set behind private electric gates and within the grounds of a large converted barn The Pool House is completely self contained it has a king size bed with a very comfortable Emma mattress.

A dining table and 4 chairs a comfortable sofa bed for extra accommodation for children a dressing table and mirror with a hair dryer in the drawer. A dressing mirror with a hanging rail. It has heating and air conditioning.

The wide screen smart television can be used to watch channels with your own login details via the WiFi. Also you will have use of a blue tooth speaker and a Pure digital radio.

The space has a door leading to a kitchenette with a fridge freezer a James Martin electric table top grill that will cook bacon eggs sausages chicken breast salmon vegetables etc a microwave oven grill.
Toaster kettle Nespresso coffee machine cafeti√®re slow cooker crockery cutlery water & wine glasses. Complimentary tea milk & coffee pods sugar salt & pepper.
Separate door leading to the WC.

Walk through doorway leading to the stunning shower room with complimentary use of premium toiletries.

Finally a door leading out to the swimming pool area which has its own large cushioned seating area. It has a bar area with stools and a table and chairs. Sun loungers and various floats.

THIS DOOR WILL BE LOCKED FROM OCTOBER TO APRIL.

The owner cannot accept any liability for using the pool area. Guests use it entirely at their own risk!

Extras
Breakfast can be arranged by prior arrangement with the host who offers a Continental or a full English breakfast for an additional cost.
We can also provide delicious sharing boards.
Special occasions can be catered for by prior arrangement.

Check in anytime after 3pm Check out by 11am Early and late check in available at small extra charge.

Access to the Pool house can be gained by a key safe next to the entrance gates which will contain a gate fob and keys to the Pool House.

The host lives on site and will be available for any help or advice. Guest access Guest access
The pool house is completely self contained set in a private area away from the main house.
It has security lighting around the building with secure parking adjacent to the property.

Guests will have access to their own outdoor area with a table and chairs fire pit and barbecue with far reaching views of the beautiful surrounding countryside. The hosts horses use the paddock next to the Pool House.


From the beginning of May to the end of September guests will have direct access from the kitchenette to the heated swimming pool.

The pool will have shared access with the hosts at separate times. The host is very flexible arranging private access. The hosts own garden sides on to the pool area but the hot tub and bar area does have partial natural screening and is not overlooked from the hosts house. However the pool seating area can be seen from the hosts house as shown in the photos of the pool seating area.

Please note the pool is not suitable for anyone unable to swim with the exception of babes in arms!

Towels are provided but please bring your own swimming towels?

No glass is allowed in the pool area but plastic glasses will be provided.

We are animal lovers and have 5 dogs and 3 horses and 2 miniature Shetland ponies on site. They love fuss and attention. Please be aware that horses may walk past from 8.30am when they are taken out riding. Also the dogs can be vocal at times but they are quiet most of the time.

One well behaved dog is allowed (possibly two but please request first subject to size?) but strictly dogs are not allowed on the furniture or bed please! Dogs must also be kept on a lead in the pool area and the open area outside of The Pool house because of the horses!

Please be mindful that staying within the vicinity of horses dogs and farm animals there are associated noises of being in the countryside! Other things to note Other things to note
Please note that the pool and the pool area will be closed from October to May!

Title: Ash Log Cabin -Sleeps 4 - Hot Tub - in Suffolk
Description:
Pitfield apartment is in a lovely old village. We are in-between Exeter and Taunton. Easy access from M5. Exeter offers shopping restaurants cathedral and scenic quay area with lots to do. We are very close to The Grand Western canal which provide some pretty walks or bike rides. Near the Blackdown Hills the coast is about a 35-minute drive away. Great place to explore beaches too. They are lots of lovely pubs to walk or cycle too. As well as the countryside. Breakfast provided. The space The space
It is in a lovely old village with lots of country pubs nearby. It‚Äôs a very peaceful and safe area. It‚Äôs a lovely beamed room with double bed and sofa bed suitable for two children to share. Or one adult. We also have a travel cot available. A kitchen with small fridge and combi microwave. A bathroom with shower. Guest access Guest access
You will have access to a very sunny courtyard and use of an indoor heated pool (times restricted). We have lessons taking place at various times during the day.
On arrival you can book slots to use the pool. You may book as many as you like but just not back to back.
Please note the courtyard and pool is shared with one other apartment. Other things to note Other things to note
Slippers bath robes and pool towels are provided for your use during your stay. Please note - there is a two-night booking minimum.

Title: Misty's Place in a lovely peaceful setting
Description:
Bluebell Beach is a luxury 2 Bed 2 Bath lodge in a tranquil and peaceful destination sited on the 5* Hoburne Park with beautiful beaches and the New Forest on your doorstep but all the fun for the family with the onsite facilities. The space The space
Our 36\ x 20\ Pathfinder lodge is located in stunning Christchurch on 5* Hoburne Park and designed to make those precious moments for relaxation priceless. A time to unwind is a luxury in itself nowadays that‚Äôs why from its bedroom suites to living quarters this two bedroom luxury lodge is the perfect solution. There is parking adjacent to the lodge.

As a self-catering lodge you\ll find everything you need for a perfect stay. The kitchen has a fridge freezer gas hob with 4 burners and electric oven a toaster kettle with complimentary tea coffee sugar a dishwasher washing machine and microwave. The lodge is a perfect place to relax and offers a 50 Smart HDTV in the lounge a 32 HDTV in the master bedroom a 19 tv in the twin bedroom.

This lodge has 2 bedrooms and can comfortably sleep 4. In the first bedroom you will find a king size double bed. The second bedroom contains 2 6 x 3 ft single beds.

There are 2 bathrooms. The first bathroom is ensuite has a toilet and sink and a walk-in shower. The second bathroom has a toilet and sink and a bath with shower hose.

There are also essentials a hair dryer an iron mini ironing board and clothes dryer to make your stay more comfortable.

All bed linen bathroom towels kitchen towels oven gloves are provided.

* You will need to provide your own beach / swimming towels *

HOUSE RULES:

- Check-in time is 3:00pm and check-out is 10am unless agreed prior with host
- Smoking is not allowed anywhere inside or outside on the decking area.
- Sorry pets are not allowed at the property.
- The washing machine /dishwasher are included for your use.


LOCATION:

Bluebell 22 is located in a quiet spacious area close to the main facilities of Hoburne Park in Christchurch Dorset. Just a 10 min walk to Friar‚Äôs Cliff beach it is also only 10 mins drive to The New Forest. Nearby golf courses include Highcliffe Brockenhurst Manor Barton-on-Sea The New Forest Golf Club and Remedy Oak and are all in easy driving distance.

The lodge is perfect for families and couples alike due to it‚Äôs location you can choose to get involved with the park‚Äôs activities or be left to enjoy the peace and quiet.

On-site facilities include: two heated swimming pools (indoor and outdoor - summer months only) gym mini-golf bars outdoor playgrounds for toddlers and older children a multi games area boules court restaurant cafe indoor play area arcade and entertainment venue.

Temporary Membership passes for access to the clubhouse activities entertainment etc are available. The cost is ¬£50 and this gives up to 6 people access for up to 7 nights or ¬£25 for 1 day. We require 72 hours notice to process the passes which are collected from reception. Please contact the Hosts for more details.

Access to the beach at Steamer Point and Mudeford Quay are also within walking distance. Sainsbury‚Äôs Waitrose Lidl and Aldi are all nearby and there‚Äôs a local Spar is located just outside of the park boundary for that emergency pint of milk! Nearby attractions include the New Forest Beaulieu Swanage Durdle Door Bournemouth Monkey World as well as some fantastic pubs and restaurants including The Waterloo Arms James & White The Noisy Lobster The Boathouse and the Kings Arms Hotel to name just a few!

Highcliffe Castle the Isle of Wight and the quaint port town of Lymington are all well within reach.

LODGE FACILITIES INCLUDE:

‚Ä¢ Adjacent parking for several cars ‚Ä¢ Large private decking area ‚Ä¢ Rattan decking furniture with seat/back cushions ‚Ä¢ Linen & towels provided for master and twin room ‚Ä¢ LG 50 HD Smart TV in living area (Netflix Amazon Prime YouTube) ‚Ä¢ Sound Bar for tv and your own device connection ‚Ä¢ Electric real effect fire in lounge ‚Ä¢ King size bed in master bedroom wardrobe and storage ‚Ä¢ En-suite shower room and toilet off master bedroom ‚Ä¢ LG 32 HD TV in master bedroom ‚Ä¢ Hairdryer ‚Ä¢ Twin room with two 6 x 3ft single beds wardrobe ‚Ä¢ Family bathroom with toilet and bath ‚Ä¢ Washing machine ‚Ä¢ Kettle (tea coffee and sugar provided) ‚Ä¢ toaster ‚Ä¢ Microwave ‚Ä¢ Dishwasher (rinse aid/dishwasher salt is monitored and refilled on changeover day) ‚Ä¢ gas hob electric oven and grill ‚Ä¢ Fridge ‚Ä¢ Freezer ‚Ä¢ saucepans and oven trays ‚Ä¢ Kitchen utensils ‚Ä¢ Crockery ‚Ä¢ Cutlery ‚Ä¢ Dining table & 4 chairs ‚Ä¢ Gas central heating

PLEASE NOTE: Although we‚Äôre happy for babies and infants to enjoy the lodge too we do not supply cots or high chairs. Of course please feel free to bring your own. Guest access Guest access
Parking adjacent to lodge
Park facilities very close by

Local bus service outside park or short walk away
Nearest mainline station Hinton Admiral 1.4m away with access to Bournemouth Poole Southampton etc.

Title: Shepherd's Hut, Off-Grid, Hot Tub and Beacons View
Description:
Part of the idyllic Bleets Farm Private Estate Silverwood Coach House offers the perfect countryside stay. Remote enough for quiet walks in acres of adjacent land but still only a few miles from the award-winning town Frome. Also Longleat Bath Wells & Glastonbury are a short drive from Silverwood Coach House. This makes an ideal hub for an action packed break. If time to unwind is just what you need you can kick back and relax in the countryside.

Check pool availability prior to booking. The space The space
Silverwood Coach House is a brand-new holiday cottage situated on the Bleets Farm Estate. In direct view of the main house the Coach House is above the quadruple garage with nobody below (so no risk of being disturbed). With ample free parking and a garden seating area amongst fruit trees youll be sure to have the perfect stay.

Inside at one end you have the open-plan lounge/kitchen area which is spacious and modern with a brand-new fitted kitchen. The master bedroom with a luxurious double bed and en-suite is at the opposite end of the Coach House. In between there is another bedroom with 2 low small single beds and a family bathroom; equipped with a sunken bath and shower.

If you would like a disposal BBQ we keep some onsite at ¬£5.00 each. Please message if you would like one so we can arrange payment.

Free use of our private heated indoor pool however please ensure you check the availability prior to booking as it is not always available.Guest access
Upon arrival there is a short private drive with an exclusive free private car park suitable for 4 cars. There is a short gravel walkway to the right of the electric gates through a small orchard and under an archway onto the main drive where you will arrive right next your accommodation. The painted grey door is your front door.

Title: Chanctonbury View SHEPHERDS HUT with hot tub
Description:
Located within the family (and pet) friendly Lower Mill Estate on the River Thames The Plovers offers guests a spacious 3 bedroom property with a large private garden. Outdoor shared heated pool and sauna access year-round. On site there are lakes with boating access (non-motorised) fishing tennis courts playgrounds trails bike and boat rental shop including an on-site restaurant and shop. The estate is located in a protected nature reserve with many miles of hikes and trails to explore. The space The space
Ground Floor
- Spacious living room with lots of seating and a wood burning fireplace
- 50 inch smart TV Blu-ray/DVD player with assortment of films for children and adults
- Large extendable dining table
- Large kitchen with an assortment of cooking tools and spices
- Utility room washing machine and separate dryer

First floor
- Master Bedroom with king bed large closet lovely views over lake full ensuite bathroom with rain shower and bath tub sofa chair which converts to a single bed (great for children)
- Second Bedroom with king bed and ensuite bathroom with shower
- Third bedroom with 2 single beds full family bathroom the hall

Large outdoor garden with back and side patio with views of the Thames and Mill lake. Weber charcoal BBQ.

Title: The Retreat
Description:
Settings don‚Äôt come much more idyllic than The Cove and Curlew 3 is a bright open plan property with a stylish design throughout. The open plan living space makes the perfect spot to sit back with a book and enjoy the sea views and if you step out onto the private decked terrace you can breathe in the fresh air straight from the sea below the resort.
Stunning coastal views from a large balcony with dining table & chairs and gas BBQ

Please note: Due to Coronavirus social distancing measures the pool may be closed during your visit.

Sea views and balcony access from both the lounge and master bedroom
1 double master bedroom 1 twin bedroom
Heated open air Swimming Pool - open end of May to mid-September
Luxury kitchen with clothes washer dryer and dishwasher
Cool sleek modern design and top quality furnishings
Wi-Fi
Rear games room with table football air hocky & pool
On site dedicated parking space
Quality bed linen & towels included
No smoking
No pets
Short breaks from 2 nights available most of the year

If the sea air has the whole family feeling ravenous the open plan dining space makes a bright space for that relaxed family meal and just off the kitchen is a games room with an additional freezer and storage space. When your beds beckon you‚Äôll find the master bedroom has access to the terrace so you can step out in the morning and watch the sun rise while you plan your day‚Äôs adventures. The second bedroom has twin beds so Curlew 3‚Äôs perfect for a family break in South Devon.

The Cove‚Äôs one of those resorts that blends into the landscape so you can truly experience Devon life. The outdoor heated swimming pool (open mid May to mid September) makes a refreshing sight on a summer‚Äôs day and for the walkers the South West Coast Path runs right past taking visitors past some of the region‚Äôs most striking scenery.

A dedicated onsite parking space close to your apartment is included as is wi-fi access to the heated open air swimming pool (summer only) quality bed linen & towels and all utilities.

Short breaks of 2 nights or more are available at most times except summer school holidays.

Living Room/Area
Open plan with the kitchen and dining area
Access to the terrace
Two sofas seating four
Smart TV with Netflix etc. DVD player and Bluetooth speaker
Selection of board games & DVDs

Games Area
Games room off the kitchen with triple games table (air hockey pool & table football) additional freezer and storage space

Kitchen/Utility
Open plan with the living and dining area
Single electric oven with halogen hob and integrated grill
Microwave fridge/freezer dishwasher washing machine and tumble dryer

Dining Room/Area
Open plan with the kitchen and living area
Table and seating for four

Master Bedroom
Access to the terrace
Double bed built in wardrobe and chest of drawers
Flatscreen TV with Freeview

Bedroom 2
Twin beds and built in wardrobe
Flatscreen TV with Freeview

Family Bathroom
Features a bath with shower over wash basin and WC

Large decked terrace area
Table and four chairs
Gas barbeque

Communal outdoor swimming pool seasonal opening from May till mid September. The pool opening times are from 10am to 7pm

Allocated parking for one car in the on-site car park
Additional visitor parking is available on a first-come-first-served basis

Title: Cosy log cabin with log burner, bikes and hot tub
Description:
Whitmoor Farm Whitmoor Lane GU47QB is in the heart of Surrey in Sutton Green between the towns of Woking and Guildford. Beautiful and relaxing two bedroom two bathroom pool house with loads of charm. Very cosy living room overlooking the sparkling blue swimming pool. The pool is not heated but great in the summer. The Farm also offers a tennis court and trampoline. Unfortunately we do not allow visitors to guests for security reasons. Only booked guests allowed on site. The space The space
Two bedrooms with King size beds. Two bathrooms one with a shower and one with a bath. Ideal for two couples or a small family. Located between Guildford and Woking towns. Guest access Guest access
The Pool and tennis court is shared with 3 other units on the farm but there‚Äôs loads of space for everyone. The pool is not heated but great in the summer Other things to note Other things to note
We supply a few coffee PODs for the Nespresso machine and dishwasher tablets as a starter pack but please bring some with you for your stay.

Title: Makins Lodge (3 bed)
Description:
Escape to a secluded retreat within the National Trusts Hindhead Commons and Devils Punch Bowl only an hours drive from London. Enjoy local nature in extreme privacy. The house is set in beautiful surroundings with a large garden with swimming pool and a walled garden with outdoor fireplace for magical evenings. The house offers rustic English charm for the perfect country getaway. From the property there is direct access to the national park for walking hiking plus many cycle tracks. The space The space
The house is full of rustic charm. There are many books curiosities and snug reading corners in the large lounge overlooking the garden. There is a formal and informal dining room with dinnerware and glasses to match and a downstairs WC. There is an office area with a BT Smart Hub 2 with Wi-Fi Disc allowing Wi-Fi connection throughout the property and the formal and informal dining rooms can be used as further office spaces or breakout areas. The fully equipped kitchen comes with two ovens one conventional and an Aga style oven with hotplate plus a large fridge/freezer microwave dishwasher and walk in larder fully stocked with dishes and gadgets for cooking and baking. Through the kitchen is the utility/boot room with washing machine dryer detergents ironing board and iron plus access to the garden. Upstairs there are 5 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with one being en-suite to the master bedroom both bathrooms have power showers shampoo conditioner and shower gel. There are three fireplaces in the house one open fireplace in the lounge a wood stove in the formal dining room and an outdoor open fireplace in the walled garden. There are also three TVs in the house; the one in the lounge has a Amazon Fire Stick and DVD player there is also one in the informal dining room with a DVD player and one upstairs in the master bedroom which has a built in DVD player. Outside there is a beautiful garden with wysterias a large lawn benches to sit to watch the local nature and an outdoor unheated swimming pool. Private pool is available for use from April to September for an additional fee. *Pool closed for Winter* At the back of the house is the walled garden; a beautiful secluded area with a water feature gas BBQ and outdoor fireplace. There is private parking with room for 4 vehicles.

The house is the most perfect venue for a special occasion staycation work-from-home alternative or as a remote working office for small businesses. The house is not ideal for wild parties as we are in a quiet neighbourhood surrounded by a national park.

Due to the recent pandemic we would like to reassure you that the house is professionally cleaned and we are taking extra care to disinfect frequently touched surfaces and provide alcohol gel in the house for our guests.

Title: Chalet La Romance, 10min Reims, 1 bedroom, jacuzzi
Description:
Luxury newly renovated 2 bedroom coach house set in the grounds of a Georgian Manor House with its own private gardens and duck pond over looking the National Trust Tithe Barn.

The Coach House is within walking distance of the quaint village of Bredon which boasts 2 pubs a village shop and playground. Bredon is ideally located for Malvern Cheltenham and the Racecourse Worcester and the rest of the Cotswolds.

The Owners live in the Manor House so are at hand for any questions. The space The space
Decorated in a classic and restful style this home away from home features carefully sourced artworks and antiques.

The Master Bedroom is situated on the first floor along with the main bathroom which has a large shower and a large free-standing bath and luxury toiletries from Bramley Products are supplied for you to enjoy during your stay. At the top of the spiral staircase there is a charming reading nook with a large comfy armchair and plenty of natural light. The downstairs bedroom can be arranged as a twin or superking with ziplink mattresses.

The cosy sitting room is perfect for relaxing in after a long day out or for lazy weekends. The kitchen is well stocked with seating for 4 people and there is the added bonus of a large utility room with washer/dryer and butlers sink for cleaning up after muddy walks. There is an additional shower room on the ground floor.

One well behaved dog is welcome to join you we will even provide a dog bed and luxury toiletries for your four legged friend as well!

The mature garden is an ideal sun trap and there are 4 sun loungers provided as well as a BBQ and outdoor seating. You will be able to enjoy use of the large swimming pool (May to September) shared with the owners who rarely use it during the week and luxury pool towels are provided for your stay.

Title: Snowdonia Shepherds Hut + Hot Tub FIVE STAR*****
Description:
Our holiday home is situated on the lovely Rockley Park in Poole Dorset. Great for families or anyone looking for a relaxing break away. The caravan is a short less than 5 minute walk from the amenities which include a number of restaurants a pool with waterslides rock climbing and lots of activities for the kids. The park has its own private beach along with water sports and sun loungers and is great in the summer. Entertainment passes can be purchased at reception when you arrive. The space The space
Our holiday home sleeps 6 with 2 bedrooms and a sofa bed. The kitchen is fully equipped and outside you will find a parking space (along with additional spaces elsewhere)outdoor seating and space for the kids to play. Other things to note Other things to note
Rockley Park has lots of activities and entertainment available all of which can be booked at reception on arrival. Message me when booking for more info and the play pass form which needs to be filled out in order to book activities!
Please note most of of the facilities are shut in November & December. If you are looking to go for a swim with the kids in these months the Dolphin Leisure Centre in Poole has a pool and a sauna or if not I‚Äôd be happy to recommend places a little further away :)

Title: Romantic hillside hideaway with outstanding views
Description:
Gavenny Cottage is a self contained annex that has an enclosed private courtyard and a private outdoor swimming pool that guests can use from 26th April - 30th September 2021. ***THE POOL IS CLOSED OUTSIDE OF THESE DATES FOR AUTUM/WINTER.***

Situated on the edge of Abergavenny town with views of the Blorenge Gavenny Cottage is the perfect little base for any walking cycling or foodie break away.

Inside you will find everything you need for a comfortable stay. The space The space
The property is modern inside and has an equipped kitchen wi-fi smart TV comfy seating and dining area and a large bedroom upstairs with extra seating.

We have an electric stove heater washing machine iron and ironing board.

We have two enclosed outdoor areas: a small private patio with seating and a raised patio with an outdoor swimming pool. The pool is 24 foot long and is 3 foot deep at one end and 6 foot deep at the other. It is open to our guests from 26th April through to 30th September but it is closed during autumn/winter.

Covid-confident stay

We want our guests to have a very enjoyable relaxing stay at Gavenny Cottage. We have all been living through a very stressful time so we want to remove as much worry as possible for your stay. Therefore we have introduced the following important changes to protect you and all of our guests staff and community and to help minimise the risk of contracting and spreading coronavirus:
- Enhanced cleaning on top of our already meticulous standards
- Extra cleaning supplies and hand sanitizer/soap and available inside the cottage
- Socially distanced check-in and out with no-contact key collection
- Amended check-in and out times (check-in: 3pm and check-out: 10am)
- Keys are disinfected before your arrival and Gavenny Cottage is not entered after its deep clean

We are constantly monitoring and adapting to the most uptodate government advice and our changes and new rules will be constantly revised and are subject to change with government advice and best practices.

Title: THE HIDE AWAY "White Rock Ranch
Description:
Our beautiful Shepherds Hut located within our gardens is a unique self-catering accommodation with interior and exterior design to a high specification. Set in seven acres of grounds and surrounded by delightful countryside Manor Barn is a special place to spend your holiday.
Bedroom with a quality double bed.
Open plan living area with a fully equipped kitchen
Bathroom with a shower.
Use of the 12 metre indoor heated Swimming Pool with Jacuzzi and Sauna
Patio and landscaped Gardens. The space The space
Surrounded by the Cotswolds and Malvern Hills yet conveniently located close to the historic towns of Cheltenham Spa Tewkesbury Gloucester and Malvern.
This fully equipped accommodation has an open plan living area consisting of a bedroom with a quality double bed living dining and kitchen area. The kitchen has an oven and a hob. The en suite bathroom has a shower. The living area has a Smart TV and WiFi.
You have your own space with views across the garden to the horse paddocks. Outside there is a decked terrace area to sit round at the end of the day and relax whilst making plans for the rest of your stay!
The accommodation features use an onsite heated indoor swimming pool jacuzzi and sauna patio and beautiful grounds. There is a barbecue and a fire pit.
Manor Barn is close to ancient sites including Neolithic barrows hillforts and Roman remains. You are near to the Cotswold Way so if you like walking you can follow one of the walks from the National Trail which can be downloaded from their website. The Malvern Hills are also nearby which also provide pleasant walks and spectacular views. The River Severn is also a short walk away.

Title: Jed's Shed - Little Country Houses SS
Description:
Nestled in the stunning Wye Valley May Hill View barn offers a relaxing and fun break. Whilst at May Hill View barn you can enjoy our indoor heated pool (march to September) and outdoor hot tub. You can also use the garden and paddock for a quiet afternoon or a game of rounders. May Hill View barn is also in easy reach of many great days out including the Wye Valley Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty (5 mins) and the Forest of Dean (20 mins). The space The space
May Hill View is a self-contained converted barn and you will have the entire place you yourself. It has two bedrooms and sleeps four.


May Hill View is adjacent to our main house Lower Ryelands. The accommodation is private and has its own entrance. Cosy and warm and with all the usual amenities. The accommodation is all on the same floor and consists of a kitchen area lounge bathroom first bedroom and master bedroom.

The kitchen area has an undercounter fridge with small freezer compartment a two ring electric hob a kettle coffee machine toaster and a microwave that also works as an oven.

The first bedroom has two single beds and a chest of drawers.

The master bedroom has a king-size bed chest of drawers and bedside tables.

There is also free wi-fi a TV various board games and maps of the area. There is one shower in the barn and two in the pool house. Bedding and towels are included.

Access to May Hill View is via an outside stairway (see Checking-in Details). There is space for two cars on the private driveway. Bike storage and cleaning facilities are also available. There are no street lights by the barn (prepare for spectacular skies on clear nights) and so there are motion-activated security lights. You will find a torch in the holiday let but we recommend bringing your own if you plan to take the short stroll up to the Moody Cow. Other things to note Other things to note
The pool is solar thermal heated and therefore available from March until September.

Title: Beautifully Eclectic Cotswold Cabin
Description:
Enjoy the studio and secluded patio plus access to our heated pool (*open mid April to end Oct. Pool temp varies on the time of year*) all in lush surroundings in a quiet neighbourhood.

1000 pocket sprung medium firm king-size double bed wet room with sliding door wifi smart TV silent fridge microwave tea coffee toaster.

Donkeys ponies cows & deer roam freely (pigs close by too) step into the National Park 71.000 acres of protected land within 140000 acres of The New Forest. The space The space
The studio is new (transformed in 2021) it has a contemporary feel along with the new secluded patio with outdoor furniture.

The 25x12 ft pool is what Airbnb classes as a shared space seeing as we use it too. Guests can use the pool between 9am and 7pm - we‚Äôre often at work. Ask about sole use of the pool if required. Pool towels are provided.Guest access
Access to the room is down by the side of our house. The key will be in the keysafe by the door well give you the code nearer the check-in date. Parking is on our drive to the right of our garage. Other things to note Other things to note
The en-suite has a macerator toilet which only takes toilet paper NOTHING ELSE! No wipes latex or food etc. Thanks.

The en-suite has ‚Äúcountryside plumbing‚Äù : a shower and sink pump - so excuse the momentary pump sounds and suction sounds Thanks again!

WE CLEAN AND SANITIZE:
- sanitize high-touch surfaces down to the doorknob
- use approved cleaners and disinfectants
- wear protection to help prevent cross-contamination
- refer to cleaning checklists to thoroughly clean the room
- provide extra cleaning supplies so you can clean as you stay.

Due to carrying out the extra safe cleaning washing and laundry expenses we have added a small cleaning fee.

Title: 'Juniper' The Cosy Pod
Description:
Lovely old converted barn on a beautiful working farm with animals and amazing views
Suited to large family occasions and celebrations
Sleeps 12 in 5 bedrooms
Large kitchen/diner
Upstairs sitting-room with picture window
Free use of indoor pool - shared with one other cottage with simple booking system
Childrens playgound
Snooker room
Games room
Farm butchery
Allows 2 well- behaved dogs
Sorry no stag/hen parties.The space
We would recommend that the house has a maximum of 11 adults as one bed space is a bunk bed. We offer guests the use of an indoor heated swimming pool which is shared with one other holiday property but with a private booking system. We also provide a games room snooker room and childrens playground. Guests can walk or cycle on our 730 acre downland farm and buy superb dry-aged meat from our own award - winning farm butchery. Two miniature donkeys pigs chickens beef cattle and sheep can be enjoyed. Brummell Barn has far reaching countryside views from the spacious upstairs living-room. The large kitchen diner can seat 12 adults comfortably.

Title: The Hide Out
Description:
The Orchard is a beautiful 3 bedroom & 2 bathroom newly renovated cottage in the heart of the South Downs with spectacular views. Ideally situated with a host of stunning walks from the doorstep yet close to the pretty town of Haslemere. Also conveniently placed for Cowdray Polo Goodwood events & the Witterings. The property has its own pretty garden seated terrace area & bbq. A tennis court and heated swimming pool are available for use on request. Long term lettings are also available. The space The space
The property has its own private parking area and is approached by a gravel path winding through a pretty orchard garden leading up to the Cottage. Tucked away with its own front door the Cottage is on the edge of our garden and driveway. The orchard garden has a sunny terraced area fitted with new comfortable garden furniture to be enjoyed with over a morning coffee or evening drink. There is also a Weber BBQ for al fresco meals.

Inside the Cottage is designed upside down so the 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms & utility cupboard (with washing machine/hoover etc) are located on the ground floor. The open plan sitting room dining area and kitchen are on the first floor with windows spanning the entire length so that the far reaching views can be fully enjoyed.

The entire Cottage has been newly renovated and the kitchen has granite surfaces and all the mod cons you could wish for including oven fridge freezer microwave dishwasher and nespresso maker. The kitchen has a convenient breakfast bar and stools ideal for working from home or just reading papers.

The Living Area has been designed in a boutique style with a range of luxurious upholsteries & cushions and is a lovely space to relax and unwind. Board games are included and the Satelitte TV is equipped with Netflix etc. Wifi is available throughout the property.

The 3 bedrooms are all spacious with luxurious bedlinen towels chest of drawers new carpet and fully lined and interlined curtains. Bedroom 2s singles can be joined and the mattress zipped together producing a very comfortable super king size bed. Bedroom 3 has 2 envelope single beds - so additional sleeping is available (for one additional guest on prior request). The bathroom and shower room are also newly fitted. The main property has a tennis court which you are very welcome to use on request.

We are happy to welcome one small pet on request.

Title: Luxury romantic couples getaway with hot tub
Description:
Enjoy a discount for booking 7 nights or more.

Modelled on the style of local villages Forge House is set in a secluded traffic free location within the Water Garden on the exclusive Lower Mill Estate. Built in a traditional Cotswold style this well furnished and welcoming property comprises of 3 bedrooms 3 bathrooms a good sized lounge and dining area with cosy wood burning stove and French doors leading to an enclosed decked area which is perfect for sitting and for children to play. The space The space
Forge House is a delightful Cotswold stone cottage offering a tranquil haven for nature lovers (5 large lakes within 500 acres of secluded parkland).

Complimentary Wifi is available which has an ultra fast connection ideal if you need to make video calls or use your time here to ‚Äòwork from home‚Äô. Use of our Netflix account is also included.

We welcome pets but please note this is limited to two maximum.

A high chair and a good-sized travel cot is available for our smaller guests to use.

There is also a Dolce Gusto coffee machine
So feel free to bring your own pods (a few complimentary will be provided).

You can enjoy cooking some great food on the BBQ and the wood fired pizza oven.

An outdoor heated swimming pool sauna tennis court table tennis playground and indoor soft play area complement this stunning property and is included in your stay. Please bring extra towels if you wish to use the pool or sauna - towels will be provided for use in the house.

Bikes kayaks and canoes are available on site for rental and local fishing is also available on the estate.

Please note that we do not have access to the onsite spa.

Title: Stoke Leigh Barn
Description:
Set in a peaceful area of the Hoburne Cotswold park is this beautifully equipped mobile home within a few minutes walk to the main park entertainment area and lakes.
We are perfectly positioned for easy reach to explore the Cotswolds and surrounding areas. The space The space
The space
This is a luxury home with full kitchen including Oven/Hob Fridge Freezer Washing Machine and Dishwasher.
TV with DVD player in the lounge and TVs in 2 bedrooms.
Music can be streamed using the built in Bluetooth speakers.
Table and chairs inside for a cosy family meal.
There are 3 bedrooms - one with a King bed and plenty of storage space. The other 2 bedrooms each have 2 single beds. All bedrooms have ample storage space.

Maximum capacity 6 people
There is a family shower room as well as a separate toilet and washbasin room.
Outside there is a table and chairs on the decking. Other things to note Other things to note
We do have other lodges on site so if you are staying in a group please contact us.
You are welcome to bring up to 2 Dogs ‚Äì charged ¬£20 per dog (paid after booking)

Title: Woodpecker Lodge - Log Cabin with Private Hot Tub
Description:
In a stunning rural location 4 miles from the Jurassic coast The Granary is beautifully equipped with outstanding views over the lawns and tennis court to the surrounding countryside. The pool is open from the beginning of May to end of September and is shared with a small number of other guests. Games room tennis court. One well behaved dog is welcome at ¬£20 per pet (if more please ask first). There are lovely walks all around. Historic Colyton is 2 miles away with pubs eateries and shops. The space The space
Liz and Gordon provide a warm welcome and the cottage is extensively equipped with welcome pack of basic food household and toiletry items so you can cut down on your packing. It has a private garden with furniture and barbeque.
All linen and towels (two each) are provided.
The Bunk bedroom is not suitable for two adults.

Title: Elite Suite Two Oak' s  Adults only
Description:
The Stables is located in Dulcote village just a short walk from Wells in Somerset. The space The space
The Stables to the rear of the main house is furnished with an eclectic mix of modern and period furniture. A large open plan living space contains an extremely comfortable squishy sofa a 46‚Äô flat screen TV I-phone dock (cunningly disguised as a retro radio) and of course super-fast Wifi. A well equipped kitchen has everything you could possible want to create a feast ‚Äì and after a visit to the delectable farmers‚Äô market in Wells you may well want to! A stylish zinc-topped dining table completes the picture.
Beds are supremely comfortable with pocket sprung mattresses and crisp white cotton bedlinen. There is a modern bathroom containing a bath with a shower over and underfloor heating . A second bathroom boasts a large walk-in shower. Outside there is an enclosed area for your own private use with decking seating and a BBQ. The cottage is on one level so is suitable for all although there is a small step up to the front door. In the summer guests may share our 12m outdoor heated swimming pool situated in the walled courtyard between 11am and 6pm. We open the pool at the start of June/May half term and close it at the end of August: Weather permitting of course! It is quite a deep pool even at the shallow end so is not suitable for non-swimmers or young children (sorry NO TODDLERS or UNDER 5s).
Although we are unable to welcome under-5s the property is great for those with babes in arms and we have a travel cot and high chair you may use. There is also a pram-friendly path that leads from Dulcote directly into Wells ‚Äì just long enough to get them off to sleep! We can also arrange babysitting if you so require.

DURING JULY & AUGUST WE ONLY TAKE ONE WEEK BOOKINGS STARTING ON A FRIDAY. At other times there is a 3 night minimum stay midweek and 2 nights at weekends.
From September till May (except bank and school holidays) our WEEKEND RATE includes a late check out - whenever you like on Sunday.
GLASTONBURY WEEK - 5 night minimum stay. We also have 2 b&b rooms in the main house sleeping an extra 4 people should you be a party of 8. Please ask for rates.

We are in a great location for exeat visits to the following schools: Millfield Prep (15mins) Millfield (20mins) Downside School (20 mins) Wells Cathedral School (2mins) All Hallows Prep (20mins)
The following local attractions are also nearby: Bath & West Showground Wookey Hole Caves Glastonbury Festival Site Kilver Court Designer Village and the Mulberry Factory Shop. Bath and Bristol are both a 45 minute drive away.
We have tried to think of everything to make your stay as relaxing and comfortable as possible but we or our trusted friends in the village are always on hand should you need anything else.We own a very friendly Labrador Retriever who may come and greet you when you arrive. Please let us know if this may be a problem and we will keep her inside. Note: She is NOT allowed in The Stables or in your private decked area nor are any other dogs/pets.

Title: Ceirw Treehouse high in the canopy & river below
Description:
Under the Walnut Tree is a beautiful shepherd‚Äôs hut in a fabulously romantic setting with far-reaching views down the Painswick Valley. The bright and light hut sleeps two in an elevated double bed and has a well-equipped kitchenette a dining table log burner and ensuite shower room with a toilet. Guests have their own south-facing garden with a wood-fired hot tub firepit armchairs BBQ picnic table and the seasonal use of a spring-fed heated swimming pool and garden room. The space The space
Inside every amenity has been thought of and cleverly designed to fit tidily away providing a stylish and welcoming space for guests to escape to. The sleeping area has a double bed (6‚Äô2‚Äù x 4‚Äô6‚Äù) on a raised platform with LED candles lining the mantle above the curtains. There is a step to easily access the bed and storage underneath it.

The dining area has a large pull-out table with a bench seat on either side and a view up the main garden and down the Painswick Valley. The kitchen area is equipped with everything guests need to cook simply but well with a double gas hob a sink (under a wooden work top) and an electric cooler box. Box. The cool box is situated under the bench opposite the door. The super-efficient cool box is provided with ice blocks that can be changed upon request which usually last up to three days. On chilly days and evenings light the little woodburner and enjoy the cosy ambiance. Next to the kitchen area is a compact shower room with a cubicle shower and toilet.

Under the Walnut Tree is set in a private area of the owner‚Äôs delightful garden. Follow a steppingstone path past the swimming pool terrace‚Äôs stone pillars (entwined with roses in the summertime) to your own south-facing garden with magnificent views down the Painswick Valley. Guests have use of a spring-water wood-fired hot tub charcoal BBQ fire pit picnic table and two armchairs. At the front door are two large planters full of fragrant flowers and herbs. Sit back and watch the local wildlife including ravens kestrels deer and the occasional badger. Guests can also use the summer house at the bottom of the pergola a delightful place in the cool on hot summer days. There is also a mini fridge/freezer in this summer house for guests exclusive use.

Guests may use the owner‚Äôs swimming pool which is spring fed and heated and in the most idyllic of settings. The pool is adjacent to the shepherd hut‚Äôs garden and sun loungers are provided poolside making it a fabulous place to relax. The use of the swimming pool is seasonal with the season running from early summer to mid-autumn but varying from year-to-year - with the start entirely dependent on the date the last walnut tree fronds drops off and warm nights to maintain the day‚Äôs gain in temperature. If use of the pool is essential for your stay please enquire if it‚Äôs open before booking.

FACILITIES

 Sleeps 2 in a raised standard double bed (6‚Äô2‚Äù x 4‚Äô6‚Äù)
 1 ensuite shower room with cabinet shower and toilet
 Hot tub: wood fired and spring fed (first night‚Äôs fuel provided) - extra kiln-dried Forest Stewardship Council (FSC)-certified wood can be purchased from the owner for ¬£6 per box.
 Parking for 2 cars (private secure driveway)
 Private south-facing garden area with far-reaching views
 Spring-fed heated outdoor swimming pool with terrace and sun loungers ‚Äì seasonal use only (shared with owners)
 Wood burner ‚Äì logs and kindling supplied
 Solar powered garden lighting
 Gas cooking and electric hot water; indoor power point
 Free Wi-Fi ‚Äì available in garden area only
 Kitchenette with twin gas hob kettle utensils crockery cutlery glassware (champagne flutes tumblers and wine and water glasses) cafetiere bakeware food preparation (grater jug sieve) saucepans bread bin kitchen foil kitchen paper
 Cool box: large Esky cooler box with pre-frozen ice blocks provided
 Fridge-freezer (in Garden Room)
 Bed linen bath towels bath robes and tea towels
 Kitchen starter consumables: teabags fresh and instant coffee sugar fresh milk olive oil and balsamic vinegar
 Complimentary breakfast hamper available (usually contains milk bread butter eggs and bacon but can be changed to suit dietary requirements) ‚Äì please request when booking.
 Cleaning starter pack: brush cloth washing up liquid bin bags
 Shower room essentials: hand soap toilet paper shampoo shower gel
 Fire pit (first logs provided) - extra kiln-dried Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certified wood available to purchase from owner (¬£6 per box)
 Garden furniture: picnic table and two armchairs
 BBQ (charcoal) and utensils ‚Äì initial supply of instant lighting charcoal provided
 Garden Room: open-sided stone-built room near the hut with fridge-freezer and seating (available during the late spring/summer months)
 Games: Board game cards Scrabble
 Safety equipment: fire extinguisher fire blanket carbon monoxide monitor smoke alarm First Aid kit. Guest access Guest access
Guests have full access to the shepherds hut garden and hot tub and seasonal access to the outdoor swimming pool and garden room with fridge-freezer. The use of the swimming pool is seasonal with the season running from early summer to early autumn but varying from year-to-year and with the start entirely dependent on the date the last walnut tree fronds drops off and ambient night-time temperatures. If use of the pool is essential for your stay please enquire if it‚Äôs open before booking. Other things to note Other things to note
The use of the swimming pool is seasonal with the season running from early summer to early autumn but varying from year-to-year and with the start entirely dependent on the date the last walnut tree fronds drops off and ambient night-time temperatures. If use of the pool is essential for your stay please enquire if it‚Äôs open before booking.

The owners have three friendly dogs who may come out to greet you when you park.

Wood: Guests are provided with sufficient wood for the wood burner for the duration of their stay. (The wood burner‚Äôs logs are specifically for the burner please do not use them in the firepit). A one-night supply of logs for the firepit is also provided. Extra kiln-dried Forest Stewardship Council (FSC)-certified wood for the firepit can be purchased from the owner for ¬£6 per box. The wood is provided in a recyclable cardboard box (rather than the plastic netting used by supermarkets/garden centres).

Hot tub: wood fired and spring fed (first night‚Äôs fuel provided) - extra kiln-dried Forest Stewardship Council (FSC)-certified wood can be purchased from the owner for ¬£6 per box. No use of the hot tub after dark or after 10pm whichever is first or before 10am.

Please note that additional guests above the maximum capacity are not permitted to stay overnight.

Title: the pod@springwater
Description:
A stunning cottage standing in its own grounds in the heart of the Wiltshire countryside with access to amazing walks right outside your front door. Wonderful countryside great local pubs all within easy reach. Enormous comfy bed with ensuite makes this cottage a truly romantic get away. Small private garden with garden chairs where you sit out and enjoy the stunning views. The space The space
You can enjoy the features of this truly splendid cottage with separate dining room sitting room with large TV and kitchen which is small but well equipped with quality cooking equipment but please note no dishwasher. The bedroom is large and has 6ft comfy bed with cotton sheets. The ensuite bathroom has a very large bath with a shower above it. You will be provided with bath robes bath towels hand towels and flannels. The cottage has a contemporary feel yet retaining the original features.
Sorry no pets Guest access Guest access
The entire cottage is yours. There is no over looking and it is completely secluded. Other things to note Other things to note
Swimming pool is closed from October till May.

Title: Three log cabins with WC and Sauna and Treehouse
Description: The Party Barn is a recently converted addition next door to our rural home. It is immaculately furnished and is self contained with the use of a swimming pool and beautiful terraced area from June to September. It has one twin room and a double mezzanine space sleeping up to 4 adults or 2 adults and 2 children. The kitchen is open plan to a living /dining area. The market towns of Marlborough and Hungerford are nearby with Winchester and Salisbury withing easy reach. The space The space\nThe barn is light and airy and stands within a pretty cottage garden overlooking our fields. The swimming pool area and terrace outside is secluded.

Title: Oak SPECIAL WINTER OFFERS - Hot tub & Log burner
Description:
Originally part of the servants quarters to West House this part of the North Wing has been made into a comfortable studio flat with kitchen and beautiful en-suite bathroom including roll top bath and walk in shower. There is a further Air BnB flat opposite and another beneath. Access is up a stairs. With an on-site quirky cafe; gym; beauty parlour and animals this is an unusual place to stay with plenty going on and choices of places to visit and things to do. The space The space
West House is set on the edge of Chilton Polden on the Polden Hills between Street and Bridgwater and overlooking the Somerset Levels towards the Mendip Hills. The main house is of Gothic Victorian style with a beautiful old Coach House set behind the house and plenty of other quirky buildings around. We have lots of animals on site here - sheep and lambs; Barry (our Saddleback pig); cats and dogs; chickens; alpacas two naughty pygmy goats called Murph and Cindy our two Red Deer called Saffron and OG; two larger goats called Bruno and Clover; horses and currently a donkey called Patch. You may well see some of these during your visit!

We also have a gym on site - The Goat Shed (home of CrossFit Wyvern); we are primarily a weight lifting and conditioning gym but offer open gym sessions and CrossFit classes; PT is also available. Our Outdoor Recovery Spa is linked to our gym and is available to book (at additional cost) (hot tub; sauna and pool for cold water swimming in the winter; heated in the summer; closed Christmas Day and Boxing Day). We do offer an exclusive option or hourly slots (limited availability) with limited numbers. You are very welcome to make use of the facilities - just go to CrossFitwyvern.com to book the gym or westhouse21.com for booking the spa or for more information on the site here.

A chiropractor works part of the week from our gym plus sports therapists (please ask for details).

Have you ever wanted to try Alpaca Trekking? Somerset Alpacas is based here at West House so if you want to learn more about these fascinating animals plus other rare breeds and try your hand at trekking with them go to fb Somerset Alpaca Trekking and send Sue a message!

You will find a pint of milk in your room when you arrive; this is from our Milk From the Moor milk station in the old Donkey Barn just across from Js Bistro; you can also buy some real local farm milk from here to take home or sample one of the many delicious milk shakes. Yummy milk from a local herd of cows grazed on Somerset grass with minimal food miles.

In addition there is a beauty parlour offering a range of treatments The Parlour and also Salon V hair salon. Somerset Silver designs and makes silver jewellery on site here which is also on sale.

Visit Js Bistro our on site cafe (open 10am - 6pm Tues - Weds; 10am - 8pm Thurs - Sat and 10am - 3pm Sun; closed Monday) to have a delicious breakfast cooked for you. Coffees lunches and other drinks are on offer as well and wonderful freshly made pizza (please book in advance for pizza to ensure your order). Alternatively you may wish to prepare your own food and use the kitchen with oven and hob microwave toaster and fridge. The bathroom has a walk in rainfall shower and roll top bath. Access is through a door shared with The Old Dairy and a further Air BnB flat (The Coachman\s Flat) up a stairs. There is a private locked door to the Footman\s Flat. Guest access Guest access
Although Chilton Polden is served by a bus route most people do have alternative means of transport. The 75 bus is the one which will take you to places locally and there is a stop in Chilton Polden within easy walking distance at the old post office or Leather and Lace. The road that the house driveway joins is part of the National Cycle Network so we often see cyclists in the village. If you do drive through the village be aware of tractors cyclists horses and people walking on the road with dogs - the roads really are used by a multitude of different people! If you want to get away from most traffic then head down Goose Lane just a short distance from the house and out onto the moor where you can walk or cycle for miles and see very little traffic. Other things to note Other things to note
We do have a number of animals here - dogs and cats sometimes like to visit our guests; please do just say if any are a nuisance and I will come and remove them; most of the rest of our animals should be behind fences although the odd one escapes ocasionally!

Title: Ash WINTER RETREAT- Hot tub & Log Bruner
Description:
Relax in the shared indoor heated swimming pool hot tub or sauna or keep fit in the on-site gym during your stay here.. Beams and wooden floors throughout.
Ground Floor:
Living room: With wood burner satellite TV DVD player with a selection of DVDs CD player and patio doors leading to patio.
Kitchen/dining room: With Aga microwave fridge freezer and dishwasher.
Utility room: With washer/dryer.
Wet room: With shower and toilet.
First Floor:
Bedroom 1: With double bed and en-suite with shower cubicle and toilet.
Bedroom 2: With twin beds.
Bedroom 3: With twin beds.
Bathroom: With bath and toilet. . Underfloor central heating. Lawned garden with patio garden furniture and portable barbecue. Private parking for 4 cars. Please note: Family bookings only.. Both properties: Electricity bed linen towels and superfast broadband included. Logs for wood burner included. Travel cot and highchair. Indoor heated swimming pool (shared with other properties on-site 9.1m x 4.2m depth 0.9m to 1.8m) with sauna hot tub and children‚Äôs play area. No smoking. Visit Wales 5 Star. . Shared indoor heated pool / Hot tub / Sauna & gym. Situated within the heart of the Dulais Valley at the edge of the village of Crynant these barns have been converted to a good standard with splendid views of March Hywel Mountain and numerous walks directly onto the mountain behind. Bwthyn Cerrig (ref W41454) is semi-detached whilst The Old Stables (ref W42528) stands detached. Situated on a working farm with the owner‚Äôs friendly dogs each property has shared use of the on-site facilities including an indoor heated swimming pool sauna and hot tub. Cefn Coed Coal Museum Aberdulais Waterfalls and activities such as golfing driving ranges archery paint balling and quad biking are all available within a three mile radius. The famous Dan Yr Ogof Caves and Craig y Nos Country Park are just 10 miles. The magnificent Gower Coast is approximately 18 miles and the Brecon Beacons are within 35 miles. Swansea town centre and Cardiff both with excellent shopping bars and clubs are within driving distance. An ideal holiday base. Shop pub and restaurant 1¬Ω miles.
Bwthyn Cerrig (W41454) can be booked together with The Old Stables (W42528) to accommodate up to 11 guests.

Title: Mountain View Glamping
Description:
Tucked away in a secluded spot and surrounded by woodlands and rural areas Nutkins retreat is a delightfully peaceful place to get away from it all and enjoy a daily dip in the outdoor heated pool.

Located just on the outskirts of the historical village of Whippingham and a short stroll from the popular English Heritage site of Osborne House the accommodation is an ideal spot for exploring.

The accommodation has two bedrooms and overlooks a very scenic natural stream and pond within the grounds of the property which back onto a wooded area. The accommodation benefits from the use of a 30ft heated pool open between April and September and shared with an additional smaller lodge within the grounds.

There are two bedrooms a shower room with pod shower open plan living room and kitchen/diner. The master bedroom is very spacious and recently refurbished with views over the garden. The 2nd bedroom has a single bed with pull out trundle bed making it into a twin.

In the living area there is ample soft and dining seating TV Dvd player and wifi. Outside the living area is a large decking seating area with views over the garden and stream. There are plenty of wild visitors to the garden including red squirrels to watch for.

Nutkins retreat really is a hidden gem in an excellent spot for exploring and there‚Äôs even a great pub within walking distance on the bank of the river medina a leisurely stroll away.

NB: As the property has a pond and pool we must restrict bookings with children to 8 years and above.

Title: Crazy Mazy, Peace & Tranquillity in East Yorkshire
Description:
Luxury 2 3 4 5 or 6 berth timber clad pet friendly double width holiday lodge c/w private 5/6 seat hot tub 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms (1 en suite) large vaulted lounge/dining area fully fitted kitchen large private outside decking area with outdoor seating and panoramic devon countryside views situated on a five star country park. On park facilities include indoor swimming pool sauna gym tennis court archery kids play area dog walking areas pet friendly on site pub/restaurant. The space The space
Welcome to our beautiful fully furnished pet friendly timber clad lodge c/w 5/6 seater hot tub on the 5* Devon Hills Holiday Village/Country Park situated between Paignton & the historic market town of Totnes. A perfect place from which to visit the holiday attractions of Torbay Torquay Brixham Dartmouth Teignmouth Dawlish & the many blue flag & pet friendly beaches of the area the cities of Exeter & Plymouth are nearby lovely little market towns like Totnes Newton Abott & the dramatic scenery of Dartmoor. Paignton Zoo is less than a five minute drive & is also well worth a visit. The lodge is beautifully furnished with everything you need to make your stay in this lovely part of Devon a pleasure. The lodge features..
large vaulted lounge /dining area
3 Bedrooms (1 x king size with ensuite) 1 x twin 1 x double
1 main bathroom
beautiful landscaped park
dog friendly lodge & park
large decking area with outside seating
private 5/6 seat hot tub maintained daily
free wifi
free use of on site indoor swimming pool sauna steam room & gym (gym tuition is chargable if required) plus other on site facilities
15th century thatched roof coaching inn on site serving food wines & fine ales just a 5 minute quiet stroll away. This is also dog friendly inside or out.

The lodge is situated on the newest part of the park with sweeping views into the valley & the rolling hills beyond. It has its own car parking space adjacent to the lodge and an extended decking area to while away the hours..
The 5* park itself is very quiet & relaxing with beautifully landscaped grounds & boasts among its attractions a lovely indoor pool with separate kiddies pool a sauna & steam room. The Gym at Devon Hills is modern & well equipped with personal trainers on hand if required. There is also a beauty salon & hairdressers situated in the main building.
Free passes for use of the pool & gym are included in your stay at the lodge for up to six people (seperate charges may apply for gym tuition etc). Also on the park you can try Tennis Table Tennis Archery & there is a small play park for the younger members of your family.
Dogs are welcome on the park & in the lodge (see below) & there is a lovely large dog walking field/area just 100mtrs from the lodge which leads to a small pond & picnic area. A further field is available at the other end of the park.
Also on site is the Blagdon Inn a 15th century coaching house serving good food & fine wines & ales...The Blagdon also has sky tv & a pool table all this just a five minute quiet walk from your lodge (dogs are welcome there too inside & out). The Inn now does a takeaway/collection/delivery menu service & also features an onsite shop selling basic essentials & local produce.

Onto the lodge itself.....which is a 3 bedroom 2 bathroom fully fitted lodge finished to a luxurious standard...of course with D/G & central heating if you are visiting out of season...
Complimentary Wi-Fi is also included in your stay & mobile signals are excellent.
Enter into a superb open plan living/kitchen area with vaulted ceilings... the large kitchen is fully fitted including a hob oven microwave dishwasher fridge freezer washing machine & the all important wine cooler as well as kettle toaster & all the other small kitchen essential items that you may need to make your stay a pleasure... oh & nearly forgot we supply a small welcome pack for your arrival.
The spacious & bright lounge area has 2 x 3 seater sofas a modern electric fire a 42‚Äù flat screen TV with built in freeview ....then onto the dining area which has a large modern dining table & 6 chairs..
Views from both the lounge & the dining area are onto the decking area & beyond to the rolling hills. The outside area itself has a rattan dining patio set for up to 8 people .it also features the 5/6 seater hot tub outside lighting & a wet storage box..
Through the hallway where you will find hanging space & shoe cupboard are doors leading of to the 3 bedrooms & the main bathroom.
Bedroom 1 (master).. King size divan large wall mirror ample wardrobe & drawer space 32‚Äù samsung wall hung tv & door leading to En Suite with a beautiful tiled quadrant shower washbasin w/c
Bedroom 2....2x single beds ample wardrobe & drawer space
Bedroom 3....1x double bed ample wardrobe & drawer space
Main Bathroom... featuring full size bath with shower over washbasin w/c .. welcome toiletries are supplied in each bathroom area....
All bed linen towels etc are provided & we even leave a few childrens games in the wardrobe
The whole property is tastefully decorated & furnished & is protected by smoke & CO alarms & all necessary testing to appliances is to standard. Gas & electricity is of course included. If you have any further questions about the property or area please just ask.

Please note ..2 small/med dogs allowed only.....strictly no smoking within the lodge or on the decking area.... Due to insurance purposes please only a max of 6 occupants per stay... from 16/07 to 02/09 only 7 or 14 day bookings accepted with checkin/out day being saturdays Guest access Guest access
full use of 3 bedroom luxury lodge including large private decking area with panoramic views & private 5/6 person hot tub Other things to note Other things to note
please note covid19.. please also be aware that on park facilities as described may be closed or restricted during your stay dependant on the current situation.

Title: Flora‚Äôs Deluxe wooden cabin (Mini house!)
Description:
Escape to the country and unwind at this charming elegant cottage in 2 acres of lovely gardens with swimming pool tennis and badminton and county walks starting from your door. Located on the edge of the award winning village of Cuddington walk to the thatched roof pub for drinks and dinner or village store for supplies and news papers. Only 10 minutes drive to the bustling market town of Thame 35 minutes to Oxford 40 minutes to London by train and 45 minutes to London Heathrow Airport. The space The space
Tyringham Small as it is affectionately called is on the grounds of Tyringham Hall a 16th century Elizabethan manor house. At nearly 1800 sq. ft. and freshly remodelled the cottage is bright clean and open. Furnished with country antiques modern amenities central heating and log fire with private garage parking.

A comfortable and relaxing retreat with the master bedroom en-suite on the ground floor along with the fully updated kitchen with new appliances. The dining area leads to the ample living room with wood burning fire and flat screen TV. Two additional bedrooms and a bathroom are upstairs. Every room has an internet connection Guest access Guest access
Private entrance to the Tibbys Lane with another private entrance to garden. The expansive 2 acre garden with pool (opened and heated May 1 - Sept 30) Tennis and Badminton is available for your exclusive use.
. Other things to note Other things to note
For special events or weddings there are 5 additional en-suite bedrooms in the main house with a separate garden entrance to Tyringham Small that can be made available on request. During your stay we offer MassageManicures and Pedicures Brows and Lasheswaxing and skin cleansing plus sustainable flower arranging classes making wreaths and table decorations clay shooting tennis lessons prices on application.

Title: The Little Lodge is a cosy luxury hideaway..
Description:
Comfortable and spacious lodge in 5 Star Edgeley Park in the Surrey Hills an Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty. The Country Retreat offers self-catering accommodation use of sauna swimming pool and gym. Free WiFi.

Ideal for relaxing holidays with the whole family quick getaways with friends or the perfect romantic break.

Well behaved pets welcome - extra ¬£35.
No commercial vehicles/vans allowed if in doubt please ask first. The space The space
This lodge is completely detached and isolated from all others on the park. The only shared spaces here are the pool gym and reception area none of which need to be entered during your stay.

The property is deep cleaned after each guest surfaces sanitised and all fabrics washed - with the exception of carpets curtains and sofas.

The accommodation sleeps 6 adults in 3 bedrooms: includes a master bedroom with ensuite twin bedroom and one bedroom with bunk beds for two family bathroom stylish open plan living area and modern kitchen with separate utility room. The kitchen is equipped with an oven dishwasher and washing machine and towels and bed linen are included.

There is a dining area and seating area with a flat-screen Smart TV and DVD player a sun terrace complete with furniture for al-fresco dining.

You can play swim have a sauna and use the gym on site there are also tennis courts at the park and the area is popular for golfing and cycling. The swimming pool and gym close at 5pm.

Dorking is 9.1 miles away while University of Surrey is 5.6 miles from Country Retreat. London Gatwick Airport is 14.3 miles away.

Title: Ty Calon - romantic shepherds hut & hot tub
Description:
Situated in a secluded cove this 2 bed apartment in a gated development offers breathtaking panoramic sea views across Torbay from the large balcony.
Avocet 2 at The Cove makes a peaceful coastal retreat for a family couples or single travellers keen to enjoy Devon life in style. Avocet 2 is set in a prime location and boasts spectacular sea views from its position on the first level of the building. The space The space
The full width balcony is accessible via sliding doors from both the living room and the master bedroom and provides plenty of space to relax BBQ and dine and to take in the breathtaking panoramic views across Torbay and on clear days as far as the dramatic coastline of the East Devon Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty. 

The communal grounds offer a boules court barbeque area and an outdoor swimming pool with seasonal opening from June until mid September*. There is direct access to the secluded Fishcombe Cove where you can enjoy freshly prepared food and drinks and even catch a glimpse of the local seals if you are lucky. Follow the South West Coast Path 5 minutes down through the adjacent National Trust woodland and you will find yourself at the very picturesque and sheltered Churston Cove.

As well as the contemporary decor the property benefits from stunning coastal views and is close to Battery Gardens and Churston Woods for those who enjoy a nice stroll. For those who like to wander further afield you‚Äôre only metres from the famous South West Coast Path.

The apartment also includes access to an outdoor heated swimming pool on the grounds of this breathtakingly beautiful development.

Living Room/Dining Area;
-Full width sliding doors with access to the balcony
-Open and bright with fantastic views
-Open plan living room and dining area 
-4 seater dining table
-Two 2-seater sofas and footstool
-32‚Äù Flatscreen TV with Freeview
-Bluetooth wireless speaker.

Master Bedroom;
-Access to the balcony via sliding patio doors
-Double bed and built in wardrobe
-19 flatscreen TV with Freeview.

Bedroom 2;
-Twin single beds and built in wardrobe with hanging space.

Kitchen;
-Open plan kitchen off living and dining area 
-Single electric oven with grill and hobs
-Under counter fridge with freezer drawer dishwasher washer/dryer.

Family Bathroom;
-Bath with over head shower.

Outdoors;
-Large balcony spanning whole width of apartment with stunning panoramic sea views
-Private and enclosed with four piece rattan set with table and foot stools
-Gas barbeque
-Communal outdoor heated swimming pool seasonal opening from June until September
** FOR SUMMER 2021 THE SWIMMING POOL IS ANTICIPATED TO OPEN AFTER 21ST JUNE SUBJECT TO GOVERNMENT CONFIRMATION THAT ALL SOCIAL RESTRICTIONS CAN BE EASED**
-Allocated parking for one car in the secure gated car park on site. 

All Saltwater Escapes properties have acquired the Industry Standard and has followed Government and industry COVID-19 guidelines. All properties have Risk Assessments in place and a process to maintain cleanliness and aid social distancing. Guest access Guest access
Avocet 2 is a first floor apartment and is accessed either via the boardwalk which runs along the front of the site and then up a set of stairs to access the front door or along the level paved path which runs from the car park between the first and second rows of apartments. From this path it is only a couple of steps down to the front door of the property. Please note it is not permissible to park directly outside the apartment. Roller cases and soft luggage which can be easier stored are recommended. 

Once inside the property it is single level and there are no stairs. Other things to note Other things to note
- Early check in: 3pm. Check out: 10am
- *Outdoor pool is open from June - September annually however the dates are at the discretion of the site management. Please contact us with any questions.
** FOR SUMMER 2021 THE SWIMMING POOL IS ANTICIPATED TO OPEN AFTER 21ST JUNE SUBJECT TO GOVERNMENT CONFIRMATION THAT ALL SOCIAL RESTRICTIONS CAN BE EASED**
- No pets permitted on the development.

All Saltwater Escapes properties have acquired the Industry Standard and has followed Government and industry COVID-19 guidelines. All properties have Risk Assessments in place and a process to maintain cleanliness and aid social distancing.

Title: Secluded Eco Shepherds Hut with wood fired hot tub
Description:
This pretty self-contained 17thC thatched cottage is situated in a farming hamlet near historic Abbotsbury village and World Heritage Coast. The cottage is annexed to the owners farmhouse and cottage guests are welcome to use our heated swimming pool (June - end August) hot tub and to relax and unwind in our extensive garden. The hamlet is a walkers paradise surrounded by footpaths including the Dorset Coast Path. The cottage is available to hire on a weekly basis with a Friday changeover The space The space
This pretty thatched 17thC Grade 2 listed cottage has oak beams & inglenook fireplace with log effect electric stove. The garden is in excess of 2 acres with tables chairs and benches where guests can relax and unwind. There are no other holiday cottages on site and outdoor facilities are only shared with myself and very occasionally when my family may visit. Guest access Guest access
Guests are welcome to use our hot tub swimming pool BBQ all outside garden furniture and to relax in our extensive garden. Other things to note Other things to note
Both Abbotsbury and Portesham have farm shops and pubs. Abbotsbury also has a general grocery store post office and various craft shops.

Title: Secluded rural cottage with hottub near the coast.
Description:
Located in Silverlake a Habitat Escapes development set in 500 acres of parkland & lakes and situated in the centre of the crescent in Beaumont Village this Bijou cottage offers bright and airy accommodation & enjoys a sunny southerly aspect. With the lounge/kitchen/diner situated on the first floor adjacent to the master bedroom these rooms have access to the south facing balcony that runs the full width of the property. There is a second bunk room situated on the ground floor. The space The space
Set in a private 500 acres lakeside reserve within a 10 minute drive of the Jurassic Dorset coast this eco village boasts its own entertainment with its own private luxury spa tennis court football pitch lakes paths trails and adventure you will be at home both inside and out of the house. There is now a new poolside bar. Guest access Guest access
Access all areas on the 500 acres estate. Free entry to swimming pool and sauna. Spa and massages available on request (for extra ¬£).
This property also benefits from full access to the Activity Hub‚Äôs facilities (subject to prior booking and availability) providing you with access to bikes canoes kayaks and stand up paddle boards during your stay.
PLEASE NOTE Latest COVID procedures and contact owner for further details. Other things to note Other things to note
This cottage sleeps a family of 4 (2 adults + 2 children max). The master bedroom is located upstairs and has its own en suite. The bunk room downstairs is suitable for children only and access to the toilet / en suite upstairs is via the master bedroom.
Toilet role bath towels and fresh linen is all provided. Please bring your own towels for the swimming pool lake beach etc. Pleas also bring condiments shower gel and other toiletries.

Title: PENGELLI LODGE (Private Hottub)
Description:
A secluded pool house with private pool in its own private garden set in the Chiltern Hills of Hertfordshire an area of outstanding natural beauty. The space The space
The property sits in an unshared private garden with its own swimming pool. It is private from the main house which is approximately 50 metres away. There is a gate that leads straight onto footpath for some great walks. Guest access Guest access
Through a gate from the drive you will have the private garden and the Pool House all to yourself and your guest. Other things to note Other things to note
The Pool House has wooden floors and rugs. In the Winter months it would be advisable to bring slippers/socks.

Title: Gorgeous Glamping Pod with private Hot Tub
Description:
The Stables is the ground floor apartment in the Old Rectory Coach House in the middle of Sampford Brett - a quintessential English village between Exmoor National Park Quantock Hills & Somersets coast. It provides bright spacious accommodation has easy access from the parking area & is fitted to a high standard. Central heating keeps the property snug and warm even in the depths of winter. There are spacious grounds with a swimming pool trampoline & climbing frame. Free Type 2 EV charging. The space The space
The Stables has two bedrooms - one with a double bed and the other with two singles that can be configured as a double. Each has a generous wardrobe with drawers and bedside tables.

The large bright lounge has a sofa bed settee and 2 armchairs. Theres a dining table with 6 chairs and a wall mounted smart TV. WiFi Internet access is available throughout the property.

There is a separate kitchen which is fully equipped with ceramic hob oven fridge freezer dishwasher microwave oven toaster etc.

The modern bathroom has a good sized shower toilet washbasin shelving and heated towel rail.

The Stables has a fast broadband connection but mobile phone signal varies between providers. Vodafone and O2 are good but you have to go up the field to get an EE signal.
