Title: The Lodge at Beacon Fell - Hot tub rural escape
Description:
Shillings has exclusive use by arrangement of a large outdoor pool. This has just had a new liner fitted. The surrounding terrace with a table and reclining chairs is a sun trap. The cottage lies inside gardens orchards and meadows with footpaths close by. Upstairs french windows open onto a balcony with a table and chairs for al fresco dining under a walnut tree. Steps from the balcony lead to lawns with teak loungers and comfy cushions. At night you can gaze at the stars from your pillow. The space The space
The cottage is in the Blackdown Hills which lie between the North and South coasts in an Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty. It is the only rentable property on the premises and is a field away from a quiet Devon lane. The kitchen is fully equipped and the bathroom although tiny is enough for a holiday stay and has a power shower. The bed is a continental king size. There is a cafeti√®re and microwave. Wi Fi is available everywhere even next to the pool! Guest access Guest access
Surrounding the cottage there are several areas of garden a fruit orchard grazing fields and a big pond where swallows dip and dragonflies fly..
The village lies within half a mile and has a Post Office and general store a pub and Doctors surgery. Other things to note Other things to note
The parking is secure and off the road.
We allow one small dog depending on age and breed for which payment can be made on arrival. Please note that your dog must be closely supervised on a lead particularly around the pool as they can cause damage if they fall in. There is a 4 acre stock proof field next the cottage where they can run freely. We have found that dogs left on their own in the cottage can be noisy and destructive. So we ask guests to please take your dog with you. The pubs in the area are happy to have dogs.

Title: Bluebell Pod with wood fired hot tub
Description:
Traditional black boarded barn in secluded grounds with beautiful views of Sussex countryside. Plenty of space to relax by the swimming pool on the terrace or wander round the garden. The space The space
The converted hay barn is situated within private grounds offering extensive views over fields to the South Downs. The building features exposed oak beams and a galleried roof space so there is plenty of room for guests to spread out socialise or relax. The cow shed is a separate building across the barn yard and contains 2 additional bathrooms (ideal to change for the pool) kitchen and lounge area. Guest access Guest access
Guests have access to the barn cow shed and gardens. The heated swimming pool is open summer months only normally mid May to mid September. Please confirm dates in advance as weather dependant. There is a barbecue and fire pit on the terrace. Feel free to bonfire in the garden. Other things to note Other things to note
Please supervise children at all times as there is a swimming pool pond and river in the garden. Don‚Äôt swim alone or at night.

Title: A Hidden Gem - Tranquil Barn in the New Forest
Description:
Peaceful and with stunning views you will find Hoarstone Cottage the perfect place from which to enjoy everything that the Cotswolds countryside has to offer with a wealth of walks cycle routes bridleways and wildlife right outside your window. You will also find yourself within easy reach of plenty of renowned towns such as Burford Woodstock Bourton-on-the-Water and Stow-on-the-Wold all of which will enable you to enjoy a fantastic Cotswold holiday. An ideal staycation post lockdown! The space The space
Cottage is a self-catering holiday cottage for upto 4 people. Located on the edge of the Cotswolds with stunning views across the Glyme Valley yet only 5 minutes from the bustling market town of Chipping Norton this cottage is the perfect setting for a luxury break. Soho Farmhouse Daylesford Farm Shop Blenheim Palace many award winning pubs plus Cornbury Feastival and Wilderness Festivals are all within 10 minutes of this beautiful hideaway.

Open plan with high vaulted ceilings to let in plenty of light the cottage is situated next to a synthetic surface tennis court and a shared swimming pool and with footpaths crossing the farm this is a great get-away to unwind and relax. Due to the ongoing situation with Coronavirus the swimming pool is open but will be operated on a rota basis and at our discretion.

There is ample parking and a private garden with outdoor garden furniture and BBQ (during summer months).

In the cooler winter months a wood burning stove adds to a cosy feel within the cottage which is itself heated through underfloor heating from ground source heat pumps.

For those with young children we can provide a travel cot high chair and the cottage is fitted with a stair gate to prevent the more adventurous toddler exploring too far.

Dogs are welcome provided you let us know in advance so that we can provide towels to help dry and keep your pet clean. We do have our own dogs and a cat so well behaved dogs only please!

Title: Cosy shepherds hut, hot tub, log burner & Alpacas
Description: The Coach House has been beautifully converted into the most unique luxury detached self-catering holiday accommodation sleeps 4(+1) with exclusive use of its own private en suite heated indoor swimming pool and outdoor tennis court. Just 6 miles South of the County town of Shrewsbury surrounded by unspoilt Shropshire countryside in an area of outstanding natural beauty it provides a perfect base to explore the County walk in the Shropshire Hills or just relax and get away from it all. Guest access Guest access\nExclusive use of private heated indoor Swimming Pool situated within the Coach House itself. Free use of outdoor Tennis Court and adjacent Orchard in season.

Title: Treehouse living
Description:
A light and airy caravan with a lovely sized lounge area (refurbished 2022) which has a TV with DVD player. Separate seating is set around a dining table which then leads into a galley fully equipped kitchen. Down the hallway there is a bathroom with power shower WC and basin separate toilet two twin bedrooms and the master double bedroom. The caravan is double glazed and benefits from gas central heating. There is parking for two cars. Beds are made up on arrival please bring towels. The space The space
Culver Reach 33 is conveniently situated in the centre of the park - all park amenities are in easy reach and the secluded beach is a short 10 minute walk. Guest access Guest access
The caravan will be yours to use exclusively during your stay. On site there is a bar shop day and evening entertainment and indoor and outdoor pools. Access to the bar entertainment & swimming pools requires passes available at reception at an extra cost. Other things to note Other things to note
The park do not assist owners in monitoring the gas bottles please keep an eye on this during your stay and contact me should you find the window to be red and I will ensure the gas bottle is changed for you.

Title: Snowdonia cabin in nature with hot tub
Description:
Characterful 2 bedroom barn conversion sleeping 4 people (+ cot) with period features and wood burner set in the beautiful East Devon countryside. Shared use of 33ft indoor pool sauna fitness room childrens play areas 12 ft trampoline and 2 acres of grounds. Rated 4 star by Visit England. Private patio and parking area. Located near Tiverton 15 minutes‚Äô drive from the M5 (J27).

Central heating free WiFi flat screen TV cot & highchair available. Pets welcome (charge applies).

We‚Äôre running our indoor pool sauna and fitness room on a rota system at the moment with each cottage having exclusive use of the pool house for two 1-hour slots each day. The play area trampoline and games room are open with parental supervision.

English Spanish French and Greek spoken. The space The space
The Granary at Three Gates Farm is cosy and comfortable ideal for a family (+cot and h/chair available). A perfect base to stay for some R & R or explore this lovely part of Devon. Short breaks available upon request outside school holidays.Guest access
The cottage is self contained and has a patio area with table and chairs (BBQ available). Guests have access to 2 acres of shared grounds and facilities including indoor pool sauna fitness room childrens play area and games rooms.

Title: The Pool House
Description:
Self contained holiday flat. 2 bedrooms (1 double 1 twin). Double room has en-suite shower room. Spacious sitting room looks out onto secluded shared garden. Off road parking for 2 vehicles next to the flat.

We are inside the South Downs National Park with lovely walks close by. We are also close to Goodwood for the Festival of Speed Revival and Horse Racing - as well as the cathedral city of Chichester and sandy beaches at West Wittering. The space The space
The flat is self contained with its own access door. Fully equipped kitchen with a dish washer and a sitting room with TV. There is access to a laundry room with a coin operated washer and drier. Guest access Guest access
We have a swimming pool (outdoor and only in the summer) tennis court sauna and gym which guests can use by arrangement (extra charge for use of sauna due to electricity costs). We just ask for consideration as sometimes we would like to enjoy them either on our own or with friends. We do not expect guests to spend all day everyday by the pool.

The garden has a slide and trampoline and there is a shed with a few toys and bikes suitable for children. Other things to note Other things to note
Although the flat is all on the ground floor there is a small step down into the sitting room and there are 3 steps outside down from the car park area to the main access door.

The flat is not suitable for wheelchair users due to the steps noted above and also a narrow door between the kitchen and sitting room.

The sitting room and kitchen/dining room are spacious but the bedrooms are compact.

Title: Waterfront apartment with pool.
Description:
One-Bedroom House This house with a balcony and mountain views of The Brecon Beacons an open plan kitchen/living room one bedroom with king size and single bed also a double sofa bed in living room. There is a shared indoor heated swimming pool and indoor hot tub with changing rooms.
Due to Covid rules of no more than 6 adults staying in one house we offer our shepherds hut free of charge to keep within the Welsh government rules (child under 12 yr are not counted). Also parties and gatherings are not allowed within the cottages. Our hot tub and pool are open on a booking slot system for a private 1.5hr slot (only one cottage can use the facilities at only one time). Face masks and social distancing applies. Our cottages are cleaned to covid standards and hand sanitiser is in the cottage for your use. The space The space
The cottage features original oak beams in all the rooms and has a spacious living room with French doors opening onto a balcony with views of the Brecon Beacons situated in a farm court yard setting ideal for al fresco dining or a barbeque.
A great location to meet up with family and friends.
Situated on the Edge of the Brecon Beacons amongst beautiful countryside close to Brecon Builth Wells Hay on Wye Crickhowell and Abergavenny. Located on a traditional working farm with cows sheep hens goats pigs and our donkey called Star. Our farm tours are very popular with the all the family and our play area with swings slides sand pit and football goals are situated by the cottages

Title: Secluded Oak Barn Retreat with Hot Tub & Pool!
Description:
57 Granada is a traditional holiday chalet situated at Selsey Golf and Country Club a popular family-oriented holiday park. The facilities on site include an outdoor heated swimming pool and bar with a family seating area. There are two ball play areas a tennis court and a childrens playground. The chalet is suitable for both families and couples. The site is located just a few minutes drive or 15/20 minutes walk to Selsey village and the local beaches. The site is next to Selsey Golf Course. The space The space
The chalet has two bedrooms with a separate shower/toilet with a heated towel rail. A new kitchen was installed in January 2018 and this has a hob/oven and microwave. The chalet was also completely rewired in January 2018. The first bedroom has a double bed and second has a single bed with second pull out bed underneath. Unfortunately there is no cot available guests are welcome to bring their own. The sofa also pulls out to a double bed. All bedding and towels are provided along with bathroom essentials and cleaning products. There is a TV/DVD player. An outside seating area on a paved patio is ideal for alfresco dining. Guest access Guest access
A car parking space is available close to the chalet. All areas in the chalet are accessible. Other things to note Other things to note
To use the two bars a temporary membership is required which can be arranged in advance.

Title: The Warren - Lodge with Private Hot Tub
Description:
Pennard Hill Farm is a family farm offering fantastic views over the Mendips.
The Lamb is the perfect place for a luxurious romantic getaway with its roaring log fire and stunning views from bedroom.
There is plenty to do just a stones throw from Pennard Hill and some lovely towns to explore such as Bruton Frome Wells and Glastonbury. There are a huge array of pubs and restaurants on the door step and plenty of places for long or short walks in the countryside.
Breakfast is not provided. The space The space
There is a gorgeous private wood-fired hot tub! Guest access Guest access
The pool is shared with our two other cottages and is available to use between the hours of 10am and 6pm. Other things to note Other things to note
Please note small well behaved dogs are welcome (a maximum of one unless otherwise arranged) but there is an extra charge of ¬£25 per dog. This needs to be requested and agreed with the owner upon booking.

Title: THE OLD SUNDAY SCHOOL
Description:
This is the actual and original Spice Bus that fans will know and love from the movie Spice World - but with an interior makeover. Working with some incredible designers we have turned it into accommodation so that you can stay the night and live out every fan‚Äôs wildest dream. The bus has the bonus of being situated in a stunning location overlooking Island Harbour Marina. There is a Bar Restaurant and a small shop on site. You can reach us by land sea or air! The space The space
The outside of the bus shows off its famous Union Jack exterior as it did in the Spice World movie. Inside as huge fans of the band we have tried to include as many little touches as possible inspired by the girls and their music to make the interior just as iconic as the outside!

Inside guests will have the run of both floors which have been lovingly renovated with little nods to each of the Spice Girls and some bold interiors. The bus can sleep up to three people with two sharing a double bed and one on a single day bed.

Downstairs

The driver‚Äôs seat remains at the front of the bus ‚Äì sadly no Meatloaf! Towards the back of the bus there is a spacious seating area with a table and three Union Jack cinema-style chairs for relaxing in front of the TV or listening to Wannabe on repeat on the old-school CD player.

Upstairs

There is a double bed at the back of the bus as well as a day bed which can accommodate a third guest if needed. There is also a separate dressing room area complete with rail and dressing table ‚Äì perfect for Spice Girl-inspired makeovers.

Please note we have no official affiliation with the Spice Girls ‚Äì We just want fellow fans to enjoy the Spice Bus as much as we do. We are looking for guests who share our love of the Spice Girls have a verified Airbnb profile and have great reviews! Please also identify your guests when requesting to book.

The outside of the bus shows off its famous Union Jack exterior as it did in the Spice World movie. Inside as huge fans of the band we have tried to include as many little touches as possible inspired by the girls and their music to make the interior just as iconic as the outside!

Inside guests will have the run of both floors which have been lovingly renovated with little nods to each of the Spice Girls and some bold interiors. The bus can sleep up to three people with two sharing a double bed and one on a single day bed.

Downstairs

The driver‚Äôs seat remains at the front of the bus ‚Äì sadly no Meatloaf! Towards the back of the bus there is a spacious seating area with a table and three Union Jack cinema-style chairs for relaxing in front of the TV or listening to Wannabe on repeat on the old-school CD player.

Upstairs

There is a double bed at the back of the bus as well as a day bed which can accommodate a third guest if needed. There is also a separate dressing room area complete with rail and dressing table ‚Äì perfect for Spice Girl-inspired makeovers.

Please note we have no official affiliation with the Spice Girls ‚Äì We just want fellow fans to enjoy the Spice Bus as much as we do. We are looking for guests who share our love of the Spice Girls have a verified Airbnb profile and have great reviews! Please also identify your guests when requesting to book.

A facilities block is located a few steps from the bus for your private use. In the facilities block there is a toilet sink and shower room as well as toiletries and towels. Within this block there is also a kitchenette area with a sink kettle microwave cutlery and crockery. There is a mini fridge inside the bus. Note there are no bathroom facilities on the bus itself. As the bus still has its original structure there are stairs and so unfortunately it is not suited for all accessibility needs.

Other things to note:

‚Ä¢ There is no partition between the double and single bed both situated on the top deck.

‚Ä¢ There are no kitchen facilities or running water on the bus.

‚Ä¢ There are shops and a restaurant within two minutes‚Äô walk.

‚Ä¢ There is no Wi-Fi on the bus but there is free Wi-Fi at the onsite bar/restaurant.

‚Ä¢ The bus is located at Island Harbour Marina.

‚Ä¢ All guests must be 12 years or older.

‚Ä¢ The bus sleeps three people.

‚Ä¢ Height restrictions are 1.7 metres so watch your head!

‚Ä¢ Towels will be provided in the separate facilities block.

‚Ä¢ The bus has electricity points.

‚Ä¢ Please also note that there is no smoking on the bus or within the grounds; and sadly no pets are allowed! Other things to note Other things to note
Due to the originality of the listing height restrictions apply. All guests must be age 12 or older no pets and strictly no smoking!

Title: The Stables Cottage, hot tub & pool
Description:
A unique place to stay! The Cow Shed is a mix between camping glamping and a caravan. Situated on a clean and quiet farm park the Cow Shed provides a great place to escape to.

The accommodation has a ground floor double bed with a three-quarter bed above. Able to sleep four people the Cow Shed provides a base in the Suffolk countryside with the benefit of included access to the farm park.

(please note that the Wi-Fi can be intermittent) The space The space
Daisy can sleep up to four people. The accommodation has a ground floor double bed with a three-quarter bed above. Linen and towels are provided as well as tea/ coffee making facilities. BBQ and tools are available for hire at an extra charge of ¬£10. The toilet block and shower shed are both within 20 meters. Admission to the farm park is included. Guests are welcome to have access to the park out of hours and see our team in action feeding and mucking out the animals. Guest access Guest access
The Cow Sheds are situated within the grounds of Easton Farm Park. Guests have access to the toilet block and shower shed both within 20 meters. Our cafe and gift shop is open during the day. Other things to note Other things to note
Enjoy the full farm experience. Guests can explore the farm out of hours and can even help give the animals breakfast and clean out their stables in the morning. Staff are on hand to answer any curious questions!

Title: Cottage Farm - farmhouse with pool and hot tub.
Description:
Great Field Farm is set in 45 acres including gardens paddocks and the great field with different crops each year.
Bumble Barn is the newest addition to our eco-friendly holiday lodges. Built to Passiv house standards with smart technology and a beautiful living sedum roof that bees love.
The views from the sitting room and patio over open fields and sky are stunning with wildlife all around.
Truly quiet and rural yet Canterbury Folkestone Hythe Channel Tunnel only 10 minutes drive. The space The space
Bumble Barn has a large sitting dining and kitchen area opening onto the patio with views of the horse paddocks open field and trees.
Sitting Room has a smart 4K TV
Fully equipped kitchen with large fridge/freezer
Main bedroom with king sized double bed and en suite shower room. Optional colour changing LED lighting.
2 twin bedrooms. Main bathroom with bath/shower

Title: Idyllic, private & unique countryside holiday
Description:
Longhorn is nestled in the rolling hills of the South Downs National Park. This secluded retreat has all the creature comforts of home whilst enjoying unspoilt 360-degree views of Barrow Hill Farm.

Longhorns domed design with wooden interior has a cosy open plan living space and decking area to enjoy dinner with sunset views. The large outdoor roll top bath is perfect for romantic bathing under the stars.

Just a short walk from the famous South Downs Way and other stunning trail. Longhorn is also a short drive to the historical town of Petersfield and the cities of Winchester Chichester and Portsmouth. The space The space
Longhorn is situated on a working farm however in a secluded corner with minimal disturbance. Access is via foot along a 400m track from Barrow Hill Barns (our cottages site) or along a track for suitable vehicles.

Longhorn offers a king-sized bed kitchen TV Superfast WiFi and separate shower and toilet. Towels sheets and REN toiletries are provided. There is also charcoal BBQ for alfresco cooking! Other things to note Other things to note
Longhorn is designed for those looking to escape the ways of normal life this is why we do not allow children or pets of any size.

There are a number of factors as to why but mostly because as parents we felt it was somewhere to enjoy a couple of nights off from the home life.

Title: The Potting Shed, 5* ‚ù§Ô∏é Luxury escape Cirencester
Description:
Brand New Tree Tent!
If you are desperate for a change of scene and are yearning for some fresh countryside air look no further.
The Tree Tent is a suspended spherical structure strung between two trees overlooking the gorgeous Mendip Hills. It offers the ultimate escape into the outdoors. It‚Äôs an absolutely magical retreat which captures the true romance and cosiness of a camping but in a luxurious and unique way. The space The space
The Tree Tent offers a comfortable double bed LED lighting and a wood burning stove perfect for those chilly evenings. The bed even folds into a sofa for daytime lounging!

Step out of the suspended bedroom pod across the rope bridge to find a gorgeous decked seating area nestled among the trees. Here there is a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge gas hob sink saucepans crockery and cutlery. There is a firepit which is perfect for cooking your evening meal if you are keen to hone your inner Bear Grylls or start simple by toasting some marshmallows whilst sipping a hot chocolate.

There is no wifi or electricity here so it is the perfect place to switch off and really relax.

There is a wonderful outdoor shower with hot water and separate loo. We have ensured there is everything you could want to create the most memorable of stays. More pictures of this are coming soon!

Please note no pets allowed. The bed is a small double.

Title: Three en-suite bedroom cottage with indoor pool
Description:
Set in the sussex countryside our beautiful showmans wagon is now resting. She has spent many years looking after showman travelling around the countryside housing show folk and fair ground people. Her history and that of the travelling community is a magical fascinating part of history. It is a privilege for us to own and gives us pleasure to be able to share with anyone who would like to stay.
The garden and surrounding countryside are part of the charm of our wagon in summer and winter. The space The space
The wagon has a cosy seating area a fold down table we have equipped her with a double plug in electric hob kettle and toaster for light cooking saucepans cutlery plates cups glasses there is a very small 4ltr fridge just big enough for a bottle of milk and a can or two a 5ltr pump flask is there with water and can be filled from outside tap. There is two heaters that keep the wagon nice and warm. A picnic basket with picnic plates glasses and cutlery are also provided should you want to have a picnic.

Tea coffee and sugar Bread Milk Butter Marmalade or Jam are all provided and we leave a welcome basket with a few extra goodies for you to enjoy.

The bedroom area has a standard double bed and there is a dvd tv with some dvds so you can watch some films should you wish to.
Clean bedding sheets and towels are all provided we do ask that you dont take the towels to the beach and bring your own beach towel.


Outside is a table and chairs a small BBQ overlooking a large private garden which is reached by some steps for you to use should you wish to.
The old outside toilet has been turned into a wet room with a corner loo sink and shower. Please note that due to the rural location the water pressure can sometimes drop if this does happen the shower may not work for a short time it is something that we are used to living with and does not happen very often we apologise should this happen it is just part of living in such a beautiful setting. If you should be visiting us in the colder months the shower room can be a little chilly but once the hot water gets going it soon feels warm.

The wagon unfortunately is not suitable for dogs so we have decided it is best that we dont allow them.
Unfortunately due to bad connection the wifi does not always work.

Title: Dotty's Hut at Old Rectory House
Description:
Converted World War 2 Landing Craft giving modern en-suite 2 double/twin bedroom self-catering accommodation on shore but in pleasant riverside location. Comfortably-heated throughout with fully equipped open-plan kitchen living area and patio. The space The space
Truly unique! Accommodation is in a spacious modern converted WW2 landing craft conveniently dry-docked in a riverside garden with two cosy en-suite double/twin bedrooms. An open-plan kitchen and living room offers ample space opening to a sunny morning patio. Other things to note Other things to note
Single beds 2ft6in/Double 5ft.
Families warmly welcomed but parental supervision required in waterside location.
The AirBnB pricing section contains an immovable extra guest charging provision which can cause confusion. Although we have occasionally agreed to an extra child staying the boat only has sleeping accommodation for four.

Title: Apple Store with use of Pool, Jacuzzi & Sauna
Description:
Lovely fully equipped self catering chalet on a spacious holiday park 3 minutes walk from the sea.
Come to Kingsdown where you can enjoy the pebbly beaches enjoy food and drinks at local pubs and restaurants walk or ride on flat ground to Deal and beyond or walk onto the white cliffs for views over to France.
There are 3 King Henry VIII castles to explore - Dover Castle for lots of history and AV tours; Walmer Castle for beautiful gardens cannons and tea room; Deal Castle for interest. The space The space
The chalet is in a great peaceful location within the park and is fully equipped with bed linens towels all kitchen crockery oven hob microwave - step in and enjoy.

Title: Countryside retreat, swimming pool, stunning views
Description:
Enjoy the relaxed and comfortable enclosure of the Birdbox. Sleep right beside nature and its amazing surroundings. Lay down and look at the spectacular mountains all around you. Put on your skis and have a breathtaking journey around the nearby trails. Hike down to Langelandsvatnet in the summer and enjoy swimming in energizing water. Your imagination is the limit for what you can experience. The space The space
The Birdbox is situated 15 minutes by car from F√∏rde. After parking your car at Langeland ski resort there is a 15 minute hike up the hill to the Birdbox
The closest grocery store is in F√∏rde so its important that you bring enough food for the stay.
Contact us for more information about this. Guest access Guest access

Title: Garden Cottage, heated indoor  pool,  tennis court
Description:
Totally unusual accommodation.
Ideal for dreamy nights for couples summer and winter.
A bubble three meters high in the middle of nature to observe the stars. What could be more romantic and restful.
You will have access to a nice en-suite bathroom a few meters from the bubble. From your cozy nest you will have seen the mountains the natural pool and the horses.
A French breakfast will be served on the private terrace of your bubble.
The bubble is heated in winter. The space The space
The bubble has beautiful views of the forest horses the pool and the starry sky.
An extraordinary night not to be missed in all seasons. Guest access Guest access
We are located in the middle of nature on the edge of the forest you will find all the shops and restaurants necessary for your stay in Th√¥nes about 6 km
You can go to Lake Annecy via Menthon St Bernard and its castle just ten kilometers away.
Annecy is a little 15 minutes away and you ride the skis at La Clusaz or Au Grand Bornand in 20 minutes. You will understand we are conveniently located between lake and mountain. Other things to note Other things to note
Magical night guaranteed.
Real comfort under the stars with real beds and heating in cool seasons.

Title: Barn conversion, Henley-on-Thames
Description:
Have you ever wanted to sleep in a condor‚Äôs nest? Here is the next best thing! A transparent luxury capsule that hangs from the top of a mountain in the Sacred Valley of Peru.

We have 3 pods m√°ximum capacity on the lodge 12 people per night. The space The space
Have you ever wanted to sleep in a condor‚Äôs nest? Here is the next best thing! A transparent luxury capsule that hangs from the top of a mountain in the Sacred Valley of Peru.

Located in the Sacred Valley of Cuzco Peru the exclusive Skylodge Adventure Suites offers you the chance to sleep within a completely transparent hanging bedroom that allows you to appreciate the impressive view of this magic and mystic valley.

To sleep at Skylodge people must climb 400 mt. of Via Ferrata or hike an intrepid trail through ziplines. One night at this place will make your dreams come true. Packages includes breakfast & gourmet dinner with wine transportation from Cuzco and our professional bilingual guides.

US$450 fee per person - 2017Guest access
Equipment snack gourmet dinner and breakfast

Title: Cotswold stone cottage with use of private pool !
Description:
Tongui-shaped cottage in a two-thousand pottery art village. A large monolithic house with a three-floor terrace of the Serra Guitar Cultural Museum renowned for its distinctive facade in a two-thousand pottery art village that blends very well with nature.

Enjoy a relaxing emotional healing holiday in a cozy and welcoming room. You can take in the open nature on the third floor of a village without a tall building or you can take a picnic on the lawn in front of a Tongui house.

If you prefer you can also take Ukurelle lessons on the first floor of the building a handcrafted workshop and other venue.

# Directions You

are 15 minutes by car from Lee Cheon Station and 8 minutes by car from Sindun Station. If you have a car it should take less than an hour from Seoul and you can park it.

Title: Award Winning House, Heated Pool, Sauna, Hot Tub
Description:
Beautiful 4 bedroom architecturally designed villa with infinity pool and floor to ceiling views in almost every room of the sea and Cap de Creus national park in beautiful working fishing village in Northern Spain. The space The space

Title: Deluxe Coach House with pool at Bretforton Manor.
Description:
There‚Äôs no better place to experience Colorado than at ‚ÄòBarrett House‚Äô a spectacular 3-bedroom 3-bathroom vacation rental in beautiful Boulder! Nestled at an elevation of 7000 feet on a scenic 3-acre mountain peak in the foothills this stunning home borders Roosevelt National Forest ensuring endless outdoor activities right outside the door. With a fireplace theatre room and unique decor this lovely home promises a memorable getaway with your fellow outdoor-loving friends and family! The space The space
Private Hot Tub | Unique Architecture | 3000 Sq Ft

This eclectic mid-century modern home is the perfect space for you and your loved ones to relax and restore in between outdoor adventures offering all the space and modern luxuries needed for an unforgettable Colorado getaway!

Master Bedroom: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Bedroom 3 (Loft): 2 Full Beds

ARCHITECTURE: In 1971 Barrett House was designed by celebrated Colorado architect Charles Haertling for noted artist Clotilde Barret the house has maintained its architectural significance with recent earth-friendly renovations including cork flooring and soft rugs made with recycled plastic bottles
OUTDOOR LIVING: 3-acre mountain peak private balcony w/ outdoor dining table forest & mountain views hot tub secluded location outdoor seating hammock
INDOOR LIVING: High ceilings skylights & ample natural light Mad Men-inspired bar & dining room modern & trendy furnishings open layout office area theatre room w/ 80-inch HD screen Smart HD TVs desktop computer printer Bose sound system ceramic art spa-like en-suite w/ petrified wood sink spa jet shower & electric heated flooring game room
KITCHEN: Fully equipped stainless steel appliances mid-century finishes Keurig coffee maker tea kettle dishwasher cooking basics dishware & flatware kitchen table
GENERAL: Free WiFi linens/towels in-unit laundry machines central heating complimentary toiletries first aid kit trash bags paper towels
FAQ: Exterior security cameras (3 all facing out)
PARKING: Driveway (3 vehicles)

Title: The Cow Pen Cottage, hot tub & pool
Description:
Snow igloo with real beds inside. Nice atmosphere with led lights and white walls. Outside the igloo is possibility to see northern lights if you are lucky. Come to Lapland and explore the wilderness.

Its always minus degrees inside the igloo. We provide warm sleeping bag but you should bring your thermos layers warm hat socks and cloves. Also headlight or flashlight is handy. Warm apartment available 24 h in case of cold feet. The space The space
We are a small family run business located next to the lake Pyh√§j√§rvi and Pyh√§-Luosto National Park.
Once in a lifetime opportunity to sleep in a snow Igloo that we make ourselves every winter. Guest access Guest access
Each party/group have their own igloo (max 4 persons/igloo). Apart from the igloo there is a warm house with toilets shower living room and small kitchen that guests are free to use Other things to note Other things to note
Lucky Ranch is a horse farm and activity center. We have two different base camps located 1 km from each other. Depending of the booking situation the location of snow igloo accommodation is either organized at the horse farm where the owners live or at Lucky Ranch Saloon next to the lake.

We provide light self service breakfast. Please note that all restaurants and a supermarket are 10 km away at the ski resort. If you want you can bring some food with you. There is a microwave and fridge in the kitchen but no oven or stove.

Title: Pool  House with use of the Pool, Jacuzzi & Sauna
Description:
The Chaos Oasis is the first construction made entirely from recyclable materials in the district. It is situated right next to the Mayan ruins and archeological park of Lubaantun. The village of San Pedro Columbia is a 10 minute walk from us with chocolate making river swimming and bird watching.
We welcome couples solo adventurers and families (with kids) I say we are not suitable for pets as we have so many animals of our own: dogs cats a horse ducks chickens etc! The space The space
We have a bottle / recycled house for your use and will give you a tour of the Earthship and our whole recycling project. We are always working on a new project so some spaces will be available and others under construction! We are completely off grid so you can feel good about helping the environment if you dont mind the quirks that involves! So we have solar lights and cold showers which can be great plus in the heat! and if youre into recycling its the biggest recycling project in Southern Belize.
We also have a 25 acre farm with cacao coffee and many fruit trees and our own ruins on the property. Guest access Guest access
Your casita has a double bed however if you are a family and need more beds / rooms it can be arranged. There is a separate bathroom with two toilets and showers but the bottle house catches its own rainwater and there is an outside shower adjacent to the house for those who wish to really experience the wild!

Title: Luxurious barn conversion with stunning views
Description:
The Roundhouse is located in a place of spectacular beauty with views of Quamby Bluff and the Great Western Tiers on all sides. The property is surrounded by World Heritage Rainforest which is a result of the protracted Jackeys Marsh Forest Protests. The fresh air crystal clear water abundant wildlife and pristine environment are all environmental values prized by the people of Jackeys Marsh. We would now like to share our unique heritage with the rest of the world. The space The space
The Roundhouse is a self-contained home set apart from the other buildings on the property. It gives you the privacy and independence to do your own thing. The interior is warm and comfortable with extensive windows to highlight the amazing views of the mountain valley of Jackeys Marsh.

The Roundhouse is full of architectural features. From the handmade stonewall basement through the curved wooden features of the main floor to the onion top cupola that caps off the building. It is a truly unique property that continues to create special memories for all who visit.

People respond to the shapes that I make. They enjoy the playfulness and freedom of line and see the resemblance of natural forms in the designs. They appreciate the skill required to make such shapes from straight timber following Nature\s design rules.
Kim Clark - Curved Wood Creations ( search this name to see website.) Guest access Guest access
Our guests will have exclusive access to the entire house and are welcome to explore the rest of the property including the self-guided walk to the old Nut Garden and into the rainforest.

Guests are asked to respect the privacy of the other buildings on the property. Guided tours are available on request.

Title: The Parlour: Luxury modern barn with private spa
Description:
A Truly Unique High Elevation Experience Bolted to a Cliffline in the Gorge The space The space
It doesn`t get more extreme or unique than this folks!
Bolted high above the canopy in the Red River Gorge KY Cliff Dweller is now our most extreme and athletic place to spend the night!

After a journey up several hundred suspended stairs welcome to your cliff kitchen bathroom and bedroom for four.

The rocks the views the adventure the solitude. This has it all!

Title: Ty Bach
Description:
Nestled in the heart of the Big Thicket our Naturalist Boudoir B&B has everything you need to revitalize your senses. Extremely private area for the naturalist with outdoor hot tub and shower. Title: Cotswolds Lakes, Spa, Pools, Water Sports, Nature
Description:
Welcome to the Galveston famous Kettle House. Enjoy this newly renovated 1960\s home originally built as a steel storage tank. This home has foam insulation and central AC for ultimate comfort. We have high speed Wi-Fi 4k Smart TV and includes all the comforts of home. Large deck great for catching rays and relaxing in the breeze. Seen on HGTV/DIY show Big Texas Fix!

8 minute walk to the beach - have to cross FM 3005
12 miles to the historic Strand The space The space
IMPORTANT to Note:

There is an interior metal spiral staircase that is steep tight and can be difficult to navigate. There are NO HANDRAILS.

Downstairs bedroom with 2 queen beds requires going downstairs and bathroom is upstairs. These beds are also elevated. We do provide stairs with 3 steps for easy access. There are NO rails on bed! So if your worried about yourself or children falling off these beds won‚Äôt be for you! Got to work with the space we have :-)

Since this is a beach house there are 14 exterior stairs that take you to the main living space.

This is a West End beach house and like all Galveston there are mosquitoes. We supply big spray at the house and also a bug zapper but during certain times of the year they can be bad. If you leave the outside lights on at night they will attract June bugs and other insects.

Also to note this house is on the ‚Äúwest‚Äù end of Galveston by all the beach homes. This house is not in town by restaurants and downtown. It‚Äôs approx a 10 min drive back to Walmart and fast food.

Title: authenticity of wood and old-fashioned charm
Description:
See you for an intimate getaway.

Its enveloping structure its beauty of double spiral lines inspired by nature brings you tranquility and soothing and all this in a corner of nature preserved.
In the heart of a territory rich in history and full of activities.
A homemade breakfast will be served in the zome (included in the price)
a self-service catering service is available (organic dish of the season) as well as frozen desserts and drinks. The space The space
The design of the zoma due to its shape will bring you soothing and disconnection. For a perfect moment of relaxation in a quiet and preserved nature. The zome is equipped with a solar panel for lighting and a pressure canister system for the shower and it is a dry toilet.
The structure is only for 2 people. Guest access Guest access

Title: Deauville Paradise
Description:
Leafy Greens was built as a retreat centre for our family and friends. It is where people would visit to refreshing their souls and mind. We work so hard to make this place to be one of the place that we can live in harmony with nature. That is why the cob houses are the right choice for us. Not only the buildings are eco-friendly but also the garden is organic. Visit here you will be able to take a deep breath and enjoy the fresh air with organic environment. It is a perfect place to getaway!! The space The space
This clay house was built for meditation course and It was designed for people to learn being with themselves that is why the function of the house is simple. The house is 100 square meter with essential facilities. The house is designed to fit for up to 5 people with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The entire of the house was made by clay (earth) it is not only eco-friendly building but also good for our health. We believe that our body will absorb good energy from the earth this means earthy house brings you close to nature and eliminate bad energy out. It is very special house for us too special actually to keep it only for family and friends so we decided to share our paradise to everyone. Hope you would love it like we do.

DO NOT CLICK ON THE AIRBNB LINK FOR DIRECTIONS
Please only use our provided location to get here otherwise you might end up to other places.

PLEASE NOTE THAT OUR PLACE SURROUNDED BY NATURE
Our place is full of flowers and trees you might see part of nature like birds crickets frogs lizards butterflies bugs and insects in our garden dont worry they are harmless. However if you are afraid of these creatures our place might not suit you. We do not offer refunds if those creatures comes into the house but we will check the house before guests check in to make sure there is no any bugs and we have insect net please keep it close every time during stay.

Please note that clay house has a thick wall and the clay is blocked the internet reception so the internet might get slow sometime.

Please note that we are not hotel so we do not have reception to help you 24hr. However you would do our best to help you out. To check-in it is very important to read out message thoroughly in order to have a smooth arrive.

We have cat in our property. If you are allergic to cat or do not like them our place might not a good fit for you.

If more people than the number declared at the time of booking stayed the room additional fee and penalty will be charged.(Children over 3 years old is also count as 1 person).

No commercial photography shoots allowed Other things to note Other things to note
Host might not be able to reply guests message or help after 21:00 PM so that guests must read and study our house manual with care. All information about our house that guests need to know are in there.

Title: Countryside retreat, swimming pool, stunning views
Description:
Treat yourselves to an unforgettable experience! This is not some kids tree-house but rather a truly unique and one of a kind in Panama. The tree-house is located next to a river that will sooth you throughout your stay with its majestic sound. The space The space
You can soon tick off the Number One on your bucket list: the absolutely amazing experience of spending a couple of days in your own tree-house in tropical nature!
This large tree-house is situated in a private corner of our nature resort Rio Encantado . Let the soothing sound of the river and the rushing of the leaves lull you to sleep in the comfortable double bed. The next morning you will be awoken by the beautiful song of the birds around you. From your half-open room in the tree-house you can control a light switch to illuminate the river at night. There is a comfortable bed for you as well as a wet bar and bathroom facilities.
Downstairs a few meters from the tree-house is a rancho where there is a full bathroom/hot water and a kitchen for your use. But for bathing you may probably prefer to use the natural pool in the river bend that your tree-house bedroom looks down to.
Many of our guests who came to try out the tree-house for a night - for the unique experience - ended up extending their stay claiming they had never slept so soundly in all their lives! IT IS A TOTALLY NO SMOKING AREA.

Title: 5 Star Luxury Coastal Retreat holiday home
Description:
Your perfect little staycation in Bali is right here. We take relaxation seriously.
Now more than ever we can be your safe hide-away from the world epidemic. Special discounts running now!

Hideout is a unique eco stay hidden in the mountains of Gunung Agung volcano - far from the city life it acts as the perfect hideaway for all adventurous travellers. We are honoured to be number 4. most wished accommodation at Airbnb in the world. ‚ô°

Follow our social media @hideoutbali for special promo! The space The space
This experience is not like any other Hideout is not some fancy hotel it is truly an adventurous experience rustic and authentic right in the middle of Balinese village life. Hideout is a perfect place for long-time travellers lovers of nature spiritual-minded people trekking-lovers backpackers artists musicians and eco-enthusiast to have their own unique Bali experience. We are most happy with environmentally thinking guests who treat this little bamboo home with love and care.

If you read further you can find much important and interesting information but for those in a hurry these are some key points to know! :)
1. Breakfast is included in the price served in the house (Lunch and Dinner can be ordered from Hideout Bistro for an extra charge vegan options as well.)
2. Scooter for free during your stay!
3. There is an equipped kitchen unlimited drinking water fridge filled with cold Bintang.
4. Large cosy bed with mosquito net wifi music stereo system in the house and a hot shower!
5. We can help to arrange your transport find you the right guides give you the best Balinese massage in-house or organise a great cooking class at Hideout Bistro.
6. Check-in from 3 pm please no late-night arrivals. Check-out at 11 am.
7. We are in the middle of the jungle please expect some wildlife. :)


IMPORTANT INFORMATION
Due to the ongoing pandemic of COVID19:
- All guests will be measured by a professional no-contact thermometer for their body temperature. If their body temperature is repeatedly measured as above 375 Celsius they will not be allowed to check-in as this can be a sign of ongoing illness such as COVID19.
- All guests will sign a declaration of their current health status.
- All guests need to wear a face mask during check-in/check-out or when in contact with our team.
- Houses are cleaned and sanitized after each guest.
- We provide hand sanitisers in the house.


THE SPACE
The building has two floors on the first floor you can find a neat fully equipped kitchen cosy living/relaxing area (with extra hanging hammock) wardrobe with safety box bathroom and entrance to the outdoor shower. On the second floor there is a spacious bedroom providing king size bed with a mosquito net. Right in front of the unique triangular window there are multiple bean bags for reading cuddling and relaxing the perfect place for meditation or playing a musical instrument all with a direct view of the shimmering river.
Bamboo is well-known for its temperature stability thanks to natural ventilation there is no need for AC or a fan. It can be very cold up here. :)

In the kitchen you will always find Balinese coffee tea sugar salt and some spices. If you dont feel like cooking dont worry we have a delicious Hideout Bistro - a kitchen concept! We provide breakfast (included in the price) lunch and dinner and all can be brought to your house. We do not yet have restaurant seating but you can enjoy the meals in the privacy of your Hideout.

Scooter for free! During your stay you will have available one simple basic and older scooter with two helmets. If you are a motorbike racer you might be disappointed :). Always new towels and beddings are also provided.

GOOD TO KNOW
What is amazing about stay in Hideout? ‚ô°
Solitude. All Hideouts have their own private garden and we do the best we can to provide you with full privacy and solitude. The closest family warungs are 5-15min away easy to reach by scooter or by foot.
We love music. That is why we provide you with a nice stereo system and traditional Balinese music equipment.
Hideout is also a shelter for a Kikky cat which is super cute and cuddly. You can also meet our friendly Hoki dog. They are the best security for night-time. Dont book Hideouts if you have an allergy or if you dont want to be close to the animals.

You can experience authentic Balinese lifestyle cultural habits and observe many wonderful things in nature. Especially in the river which is sometimes used for cleansing ceremonies and baths. Its a wonderful thing to experience.

You can‚Äôt lock the bamboo house you can close the garden gate from the inside.

FIRST TIME IN THE JUNGLE?
Hideout is part of local nature our cleaning standards are at the highest but that doesnt stop occasional insect furry caterpillar (that should have a sign - do not touch) frog snake or mouse from visiting the house. Please consider this before booking and do not book this house if you are not prepared for an occasional encounter. We are immersed in nature. :) Animals are friends not enemies.

We urge you to always turn your lights on in the night when moving around the house or visiting the bathroom.

Did you know that a spider can make a new web in under 1 hour? With our biggest efforts to keep the houses perfect and insect free you have to expect that there will be some spiders some bugs and some mosquitos. That is just nature and we cant do anything more for it. If you dont feel comfortable with that it is better to book a different type of accommodation than a bamboo house.
The Internet is very poor and sometimes not working at all. We recommend being prepared for the off-the-grid experience.

ABOUT US
We are not a hotel we dont offer hotel services or 24/7 reception. We are a true Airbnb experience. :) We are here for you daily from 8am - 8pm. If you want a daily clean-up please let us know when you check-in.
Beware that the nearest ATM is from a local bank it only accepts Mastercard. International ATM is about 35 minutes by car away - do come prepared!
Check-in is 3pm - 7pm please avoid check-in later than 8pm since it is very problematic and in some cases not possible! Check-out by 11am.

LOCATION
Please take a careful look at the map we are over 90 minutes away from the Ubud and 2 hours from the city of Denpasar and the international airport. :)
The closest city is Amlapura 30min away. There is no night-life here. No bars clubs coffee houses or shops with imported products. We are this far from the city by choice. In the middle of rice fields with a calm setting next to the running river.

Hideout is within walking distance from a resort where you can have a lovely dinner in the restaurant with an unforgettable view of Gunung Agung. You can easily reach many traditional small shops/warung. There are so many things to explore around - by foot or by bike. Just to mention.. you can go trekking through the rice fields explore local waterfall Jagasatru visit Tirta Gangga Ujung Temple go snorkelling or diving visit the night market visit shaman or local temples go to experience Pura Besakih have a wild day of rafting and many more. Other things to note Other things to note
River surrounding the land is very clean. You can take a refreshing dip in a natural swimming pool which the river provides. You can observe here many of amazing animal species lizards of all sizes enormous butterflies all you can count dragonflies and fireflies chameleons birds of all colours and not to forget our kitten Kikka and dogs Hoki and Tracy. Its a unique experience to fall asleep looking at the fireflies just behind your window. :)

The view from the house is focused directly on one of the most sacred places around called Campuhan. Campuhan is Balinese term for a place where two rivers meet. This place is regarded by locals as a holy place for centuries. Its a source of holy water for ceremonies and cleansing the body and spirit. During your stay you will have the opportunity to observe Balinese during their ceremonies and baths. Campuhan is a very magical place attracting good vibes and positive energy.

By our experience in the Hideout you can find an enormously inspiring environment for your writing music an art of for work.

Title: Beautiful S.Downs cottage w/gate to the Downs
Description:
This bamboo cottage is a secluded eco retreat down a quiet foot path nestled in the rice fields and only a five minute walk to central Ubud. Open air basket weave bedroom with mini loft modern elegant bathroom and outdoor living area make this a truly unique Bali experience. The space The space
This is a woven house made almost entirely of bamboo. It is open air and as close to living in nature as you get. Our main lodge is down a private foot path only accessible to cottage guests. if you choose to join us for dinner a swim or for socializing with other guests you are welcome to enjoy this common space with a saltwater pool and a swing. :) Guest access Guest access
We have a complete menu and full service to the cottage is just a phone call away with the complimentary cell phone we provide . We offer a complete menu of asian fusion snacks as well as a traditional balinese village style dinner served with candlelight and all accessories for a formal dining experience under the stars. dinner is prepared fresh from wild harvested or organic ingredients. Breakfast is not included in your stay but we do provide upon request at an extra fees and can be delivered when you awake on the patio overlooking a lush greenery as far as the eye can see.
he property is surrounded by rice fields with many opportunities for hiking. Other things to note Other things to note
This is a unique place and is not for everyone. It is eco tropical living at its best but with that comes nature in all its glory. Things to note: There is no air-conditioning although because of the location there is a constant cool breeze and you may even enjoy the quilt we provide at night. This cottage is a woven basket with a living bamboo and traditional grass roof leaving it totally open and in nature. Some people have asked about security. It is very secluded and very safe. there is a cabinet you can lock up valuables in if you like. We have staff available to assist you and ensure you have what you need at all times. You will be very well cared for.

Sleeping in nature is something most of us dont do as we sleep in sealed rooms. It can be transformative to sleep in a natural setting open to the cool night air listening to the crickets and chirping geckos the sounds of the nearby rushing stream with the fireflies glittering in the night. Dont let the unusual openness of the space deter you this is an experience you wont soon forget.Bali 101:
Welcome to Bali no this is not like where you are coming from. To hopefully enhance your experience we want to provide you with a bit of cultural context. People often feel disappointed when they try to make Bali what they are familiar with. We hope by describing a few scenarios that this helps as Bali has things about it that may be very different than you are used to.
1. ‚ÄúThere is a lizard staring at me from the ceiling who pooped on the floor and there are ants crawling along the wall in the bathroom‚Äù The outdoors will come inside. Crickets spiders and certainly a resident gecko and wasps will all join you in your living space. No matter how fancy the villa there is no keeping them out. Given that all of our bathrooms are open air this is something to embrace as part of the experience and not be afraid as they are all harmless.
2. ‚ÄúI can hear roosters and dogs and the temple and even the occasional pig being sacrificed at midnight oh and the crickets are too loud to sleep.‚Äù Yes indeed all true. When I think of Bali I think of roosters they are very proud of their fighting cocks and spend a great deal of time with them often keeping them quite close to living spaces so your neighbor may very well have one. our neighbor certainly has both and his dog barks a lot and has attempted to scare away many a guest but dont be afraid he is harmless. The temple is a charming sound that echo thru the night and adds the to atmosphere but it can be less charming when they begin to sacrifice pigs at midnight. Peaceful Bali? Well its all a matter of perspective bali is here to be itself not just to be a peaceful place for you to relax enjoy these new and unique sounds as part of the atmosphere and dont expect it to be an instagram photo it is a real living place.
3. ‚ÄúAn old lady with a machete and no shirt on just wandered into my living room‚Äù Balinese have a very different relationship to personal privacy than we do. It is not uncommon for neighbors or rice-field farms to wander into your space and personal property. because they are curious about you or simply because they want to borrow your sugar. They may not even ask as they would imagine you would do exactly the same. This can be very startling at first and takes some getting used to. You are welcome to ask them to leave but do keep in mind they are more than likely not there to harm you just used to sharing personal space.

4. ‚ÄúThere are naked people in the stream by the house‚Äù it wasn‚Äôt very many years ago that all Balinese women were topless as their normal daily attire. Now only the traditional old women still maintain this style of dress but it is still very common to see people publicly bathing in ricefield streams naked. You may even see this from your front porch. Don‚Äôt be alarmed this normal here and they will not even feel embarrassed if you wave 
5. ‚ÄúThe guy tried to over charge me‚Äù there is a very different relationship to money here. Think of it as a tug of war with a rope in the middle it‚Äôs not that they are trying to steal from you or cheat you or have anything against you at all they are just pulling on the rope to get as much money as they can if you don‚Äôt tug back then they won. Don‚Äôt get angry or feel the need to have hurt feelings just negotiate calmly to lower the price to something fairer. Negotiate everything in every situation you will use these skills later when you need to ask for a raise with your boss. ;)
6. ‚Äúeverything is damp‚Äù yes this is the tropics and especially during the rainy season everything can feel a bit damp and can mildew quickly even within a day. If your clothes need fresh laundering after being in a suitcase or if the sheets need to be changed for this reason just let us know and we will assist you.
We hope these scenarios help you to be prepared if you face them and feel free to let us know should you need additional help navigating in this new environment. Also please be aware that this is a house with two cats who live there we very much want to host people who are cat friendly as the cats are very much running the resort and we want you to be able to include them in your stay.

Title: Romantic Shepherd‚Äôs Hut Retreat very private.
Description:
Most unique treehouse destination you will find. For ages 12+. 1600 SF living space 2 bedroom / 1 bath treehouse uses 4 shipping containers. The interior has a modern farmhouse style. After waking up with an incredible view move outside to 1 of 5 balconies including the 3rd floor screened porch with hot tub or to the 6th floor crows-nest 50‚Äô in the air. Are looking for a couples get-away adult trip or a romantic celebration...the unique ‚Äúnature‚Äù will make for a memorable experience. The space The space
You will be immersed and be one with nature and the environment. Local animals that you may see include: deer wild hogs raccoons armadillos opossums rabbits bobcats squirrels owls red-tailed hawk and many other varieties of birds. There are a number of trails to take by foot or bike. Guest access Guest access
The treehouse has all the amenities of home and many that only exist in your dreams. You can be comfortable in all seasons with a 20‚Äô wall of windows where you can watch birds and squirrels feed 20‚Äô off the ground from the comfort of power recliners. Each of the 5 balconies provide unique perspectives of nature and shade. Relax with a morning coffee on balcony adjacent to kitchen or take steps to the shaded crows nest to swing in a hammock 40‚Äô off the ground fully surrounded by extra tall railings. In the evening start a fire in the covered fire pit and let nature and the crackle of the fire relax you. Other things to note Other things to note
This treehouse is meant for ages 12+ and older ONLY.

** All registered guests must review sign and return a Waiver / Term of Conditions before checkin. **

PLEASE No Pets! For safety reasons pets are not allowed; an exception is made for any registered service animal. We do this to protect you and your pet from any injury.

Closures: We retain the right to close or limit your access to the treehouse during your stay if we deem it unsafe due to heavy storms or other considerations. These facilities and activities can be inherently risky due to the unique nature of the experience so safety must stay top priority for you during your stay.

Safety: Each unit has multiple smoke detectors and carbon monoxide sensors. Please do not tamper with these units. Also keep in mind that when staying in a treehouse youre between 10‚Äô and 50‚Äô above the ground and should act in a responsible manner. Accommodations have been constructed in as safe as possible manner but we need your help keeping you and your loved ones safe during the stay. Fire extinguishers are scattered around the treehouse including one in each bedroom for your use in an emergency. Designated operational windows in each room are available for quick escape using a ladder in case of fire. Do not use these items unless there is an emergency. If there is an emergency dial 9-1-1. EACH VISITOR AND GUEST SHALL CONDUCT THEMSELVES IN A RESPONSIBLE MANNER SO AS NOT TO ENDANGER THE LIVES OF OTHER GUESTS OR VISITORS CAUSE DAMAGE TO THE PROPERTY THEMSELVES OR OTHERS OR CONSUME ALCOHOL TO EXCESS OR USE ILLEGAL DRUGS.

Disclaimer: We cannot control nor are we responsible for any acts of nature. This includes but is not limited to; weather insects rodents or the presence of wildlife (bugs deer squirrels raccoons bats skunks wild hogs armadillos snakes etc.).

Liability / Risk Management: Inherently we do as much as possible to make our treehouses and the outside activities as safe as possible. All activities involve a certain inherent risk or injury up to and including death. It is expressly understood and agreed that neither the owner nor HPT Air Castle LLC shall be liable for any damages or injury to guest guest‚Äôs guest or their families or to any of their property from whatever cause arising from the occupancy or use of the premises by guest and his/her family and guests. If an unregistered guest damages property is injured or causes liability then the person making the reservation is personally liable and responsible for the acts of the unregistered guest.

Property Do‚Äôs / Don‚Äôts:

¬∑ No house parties

¬∑ All visitors must be registered and have a signed Assumption of Risk and Release from Liability Agreement on file prior to the commencement of their stay; a visitor may be replaced or added with at least seven (7) day notice to HPT Air Castles LLC and having the new or replacement visitor sign and return to HPT Air Castles LLC the Assumption of Risk and Release from Liability Agreement

¬∑ Exceeding maximum occupancy of any unit results in a $100 /person/per day charge

¬∑ There is a $20.00 service fee + postage for any items left behind that we mail to you

¬∑ No pets allowed. If non-compliant $150 charge will be applied to credit card on file

¬∑ No smoking inside. If non-compliant $150 charge will be applied to credit card on file

¬∑ Treehouses are to be left tidy. Your rate includes a basic cleaning fee any excessive cleaning that is required will result in a minimum cleaning fee of $25 to $100 plus you agree to be financial responsible for any economic loss to HPT Air Castles LLC due to any reservation cancellation or delay in reservation move-ins that are a result of excess cleaning needing to be done after your stay

¬∑ Any- type of foreign material oil or soap used in outdoor hot-tubs will result in a $50 to $100 fee

¬∑ Any items removed or damaged will result in extra fee charges including bedding and linens

¬∑ HPT Air Castle LLC reserves the right to refuse service & cancel any reservations at any time

¬∑ No ATV‚Äôs or firearms are to be used on property

¬∑ Fires are to be burned in designated locations only

¬∑ Holdovers: Don‚Äôt holdover; we need to make sure our place is tidy for the next visitors and guests. Therefore please check out by 11:00 am. Check in is at 4:00 pm. If you do not check out by 11:00 am you will be subject to a stay-over penalty which is the market cost for the next night plus an additional cleaning fee and a 10% penalty on top of the market cost for the night.

**Your satisfactory stay is very important to us and we want to correct anything that is not in working order. Please report any issues or concerns to us prior to your first night stay. We will make every effort to get it immediately fixed. We cannot honor any requests for refund or compensation for any existing concerns or issues reported after the first night‚Äôs stay.

Title: Shrove, rural idyll with breakfast hamper
Description:
Approximately 260 sq ft earth sheltered structure within our permaculture-based sustainable off-grid village. It is one of a kind in architecture and theme with colored bottles built into the wall stained glass windows center tree pillar with atrium windows above and medieval Celtic Cross above the Hobbit Hole (outside and atop) give it a Hobbit Church feel. The space The space
Heads up -- one of our Hobbit front door hinges just broke. darn it. Just a heads up. It usually takes a couple weeks to get a welder out here for such fixits.

This is a primitive cabin it DOES have running water but NO electricity (you bring your own candles BYOC). Common facilities (kitchen and bath) being shared with the larger community about 200 yds away.

*Just so everyone knows during heavy rains in our RainForest winter months sometimes the floor can get a little wet and the underground cave can be damp --Utilizing the wood stove is ideal (please bring some firewood) keeps it drier and warmer.

Breakfast nook has a Hobbit mushroom table and there is a comfy sky chair suspended for luxuriating.

Built into the side of a mountain with a seasonal spring (there are springs everywhere here in the mountainous rain forest) that runs through the house -- on purpose -- so there is often the sound of a babbling brook in the HH November thru May.

If you are looking for a unique experience in a beautiful natural area and would like to experience life in an off-grid sustainable permaculture-focused ecovillage - and all the rough roads dirt mud insects messes barking dogs mosquitos bees mice early morning roosters communal living composting toilets ongoing construction projects in remote wilderness - then we invite you join us in our mountain village!

Our property encompasses 160 acres of pristine natural wilderness in Northern California\s beautiful Smith River canyon - home of the only un-dammed river in the state. Lush fern-encrusted hillsides slope down to countless spring-fed streams teeming with wildlife from cute caterpillars to (also cute sometimes!) black bears. Accessible only by forestry road from scenic Redwoon Hwy (CA-199) this is an opportunity to experience our responsible natural relationship with Mother Earth.

This location is very beautiful and quite remote so please be sure you\ve read through the full description and are prepared for certain elements of roughing it and adventure travel. The Village is also a work-in-progress so we are likely to be working and there may be construction dirt and messes around!

Amenities:

BEDDING. It seems weird and unnecessary to me honestly but (bending to some COVID requests) we are asking you to bring your own sheets/sleeping bags etc. There will be a mattress pad blanket and some sheets in a drawer if you really need/want them. We\ll call it a rustic cabin theme instead of a paranoid germophobe motif.

‚Ä¢Lighting / Electricity: Your cabin does not have electricity; we try to keep a flashlight lantern and/or candle available for your use -- but we recommend that you bring your own lights.
‚Ä¢Kitchen: The outdoor kitchen about 200yds away from the Hobbit Hole has a small propane camping stove and plenty of pots pans and utensils for your use. We do not have refrigeration but we do have a freezer (with ice packs) and coolers for storing food.
‚Ä¢Bathrooms: We use composting toilets (buckets with seats); there is an indoor toilet in the bathhouse. Hot shower in the sauna/bathhouse. It is about 200 yds on average away from most of our cabins
‚Ä¢(Lack of) Phone / Internet: Some Verizon and US Cellular service is available but AT&T and T-Mobile do not service our area. We do not have wifi.

The Great Outdoors:
‚Ä¢Domestic animals: Between the three dogs who run around at night chasing forest creatures springtime frog concerts and the early-rising chickens it is likely that there will be some animal noises occurring at unpredictable moments during the night and day.
‚Ä¢Wild animals: There are various of these that live in the forest including skunks chipmunks foxes black bears and many birds and insects. Since we have dogs and people around the wild animals tend to keep their distance from the areas that we use. If you are lucky you might spot a black bear on a hike; they are basically like big raccoons and prefer to run away from humans.

If you are looking for a unique experience and up for rustic accommodations with a few off-grid perks we welcome you to join us in our mountain paradise! Guest access Guest access
There is no key (or lock) to the Hobbit Hole. Just head up (the road) to the Lower Village common area. The Hobbit Hole is the first structure -- before the treehouse -- and just past the parking area on the right. Someone will probably be there to show you about the common areas -- otherwise just make yourself at home. It\s casual not formal.

The Hobbit House is quite private and the furthest away from amenities in our Village. We provide a portable composting toilet. Our dining hall bath house (with shower bidet and fancier indoor toilet) is about 200 yds away.
There are plenty trails to hike a swimming hole and garden benches and porch swings to enjoy the view.

The host (Dan) is sometimes around sometimes not often busy doing stuff so it\s all pretty straight forward check in yourself (no key or lock) make yourself at home community areas are obvious. But there\s almost always someone around (other residents intern woofers) to answer questions if you have them.

There is a wood-fired sauna (usable November thru May) large organic garden and edible landscaping chicken and goat pens other animal residents include dogs cats chickens fish and frogs.

From your cabin you are welcome to wander at will amongst our 160 acres of mostly steep forested land and enjoy the streams and waterfalls leading into Little Jones Creek. A stroll down the driveway and back along the forestry road is a beautiful hike in itself where you could easily spend all day in the company of only quiet woodland creatures.

We also offer custom bodywork sessions - holistic chiropractic and massage - more info available on request. Other things to note Other things to note
Driving here: You do NOT need 4WD or any special vehicle to reach our property. We drive in and out regularly in our small Honda hatchback and have had hundreds of visitors drive up in their regular cars. Indeed the forestry road has a few potholes worth slowing to 5mph but otherwise can be driven at 20mph. The rainy winter season creates puddles but actually better traction than in summer counter intuitively. The bridge ramps narrow and all you need to do is drive it slowly consciously. Pretty easy.

Note: Plenty of people have very relaxing enjoyable satisfying experiences here in our sustainable culture experiment but this happens only when reality exceeds expectations. This is where I try to talk everyone out of coming to stay with us -- MMV is NOTHING like a resort or the Marriott hotel. Think some crazy combination of camping/glamping at a rugged mountainous off-grid remote farm and sustainable community. There may be a compost pile outside your cabin after we weed the the beds around it. Our goats chickens or dogs may wake you in the morning. There are all kinds of critters here including but not limited to spiders and bears and all in between. We live here and make messes undertake all kinds of projects including big building projects sometimes. It is NOT polished not always tidy (although we really try) convenient or even (sometimes) comfortable. You may have to split your own firewood. There is plenty of raw beauty and these forementioned functionalities are how it is here as we continue working towards Shangri La!
We love our visitors and appreciate them -- if you want to understand more about our project -- visit join and/or support us -- search Maitreya Mountain Village

Title: Avon Farm House, Hot tub, BBQ area, Luxury Living
Description:
Wee Nook is a 360 square foot living space with a full kitchen and bathroom. It is tucked underground in the middle of the woods. Please come enjoy the woods farm animals trails pond and wide open space while youre here!

As JRR Tolkien said: ‚ÄúIn a hole in the ground there lived a hobbit. Not a nasty dirty wet hole filled with the ends of worms and an oozy smell nor yet a dry bare sandy hole with nothing in it to sit down on or to eat: it was a hobbit-hold and that means comfort.‚Äù The space The space
Wee Nook is a 360 sq foot house with a full kitchen bath queen bed and sofa. It boasts the most quiet spot on our property with a lovely pavilion for outdoor sitting in the middle of the woods. The hobbit hole has a live roof and several eatable plantings around this space for enjoying in spring and summer months. The fire pit in back allows guests to sit back and listen to nature while enjoying nature\s tv (a fire).

Guests can enjoy walking the trails around and through the property. As well as visiting the pond for fishing and swimming the horses goats and highland cows.

We have a cream and white dog LeeLoo that has free range of the property. She will most likely greet you upon your arrival or join you on your walk. She\s very sweet and social she just wants to meet everyone! She will bark.

**There is no internet or tv in this space. There is also very little phone service! We recommend bringing books games journals or small hobbies. If weather is supposed to be rainy you might consider bringing a computer with movies DOWNLOADED on it. (Or one with dvd capabilities.)

We are 15 miles from Loretta Lynn‚Äôs Ranch/ Waverly (west of us) 30 miles from Dickson Tn (east of us) and an hour from Nashville (east).

Other listings on the property:
https://abnb.me/QLxQi0mYsR

https://abnb.me/LPjARfoYsR

https://abnb.me/BcGwuYjUpR

https://abnb.me/Ky70EhHYsRWe do allow pets at our hobbit house. We require that all pets are up to date on all flea and tick medication and a $40 pet fee that can be left upon your departure. Please bring a blanket or sheet to cover the furniture if your pup is accustomed to being on the sofa and bed.
Please keep animals on a leash if they are not responsive to their commands! We do have farm animals that can hurt your animal if they feel threatened and vice versa. (also our dog LeeLoo and the neighborhood dog Red have free range of the property. Both are very kind and love the opportunity to play if you are willing.)

Check in is not strictly at 2pm as it is key code entry. So whenever you arrive you can unlock the door and make yourself at home.

Check out is at 10am.

Please feel free to share any photos of your experience to our Social Media page Rock N Refuge @rocknrefuge or #rocknrefuge.
