Title: Cotswold Cottage, Pool & Spa, Jacuzzi, long stays
Description:
Leafy Greens was built as a retreat center for our family and friends. It is where people would visit to refreshing their souls and mind. We work so hard to make this place to be one of the place that we can live in harmony with nature. That is why the cob houses are the right choice for us. Not only the buildings are eco-friendly but also the garden is organic. Visit here you will be able to take a deep breath and enjoy the fresh air with organic environment. It is a perfect place to getaway!! The space The space
This clay house was built for meditation course and It was designed for people to learn being with themselves that is why the function of the house is simple. The house is 35 square meter with essential facilities. It might be considered as a tiny house yet it‚Äôs comfortable for 3 people living together. It got 2 stories:-2 futons on upper area and 1 bed on the ground floor. The entire of the house was made by clay (earth) it is not only eco-friendly building but also good for our health. We believe that our body will absorb good energy from the earth this means earthy house brings you close to nature and eliminate bad energy out. It is very special house for us too special actually to keep it only for family and friends so we decided to share our paradise to everyone. Hope you would love it like we do.

DO NOT CLICK ON THE AIRBNB LINK FOR DIRECTIONS
Please only use our provided location to get here otherwise you might end up to other places.

PLEASE NOTE THAT OUR PLACE SURROUNDED BY NATURE
Our place is full of flowers and trees you might see part of nature like birds crickets frogs lizards butterflies bugs and insects in our garden dont worry they are harmless. However if you are afraid of these creatures our place might not suit you. We do not offer refunds if those creatures comes into the house but we will check the house before guests check in to make sure there is no any bugs and we have insect net please keep it close every time during stay.

Please note that clay house has a thick wall and the clay is blocked the internet reception so the internet might get slow sometime.

Please note that we are not hotel so we do not have reception to help you 24hr. However you would do our best to help you out. To check-in it is very important to read out message thoroughly in order to have a smooth arrive.

We have cat in our property. If you are allergic to cat or do not like them our place might not a good fit for you.

If more people than the number declared at the time of booking stayed the room additional fee and penalty will be charged.(Children over 3 years old is also count as 1 person).

No commercial photography shoots allowed Other things to note Other things to note
- Check in after 15:00 PM Check out before 11:00 AM
- No smoking in the house if guests break this rule we have to ask for cleaning 2000 THB.
- No durian in the house.

We can provide a pickup service to our place please book it in advance.

We have 5 bicycles you can use them for free.

Title: Indoor Pool near Goodwood  - Boxgrove Chichester
Description:
The Barkhouse is the only fully tree supported structure in the Gatlinburg/Pigeon Forge area. Located just minutes from all the major attractions in the area and only 5 miles from the Greenbriar entrance to the GSMNP. Enjoy the seclusion of 25 acres of trees with amazing views of the river and the mountains plus all the comforts of home.
The Barkhouse is engineered with a beautiful live White Pine growing through the center of the treehouse. Enjoy stargazing through the skylight. The space The space
The Barkhouse has a kitchen area with a microwave refrigerator/freezer combo toaster oven single electric burner and coffee maker. Enjoy charcoal grilling outdoors on your private deck or using the fire pit shared with the other treehouse located on the property. Spend time inside resting on yoga mats in the suspended cargo net area. Guest access Guest access
A door code will be given prior to arrival to enter the premise. Once inside the treehouse the entire (black circle) locking mechanism will need to be turned clockwise or counterclockwise to unlock or lock the door. Other things to note Other things to note
No pets!

Title: The Pool House
Description:
Looking for time away to disconnect from the city and reconnect. The Tiny Cabin (107 square feet) at Fernwood Hills might be the perfect spot nestled in the heart of South Western Ontario in a beautiful forest. Quiet cozy romantic- in the lush sanctuary of nature.

Note: No washroom in the cabin but one a short distance up the lane.

*NEW* Check out our Airbnb profile to book our other Cabin (Bracken) listing or The Studio Loft

Check out more about Fernwood Hills fernwoodhills.com The space The space
We started off offering this tiny space for day use so people just like you could come away from their office or their work and clear their mind. Just a couple years ago there were several couples that asked us if they could stay overnight and have the experience of quieting their minds. Their heads were spinning because they just needed to disconnect from all the chaos and for a day or overnight listen to their breathing and look out the windows to nature and wildlife. Here you are in the forest but not the dense part and it overlooks green space and trails. Retreat re-wind and re-fuel by yourself or with your significant other. Maximum of TWO people and both must be adults.
Important to NOTE: NO Washroom in the Cabin. There is a nice washroom with a shower but it is NOT inside the cabin. It is a TWO MINUTE drive up the lane or if you decide to walk it will take longer.

You have the option if you want to add on food delivered to your door. There might be restrictions on availability due to Covid or allergies or other situations. Just keep on reading and see further below.
Fernwood Hills offers retreats for the individual and small groups wedding ceremonies proposals and elopements and certainly anniversaries as well. We can help you with any of these or other ideas you have for your stay. Why not let us help you make a total experience!! We would love to hear from you! Ideas? Birthdays anniversaries proposals getaways surprise outings. Let us help you create the experience.....
Add on Options:
Romantic Night? Date Night? Celebration? Make this a part of your experience!!
Add on Option: $175 paid when you are here via cash or etrans
Pretty tiny lights and flowers in season in your space and a lovely food grazing board consisting of several cheeses crackers fruit veg in season nachos/dip apples/caramel stuffed mushrooms pulled pork or beef on a bun a few other hot apps Hot home made soup in season and a home made dessert.
Delivered to your space upon arrival. Some allergies cannot be accommodated. Must be ordered and confirmed before your arrival.

PLEASE CHECK WITH US BEFORE ORDERING AS SOME THINGS MAY NOT BE AVAILABLE AT CERTAIN TIMES.
The Tiny Cabin is in fact tiny at only a little bit over 100 square feet. It is intended for quiet relaxation and not for camping or parties or events. We are happy to let you have a small campfire in the provided fire pot and there is a lot of firewood around you can collect. (weather permitting- if the weather is windy or has been dry this is not possible)
*NOTE* to photographers creatives and other business owners:
Our space has become popular with photographers and other business owners for its natural light with large windows and we love working with them. However this space is not to be booked through airbnb for business uses including use as a photography studio or a work studio if you are having others or clients come in to have business with you. Those inquiries are welcome and we do that but it must be an inquiry through our fernwoodhills.com website and details will be given and pricing and availability.
You might also want to have our photographer take photos of you for a short time example: engagement or proposal then that is allowed to be requested here through airbnb. If you need clarification on this or any other questions please let us know.
This listing is ONLY for 1-2 people to book this space. No guest or person under 18 and one of them has to be over 25. All other inquiries will be directed to go to our website.

We are an agriculture property as well as a private park focused on regenerative agriculture and sustainable agriculture practices focused on health wellness education and events related to these activities.Helping to expose and immerse individuals and groups in nature and allowing others to better connect with and understand the natural world around them. We are passionate about what we do here and the opportunities we have to help others each day through our property.
Romance quiet and cozy are keywords that describe our spot.
Even if you are single the importance may not be on romance but certainly on the quiet mindfulness and disconnecting. One of our passions is personal growth and understanding yourself better as well as others. We want you to be able to ignite your dream again believe in yourself again and believe you make a difference in this world. You were made for a special purpose and we hope our quiet spaces help you to discover this in a deeper way. No live flame candles in any of our spaces
Cant wait to meet you!! Guest access Guest access
You have access with a key to the cabin. It is a tiny space just 100 square feet but has large windows and is very up-to-date and kept well. The setting is incredibly relaxing in the woods but overlooking greenspace. Not in the dense woods not totally remote yet private but rather just in a very relaxing green space area. It is right off close-by trails so access to the forest is just steps away. In the winter months when the public washrooms are closed the main lovely washroom is just a two minute drive on the property up the lane. Up until recently we rented the cabin out for 6-8 hours day-use for relaxation writing reading painting re-balancing or whatever quiet you need. It is still available to be rented for day use however many people have asked to have the overnight cabin experience.

We heat it all winter with an electric heater however we want to encourage you when it is very cold to bring a sleeping bag or extra blankets and extra warm clothes so you will be warm all the time.

If you would like to upgrade your booking you have a couple options.
Is this a surprise for a special someone? Or for each other? Or are you coming by yourself and you would just like to relax and enjoy some food without having to go out and get it all?

Romantic Night? Date Night? Celebration? Make this a part of your experience!!



Otherwise you still have the option of just the airbnb booking of the space. .....Either way just want to tell you about our add on option if someone wants it. We do have to know about allergies at booking we do accommodate vegetarians and but are not doing gluten free or vegan at the moment.
Just let us know if youe ok with doing just the space or if you\d like anything added on.
Please check with us during Covid as to the format for the food offerings. All food will be brought to your space.
Otherwise you still have the option of just the airbnb booking of the space. Either way just want to tell you about our add on option if you would like it. We do have to know about allergies at booking to make sure it can be accommodated.
Just let us know if youe ok with doing just the space or if you\d like anything added on.

Just write and let us know by messaging us when you are booking. Other things to note Other things to note
Washrooms are not in this building but are nearby a short distance. This space is designed for day use or overnight. We have a double bed in the Cabin and it sleeps two (cozy). Again please note it is not for parties camping or events. It is only for one person or max 2 but as noted already it is a disconnect spot to enjoy quiet.
It is also important to note that we are a total SMOKE FREE/Vape free location and sorry no pets because of allergies to other guests.

Title: Self contained Annex with log burner
Description:
Experience your childhood dreams of staying in a treehouse even better since this one is inspired by the Hobbit movies with round doors to enter and to access the deck. Imagine the adventure of arriving to your Hobbit treehouse by crossing a suspension bridge 15 meters up.

Wake up to a symphony of bird songs and the occasional view of monkeys. Order room service from our restaurant and enjoy it on the deck or roof-top terrace. Later go for a guided trek to a nearby secluded waterfall. The space The space
My husband and I own one of Bali‚Äôs most unique boutique eco-resorts Sebatu Sanctuary which includes the Hobbit treehouse and eight other distinctive accommodations.

We‚Äôve designed the Hobbit Treehouse for adventurers with one-of-kind features that includes a suspension bridge that leads to the rooftop terrace a loft for kids (at least 7 years old) a queen-sized swing sofa on the ground floor a balcony to enjoy breakfast with a view a semi-outdoor bathroom and a bedroom with arched windows on three sides providing views of the surrounding forest and terraced rice paddies.

Begin your day with a sumptuous breakfast choosing from an array of Balinese and western dishes prepared by our in-house chef. Room service is available and you can dine either on your balcony or go even higher up to the roof-top terrace and enjoy sublime views of the terraced rice paddies across the valley. At the end of the day tuck yourself into a top-of-line queen-size bed 400 thread count cotton sheets. Our boutique eco-resort is compliant with the Green Globe and Earth Check sustainability standards. To reduce our environmental footprint the treehouse doesn‚Äôt have air conditioning but does have a high quality ceiling fan. We‚Äôre 600 meters above sea level and nights are typically quite cool.

Title: Roundhouse Indoor heated pool FREE AIRPORT PARKING
Description:
SPECIAL MONTHLY RATES

Our Bali based jungle creation. Space and home for all-around creatives and life explorers. Welcome to be a guest in a tropical vibe. Stay create rest enjoy and meet each other.

This 60-year old traditional Sumatran Karo house made of ‚Äúeternal teak wood is a very special holiday accommodation for an adventurous couple. The space The space
This 60-year old traditional Sumatran house made of ‚Äúeternal teak wood is painstakingly renewed by hand without missing a bit of its authenticity.

The declined walls were originally meant to keep the wild tigers away the floor lifted off the ground was supposed to save food kept indoors and the little path around the house was made especially for guarding spirits of the household.

This unique house is beautifully decorated with rugs batik cushions and furniture made of recycled wood ‚Äî a very special holiday accommodation for an adventurous couple.

All the facilities are situated in a next building but are used privately by the tenants of the house.

Title: Priors Mesne Coach House, Wye Valley
Description:
Have you dreamed of staying in a Hobbit house but with luxury? The opportunity can be found at Fjone in Nissedal municipality.

The cabin is equipped with kitchen (2 hotplates fridge sink and everything you need) coffee machine is ready for use beds are made up and towels are ready.

This summer you can enjoy sandy beaches by the lake Nisser marked mountain hikes climbing museum Norways smallest cable ferry and much more. This winter there are nice cross-country skiing opportunities and there is a short way to Vr√•dal and Gautefall Ski Center. The space The space
Our Hobbit House is one of very few of these mini-houses in Norway. The house is private but easily accessible. Spacious parking space is located right by the house. Natural outdoor area with fireplaces and cozy seating. Within 10 minutes walking distance there is a sandy beach otherwise good hiking opportunities in a direct area. The nearest shops are in either Nissedal (ferry over Nisser) or Treungen (2 miles). Caf√©/restaurant and beer brewery we have at Fjone.Guest access Other things to note Other things to note

Title: Le Clos de Blisse - Juno Lodge
Description:
Unique experience ! Clean/Sanitize and secluded.
Enjoy a weekend or a few days eco-friendly retreat in an architectural geometric masterpiece on 30 preserved acres just minutes from all that Rhinebeck and the Hudson Valley have to offer.
The house is an open plan and though it has zero bedrooms it can sleep 3! The space The space
At the entry porch an orb of wood carved out of the house will welcome you into a play of geometry. Situated around one main volume and open to the second level the kitchen is placed in the center.
There is a futon queen bed 1 sleeper futon sofa one single futon bed.
Instead of fossil fuel the house is heated geothermally. Instead of grid power the house has electricity from the sun. We are sensitive to the environment and respect its ecological balance.
There is A HYBRID HEAT/COLD unit on the2nd floor.
The wood stove is highly efficient and keep the space warm in the Hudson Valley winter. Guest have access to a large supply of wood stacked outside the house. (Tip about the stove : Build the fire like a tipi and add wood in a vertical position to make sure the fire will be strong and well maintain)
The design allows the air to flow when all the doors and windows are open in addition the floor heat is connected to be cooling in the summer.
Outside of the kitchen there is a dinning table with 4 chairs and a Charcoal BBQ (we do not provide charcoal or starter ).
We do not accept Pets of any kind guest bringing pets will be charge an extra 200$ cleaning fee.

Title: * Jurassic coast, Swallow Cottage - Access to Indoor Pool & Dog friendly
Description: Turner‚Äôs Grain Silo!!! 25 minutes from downtown Nashville: This converted grain silo is absolutely one of a kind!!! In fact we are only 1 of only a few silos in the United States offered by AirBnB!....pretty cool!! Tucked away among the trees you‚Äôll be able to relax in our unique home. We are just far enough away from the hustle & bustle of the city to rest your mind & body but close enough to be able to enjoy all that our great community has to offer! The space The space\nSECLUDED! WE ARE NOT IN A NEIGHBORHOOD!!! The inside of the silo is not at all like the exterior! We offer modern conveniences with contemporary style! This labor of love took 5 months & we have put our hearts into every aspect of this silo! Spray foam insulated with central heat & air conditioning! The kitchen is stocked with pots pans cooking utensils dishes a 2-burner stove-top microwave full-sized fridge & an assortment of spices. Lots of snacks including breakfast items are provided. All the toiletries one could imagine are available as well as full-sized shampoo conditioner & body wash-high quality too not the off-brand stuff!! We hope our guests enjoy the serenity of the location & ask that respect is given to other guests on the property. Because of the uniqueness of the structure no children under the age of 13 are allowed to stay.

Title: Beech Tree Cottage @ The Manor Mill near Exmoor
Description:
TUDOR IN THE PINES

Hidden amidst the dense foliage of Baguio City‚Äôs pinewood forest Tudor in the Pines is a remarkable estate in the Philippines compromising of seven (7) unique residences within a gated property accommodating a maximum of 30 guests. With the convenience of multiple road accesses to and from the city and to different highland provinces of the Cordilleras. Tudor in the Pines is perfectly located as your home base to travel the Northern wonders of the Philippines. The space The space
The space
Tudor in the Pines features a variety of amenities exclusive to our guest. During your stay in our calm and peaceful estate stroll through our private garden enjoy a picnic with a fully equipped barbecue pit share stories around our roaring fire pit have a tea in our Glasshouse Lounge and make memories with our lush pine forest sceneries majestic mountain views and breathtaking sky views from our Black Tower.

PINE NEEDLE TREEHOUSE
Dwell amongst the pine trees across a hanging bridge and timber deck 30 feet above the ground is quite an experience for the adventurous.

The Pine Needle treehouse features full view of expansive pine tree forests.

Immerse yourselves among the fresh pine trees across the hanging bridge or dine in the timber deck 30 feet above the ground a truly unique experience for the adventurous. Within the gated estate of Tudor in the Pines the Pine Needle Treehouse can accommodate a MAXIMUM of 2 guests.

Guest Reminder: Expect some movement to the treehouse because it is attached to the Hanging bridge.

Title: Safari Tent at Pennard Hill Farm
Description:
Unique secluded and very close to the Crocodile River Ndida is the ideal nature-escape for those who enjoy privacy quality and style. This is the true bushveld experience.

The river is just a 1-min walk so listen-out for Hippo and Elephant by day and Lion and Hyena by night.

Two traditional bedrooms (1 queen & 2 single beds) with another queen on the mezzanine ‚Äì house sleeps 6. Two toilets 1 bath and 3 showers (2 outdoor).

The resident Bushbuck Warthog and Bushbaby await your arrival. The space The space
Architectural gem set deep amongst the trees and only a 1-min walk from the Crocodile River and the World-reknown Kruger National Park.

Spanning two 2000m2 plots and bordered on all sides by large areas of pristine bush/parkland the house offers a level of privacy that is difficult to match anywhere in Marloth Park.

The house also sits on the confluence of two dry riverbed systems so is completely surrounded by dense jungle-like riparian woodland ‚Äì providing much-needed shade in Summer and exceptional privacy all-year-round.

But these tangled vines hoisted between mature Leadwood Knobthorn and Marulas dont only benefit humans theyre also fantastic cover for birds and for all the other animals that call Ndida home ‚Äì e.g. Eastern (Yellowspotted) Nicator Giant Plated Lizard and the nights most enthusiastic guest (and the cutest) the Lesser Bushbaby (who love banana btw).

The heated outdoor showers are a must ‚Äì even during the mild Lowveld Winter its a true privilege being out there whilst a troop of Banded Mongoose scurry past on their daily raid (searching for insects reptiles and rodents).

One of the best locations within Marloth Park ‚Äì very close to the Crocodile River but without compromising on privacy. Again Ndida is the true bushveld experience.

Ndida launched on 29th October 2018 so almost everything inside the house is pretty much still brand new and also top-quality. Please let us know (in your review) if theres anything weve missed from our inventory ‚Äì we want it to be perfect. Other things to note Other things to note
IMPORTANT: Marloth Park has a very strict NO NOISE policy ‚Äì this means NO loud music NO parties NO shouting etc. Law-Enforcement and the Community Policing Forum respond to noise complaints immediately with a fine of R3500.

PLEASE NOTE: Power outages / load-shedding is a very serious problem in South Africa and Marloth Park is also being badly affected. Please make sure you bring your own torches and that you locate the candles provided as soon as you arrive at Ndida.

Although the bush poses its own dangers and threats to adults (snakes scorpions etc.) it is obviously even riskier for little ones. In addition (see photos) the property has a partially exposed mezzanine level stairs (without a banister) a raised swimming pool and raised decked patio (without handrails) ‚Äì so please please keep a close eye on littler children.

Also proper wifi coverage hasnt reached the area yet so sadly wifi isnt an option. Also for now we have decided to keep the environment as natural as possible so there is no TV or DVD either ‚Äì however if our valued guests are critical about this in their reviews we will obviously do something about it.

Title: Summer Lodge
Description:
‚ÄúThe best possible combination between the postcard-perfect cliffside suites of Santorini (Greece) and a hobbit house...The white stone cottage flows around 900 sf which contains a nice bathroom full kitchen and plenty of nature-inspired furnishings.‚Äù Boston Magazine - Travel.

You are the only guests in the domes which are attached to our home a stone cottage with eye brow architecture. Enjoy gardens meadow woods and mountain views.

We are 25 minutes from Manchester and Bennington VT. The space The space
‚ÄúThe best possible combination between the postcard-perfect cliffside suites of Santorini and a hobbit house.‚Äù Boston Magazine
You will be the only guests! The entire place is yours! The domes feature free WiFi a kitchen with microwave stove/oven refrigerator drip and single serve coffee maker tea snacks and a bathroom with heated tile floor. The bedroom has a queen size bed and the full bathroom includes a shower/tub heated tile floor hairdryer soap and shampoo. You will enjoy sitting by the thermostatically controlled propane-fueled ‚Äòwood‚Äô stove when there is a seasonal chill in the air. Guest access Guest access
The domes are completely private. You alone have use of the interconnected domes. We live in a completely separate living space. Outside you have access to an outdoor gas grill patio and our 10 acres of woodland and meadows. Take a walk on the road that leads to the town hall just over a mile away.Other things to note
Check out our Guidebook!
Getting around - 10 minutes to Arlington VT 25 minutes to Manchester VT 25 minutes to Bennington VT and less than an hour to Saratoga Springs NY 4.5 hours to NYC and under 4 hours to Boston. The Battenkill River is 3 minutes away for swimming fishing kayaking and canoeing. Hiking the base or up to the summit of the highest peak in southern Vermont Mount Equinox is a popular activity. Afterward head into Manchester at the base of the mountain a great place for brews dining art galleries and shopping. The Appalachian Trail is within a 5 minute drive from Manchester. In the winter season downhill and X-Country skiing are within an hour. The two closest downhill mountains are Bromley (35 minutes) and Stratton (50 minutes).

Title: Patch: Beautiful country cottage with outdoor pool
Description: Heavot Caves ( Not all those who wander are lost ) will let you enjoy and live a true fairy tale experience it is part of a retreat located at a distance of only 10 km from Shimla . This place is personification of Tranquilitysurrounded by lush green mountains located perfectly to give you a 360 degree view of the Himalayan mountain ranges . Rarely do you find a retreat that is embodied by the essence of nature taking your mind off everything that is apparent . Enjoy Peace and serenity . The space The space\nComfy Dome Shaped Room with a lawn in front and surrounded by Himalayan mountain range Our place is surrounded by the whistling pines and the Room are situated in the middle of a green Valley . We are far away from the city hustle- bustle. You will enjoy an exceptional beauty of landscape including birds and a great variety of flora. The scenic view the refreshing air and the dazzling sight of the sun descending behind the mountains adds to the solace. It is a perfect getaway and if you are looking for rejuvenation and a surreal experience this should be your holiday destination. Space consists of a bedroom with an attached Bathroom the bathrooms are well tiled and fitted with modern Sanitary Ware . everyday toiletries and bath linens are provided . the room has a wall mounted flat screen LED TV and a big lawn in front .Guest access\nOne Bedroom in a beautiful resortLawnrestaurantSmall nature trails around the propertyParking Area .Other things to note

Title: The Bakehouse. Eco-friendly vegan country annexe
Description:
Iconic 1970s PNW home on Alderbrook Creek with Skyroom views of the Hood Canal and Olympic Mountains. Surround yourself in nature with two levels of wrap-around decks or walk amongst the treetops on the Skyroom balcony. This one-of-a-kind home sleeps 11 with three bedrooms and 3.5 baths. Perfect for a group retreat family getaway or reunion!

** Please read all listing descirptions & photo captions before booking instantly to make sure the space suits your needs. ** The space The space
Recently renovated with modern comforts and decor this house retained many of the original 1970s fixtures and designs that have been preserved to keep this home as unique as when it was built! At over 2400 square feet the Skyhouse features several options for gathering indoors or out. All sleeping spaces have doors and no bedrooms share walls allowing for privacy even for large groups. The primary bedroom has a king bed and full sized sofa bed. There are two sleeping spaces on the lower level: a pull out sofa & cot in the rec room (which has a door for privacy); and a cozy bedroom with a king bed. There is also a guest suite with a queen bed private entrance 3/4 bathroom and wet bar. The guest suite master bedroom/bathroom kitchen and dining room are all on the main level (for guests who avoid stairs). The climb to the top of the tower is about 98 steps depending on where you start your climb. At the top the Skyroom features 8 foot sliders with views to the north east and west. Enjoy views from the Skyroom\s wrap-around balcony. There is a half bath just below the Skyroom so you can enjoy the views as long as you\d like!

Title: Holiday cottage 2 people 30 m2 10 minutes from Honfleur
Description: Unique stay in the bunkhouse grain bin this bunkhouse is a 15 foot round grain silo that has been transformed into a loft one bedroom tiny home this tiny home does have natural well water the property is shared with the property owner although you will not see very much of them they will drive in and out of the driveway on the 27 acres you have your own seating outside with a fire pit area if youre traveling for business or just a nice getaway Come and stay at Loves Hideaway. The space The space\nThis one bedroom is a tiny home though this is unique the height upstairs is 5. 7 when you get to the top of the stairs so you do have to lean over so you do not hit your head on the ceiling light there is a TV upstairs and one downstairs there is A washer dryer combo the home has everything you need sheets towels dishes coffee pot a Keurig K-cup silverware pot and pans Due to events that have happened with our farm animals pets are not allowed anymore that includes Service animals we are very sorry for this inconvenience. Also Due to some recent events with some of our guests we do now have Ring cameras that look on the parking near the tiny house this is just to see when people come and go there are some trail cams on the walking trails back in the woods to take pictures of the dears. Other things to note Other things to note

Title: Secluded hideaway, heated pool, walks, fossils
Description:
Retreat to your own private modern oasis with the best views in all of Tennessee. Perched on top a private 36-acre hilltop (the highest outside the Park!) Belltop offers unparalleled views of Wears Valley and the Smoky Mountains. With 360-degree views from floor-to-ceiling windows and a rooftop walkway you wont miss a single sunset! Unplug and unwind as you sit in your private hot tub or curl up in front of the stunning open-hearth wood-burning fireplace. Perfect for families or friends. The space The space
This custom-built modern 4 bedroom/2.5 bath house sleeps up to 6 guests. A secluded natural retreat -- perfect for couples families reunions or small groups of friends. Perched atop a private 36-acre hill the house offers spectacular views of the Smoky Mountains and the valley both indoors and outdoors.

Guests will take the private driveway to the top of the hill. Please note the driveway is gravel windy and reasonably steep -- so anxious or new drivers may not be comfortable -- and in the winter guests should plan to arrive in 4-wheel or all-wheel drive automobiles. As you pull up to the house youll catch a glimpse of the beautiful views the house offers.

Step inside the front door into the modern open-concept living room. Anchored by a beautiful open-hearth fireplace and framed by panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows the living room offers plenty of room to relax unwind and catch up with friends. It is complete with a piano record player library and a selection of games for guests to enjoy. The living room opens up to the dining area and the kitchen. Youll find stunning views from all three areas. The exterior walls of the room are all glass and there are several doors to the patio and yard for easy indoor-outdoor living. An outdoor grill and dining table are perfect when the weather is nice. Behind the kitchen is a small laundry room which guests are welcome to use and there is also a half bath off the living room.

Want to see the best views? Take the spiral stairwell next to the front door to the observation deck. Step outside at the top and take in the best views in Tennessee! With unblocked 360-degree views you can see the whole area. Because the stairs are long and there are open areas on the observation deck (see photos) guests with mobility issues and young children should skip the observation deck. Dont worry -- the views at main level are incredible too!

Step off the living room or walk down the hall to access the master suite. Featuring floor-to-ceiling windows a custom king-sized bed expansive closet space and a spacious bathroom the master suite is a perfect retreat. The master suite offers the best access to the hot tub which is neatly tucked away on the private patio.

Beyond the master suite guests enter the second half of the house which is home to three additional bedrooms a full bathroom and a play/lounge loft. A small bedroom at the front with a twin-sized daybed is a great option for a younger guest. At the back there are two additional king-sized bedrooms each with a private patio. They share a full bath which has a separate bathing room so multiple guests can use the facilities at the same time. In the hallway between the bedrooms there is a metal staircase (see photos -- not ideal for bad knees or toddlers) which leads to a secluded loft space -- perfect for teens it offers a variety of games a television and a sleeper sofa.

We aim to deliver the most comfortable stay possible. All of our beds are equipped with new memory foam mattresses which promise wonderful nights sleep. Guest access Guest access
24/7 no-contact self check-in.
House access is via electronic lock so guests will be allowed to come and go at their convenience.

Because of the driveway we do recommend guests try to plan their arrival during the daylight hours. While certainly not impossible it can be a bit uncomfortable climbing the driveway for the first time at night. Other things to note Other things to note
Internet: The house is on intended to be a retreat offering guests an option to unwind and unplug. The house is remote and does NOT have unlimited internet. While there is wifi we generally ask guests to keep its use to a minimum. If you are planning to do a lot of online work or streaming during your stay this may not be the best option for you.

Pets: Well-behaved house-trained dogs are welcome. However because dogs create a bit more mess and require more cleaning time there is an additional pet fee of $20 per dog per night. You can include your pets as adults in your guest count or if your pets push your total guest count over our maximum (6) please let us know and we will send a separate request after booking for the pet fee. We do ask that guests: (1) clean and pick up after their pets while on the property and (2) do not leave their pets unattended for extended periods of time. If you bring your pet you are also assuming full responsibility for them and any damage they may cause. Additional cleaning or repair fees may apply if your pet is destructive.

Guest Count: Please make sure your guest count is accurate and includes all guests (including children) who will be joining you during your stay as your guest count will affect the price of your stay. We welcome groups of up to 6 people. The nightly rate reflects the price for our standard occupancy 1. For each additional guest beyond the first (up to 6 total) we charge an additional guest fee of $20 to cover additional cleaning utilities and wear and tear.

Parties: We do not allow parties at the house. No guests outside of those included in the reservation are permitted on the property during your stay. Please make sure that your guest count accurately reflects the number of people you have invited to the property with you. If you plan to have additional guests for only a portion of your stay please let us know so that we can adjust the guest fee accordingly.

Description:
One of a kind cozy hobbit house with hot tub.
Beautiful setting offering you the ultimate getaway. 5 minutes from the village of Pawling with Metro North railway access.
2 bedrooms w/ king size beds 2 bathrooms each with walk in shower. A queen size pull out couch in living room. Electric fireplace in living room.
Perennial gardens 3 patios waterfall bbq grill 2 hammocks and 2 fire pits.
**No children under 12.
**No pets. (Due to allergies)
**No parties.
Ring Quests upon request! The space The space
Our house is a cozy private getaway.
We do not allow children under 12 for safety reasons.
We do not allow pets. (Due to allergies)
We also do not allow parties or smoking at the hobbit house. Other things to note Other things to note
We do have WiFi but access may be spotty due to our private location.

Title: Three Bedrooms With Own Pool, Isle of Wight
Description:
Old mill (walnut oil) restored by combining the modern with the charm of stone.
This 27m2 house is located in the upper part of Chinon not far from the royal fortress. Located 1.3km from the city centre (25min walk free lift) The space The space
The accommodation consists of an equipped kitchen (oven stove refrigerator dishwasher dolce gusto coffee maker coffee tea and basic condiments for cooking are available on site) living room with sofa bed and TV.
In the bathroom you will have access to a washing machine.
The bedroom is on a mezzanine level (accessed by a ladder) and has a double bed. Bed linen as well as sheets are provided.
The old mill has private parking as well as a terrace with barbecue for sunny days.
The accommodation can accommodate 2 people.

The cleaning is not included in the price you will have on site all the necessities to leave the accommodation in the same condition as when you arrived. If you dont want to do this you can book a cleaning service in advance for ‚Ç¨50.Guest access
Access throughout the property private parking terrace

Title: Cosy barn conversion with connecting indoor pool
Description:
Come experience TINY HOME living SILO STYLE on a family owned Missouri farm... complete with Nigerian Dwarf goats miniature donkey chickens and more.
The Silos at Prairie Vale are between Sedalia Missouri and the little town of Green Ridge Missouri. The farm is only about 12 miles from the Missouri State Fairgrounds in Sedalia and 2 1/2 miles on paved road from the Katy Trail. The space The space
The silo apartment has a full kitchen with a refrigerator microwave stove and some utensils/ pans. There is a kuerig coffee maker along with a selection of coffee tea or other beverage pods for you to enjoy. The silo has its own onsite bathroom with a shower linens and hairdryer for guests to use. There is a double bed in the loft and a futon that expands into a second double bed on the lower level. The silo will comfortably sleep four people. Please use caution as you ascend and descend the staircase. It was made to fit the space available and the steps have varying widths. Guest access Guest access
Guest check-in is flexible. The silo will be open and ready for registered guests on their arrival. We live on the farm and are only a few yards away. Please do not hesitate to call on us for anything that you might need. We would love to visit with you. You are welcome to come to the farm house. Wendy LOVES tea so we have a coffee and tea bar in the kitchen. Wendy has every flavor of tea imaginable and she is always brewing a pot (coffee is available too) for anybody who wants to share one with her. We have a large library of movies for guests to borrow. Guests are welcome to sit on the patio or on the big wrap around porch and play with our outdoor farm cats (they are VERY FRIENDLY!)
We have several bikes that Katy Trail riders can rent for the day. We also have fishing poles that can be borrowed if fishing in the pond sounds fun. There is a fire pit by the pond that guests can use. We have roasting forks that can be borrowed...and probably the makings for smores...if our youngest daughter hasnt eaten all the Graham crackers.

Title: Cottage with tennis court and pool
Description:
The StarsBOX¬Æ is located on the shores of Lago delle Portette at an altitude of 2388 meters in the heart of the Maritime Alps Natural Park. The access path starts at Terme di Valdieri and it takes about 3 hours to reach the StarsBOX¬Æ. Once you reach the E. Questa mountain refuge you will be welcomed by the Host Marco who will show you the way to reach your StarsBOX¬Æ just a few minutes away. The shelter near the StarsBOX¬Æ offers a kitchen and access to services. The space The space
StarsBOX¬Æ strives to embody a lighter and more conscious way of experiencing nature thanks to its immersive design. StarsBOX¬Æ is more than just a shelter: it combines the concept of home with travel and represents a box of dreams where you can admire the stars and experience a fresh new dawn. Part tent and part hut it offers shelter but can open to the sky to reveal all the beauty nature has to offer. Guest access Guest access
From the parking lot of Terme di Valdieri an hour-long hike along a dirt road leads to the Rifugio Valasco once a hunting fort of the kings of Italy. From here the road continues as a mule track up to an altitude of about 2000 meters where at a larch tree a path branches off to the left and leads to the E. Questa mountain refuge. The walk from the parking lot of Terme di Valdieri takes about 3 hours in total.

From the larch tree it is also possible to continue on the mule track and reach the refuge with a less steep but longer path passing by the lower lake of Valscura; the walking time is about one hour longer.Other things to note
Mountain trails can be difficult for inexperienced hikers. Be sure to take a look at the trail before you begin your adventure and bring a printed map as cell phones may not work.

Title: quiet in Etretat
Description:
√ñ√∂d house is an ideal getaway for couples. Very isolated location with sea view creates a special kind of vibe. Great hiking trails or option to go horseback riding nearby offer plenty of opportunities for enjoying the scenic outdoors.

We are located an hour car drive away from Tallinn in a tiny seaside village called Alliklepa on the North coast of Estonia. Here you will find an ideal mix of lush forests with plenty of hiking trails or seaside with sandy beaches ideal for swimming. The space The space
√ñ√∂d mirror house is one of the most unique experiences you can imagine for being one with nature while at the same time enjoying all the comforts of a tiny cabin. The 18 m2 house has full glass windows on three sides giving you a panoramic view to the surrounding nature straight from bed. The house has a comfy bed for two a fireplace remotely controlled floor and air heating systems water toilet a shower. Fully equipped tiny kitchen with refrigerator and a stove for cooking gives you the perfect opportunity to spend undisturbed time here without leaving to the city for days. Other things to note Other things to note
Make sure you have enough food and drinks to fully enjoy your stay as the closest shop is 20min drive away. Tap water is perfectly drinkable.

Title: Luxury Lake Side Holiday Lodge Sleeps 4
Description:
Welcome to the Sypes Canyon Silos! This listing is for silo #2 on the right side. Located just 5 miles from downtown Bozeman 8 miles from Bozeman/Yellowstone Airport and 2 miles to the conveniences of Target Costco and other big box stores the Silos exude the quiet of the country life. Nestled at the base of a ridge in the Bridger foothills you have easy access to both Bozeman and the great outdoors.

Bridger Bowl-18mi
Big Sky-48mi
Yellowstone-90mi The space The space
Whats more unique than sleeping in a former grain silo? Cozy and eclectic this unit has all the comforts and conveniences you need to enjoy your time in Bozeman. Wifi Smart TV full kitchen washer/dryer. Please note that there is a short ladder to access the bedroom/loft space (imagine a 5 rung stair/ladder hybrid).

The silo on the left can be combined with this one.Guest access
Full unit and patio hiking trails on 42 acre property fire pit visit with the animals!Other things to note
Please keep in mind that all beds are in the same space: 1 queen 1 full size sofa sleeper and 1 floor mattress that is actually a foam floor chair that flips into a single bed. Also the ceiling height in the bedroom is much lower near the walls. Please mind your head!

Title: Luxury 2 bedroom barn with pool and tennis court
Description:
Nesbitt is a land boat set in its own private garden overlooked by 3 donkeys. She has electricity full cooking toilet and showering facilities on board albeit all quite compact!
Ideally suited for a couple or small family.
A peaceful and quite getaway surrounded by animals trees & farmland just 10 mins drive from Kinsale and 5 mins from some fantastic beaches. An ideal base for exploring the south of Ireland. Somewhere quirky and different. Great for little ( & big) imaginations. The space The space
Nesbit is a 37ft land based boat. She was destined for the scrap heap but we completely transformed her over an 18 month period. Almost everything in her has been recycled. She is bright cosy and a funky little place to stay to enjoy the beautiful local countryside. She has full self-catering facilities. There is a bedroom with a triangular shaped double bed a galley kitchen with sink hob grill microwave kettle toaster and small fridge. The living space has a comfortable seating area with a table that converts to a single bed suitable for an adult. Also on board is a bijou bathroom/wetroom with toilet wash hand basin and electric shower.
The living space is all on one level. There is electric heating in the boat so it is suitable for winter living. There is a big private garden area with the boat with a picnic bench and sand pit. Guest access Guest access
The boat with its own private garden overlooked by donkeys
and the occasional cow. There is an electric fence between the boat garden and donkey field and we would ask guests not to enter the field with the donkeys. Other things to note Other things to note
Nesbitt is available on a self catering basis only.
The table in the seating area converts to make a single bed.
The ceilings in parts of the boat are a little low.
A travel cot is also available if you need one.
We are happy to accept a small to medium sized dog in the boat but we would be grateful if they did not sleep on the furniture and are kept on a lead at all times as we have donkeys cattle and free roaming hens in close proximity.

Description:

Title: Norman cottage 10 minutes from Honfleur
Description:
The Antler House

Striking contemporary by Andrew Geller

3BR/2BA w/ large outdoor entertaining deck great room one-of-a-kind vacation experience

Designed and built by famed architect Andrew Geller in 1968 the Antler House was fully restored and updated in 2019 and has been featured in Dwell Magazine (Nov/Dec 2019) DesignBoom Archinect Curbed etc.. The home also won an AIA Honor Award for restoration in 2020. The house has never been offered for rent and is a true gem for lovers of midcentury modern architecture and design. You can expect a \one of a kind\ vacation experience in this internationally recognized architectural masterpiece with impeccable interior design including designer finishes period correct details and . The way the Hamptons was supposed to be with a focus on escapism back to nature and total privacy. The home is like living in your own Wes Anderson movie with it\s whimsical adventurous even wild spirit. It is one of a handful of Andrew Geller houses that still exist in the Hamptons and one of a few that have been restored to better than new condition. The Antler House is a 3-story 3-bed and 2-bath with a large outdoor entertaining deck. An \upside down\ house with two bedrooms on the first floor a great room and entertaining deck up on the second story and surrounded by a forest canopy and a private 3rd story loft bedroom up above the tree tops. Just a few blocks from the beach but nestled in a woodsy forest the home is the best of both worlds - a modernist beach house and a cozy cabin. Set on a very private 1.1 acre lot on the Amagansett/East Hampton border of Historic Springs it\s an easy drive or Uber to all the best hotspots and just down the street from the famous Springs General Store as well as kid-friendly and picturesque Louse Point beach.

Rental ID: #20 - 879

This property has a max occupancy of 6

Bedrooms

Bedroom 1: One Queen Bed First Floor/Main Floor Air Conditioning Ensuite Bathroom Closet Balcony/Deck

Bedroom 2: One Queen Bed First Floor/Main Floor Air Conditioning Closet Balcony/Deck

Loft Bedroom: One Queen Bed 3rd Floor Air Conditioning

Bathrooms

Bathroom 1: Full Bath First Floor/Main Floor Ensuite Handicap Accessible Shower

Bathroom 2: Full Bath First Floor/Main Floor Shower Tub

Outdoors
Deck/Patio Lounge Chairs (4 Chairs) Patio Furniture (Table Chairs Umbrella) Grill (Gas) Beach Chairs (2 Chairs) Beach Umbrella Beach Toys Cooler Paddle Board Fire Pit (Wood) Balcony Bicycle (4 Adult Bikes)

Amenities
Bed Linens Bath Towels Pool/Beach Towels Hair Dryer Washer Dryer Air Conditioning Heating Hot Water Wood Stove Kitchen Stove Oven Refrigerator Coffee (Pot) Toaster Blender Dishes and Silverware Pots and Pans Living Room Internet (Wifi) Television Smart TV Speaker System (Bluetooth Speaker Sonos Stereo) Private Entrance Parking (4 Cars In Driveway) Carbon Monoxide Detector Smoke Detector Fire Extinguisher Dishwasher

Special Features
Andrew Geller was one of the premiere midcentury architects remembered most of all for his playful beach houses in the Hamptons. This home the Antler House is one of his most published and celebrated homes including recent articles in Architectural Digest Dwell Archinect etc.. Staying in this home is a once-in-a-lifetime vacation experience. Private and protected by the surrounding oak forest yet just blocks from Louse Point beach it is the best of both worlds - a woodsy cabin and a stylish beach house. During summer the giant oaks create a cocoon for the property hiding it away from the rest of the world. Set equidistant between Amagansett and East Hampton the private yet close to town(s) location gives you all the best summer options without having to deal with traffic on Montauk Highway. Even during the peak of summer Montauk is just a short 15 minute drive through backroads. It\s a perfect getaway for couples or families who value midcentury architecture and decor as well as those who like to entertain on the large outdoor deck with dining bbq and stunning treetop views. The property is child safe with two bedrooms on the ground floor and no pool. A full ground up restoration was completed in 2019 including adding all modern conveniences including HVAC heated bathroom floors and a full cinematic experience with a 120 movie screen and 4k laser projector.

Location

Nearby Beaches:
Louse Point is within walking distance or an easy bike ride.

Nearby Grocery Stores:
Springs General Store and Old Stone Market are both within an easy bike ride.

Nearby Restaurants and Bars:
Amagansett main street and East Hampton are both less than 3 miles away.

Other Location Information:
On the border of Amagansett and East Hampton and a short walk from Springs Historic District.

Other FAQ‚Äôs

Backyard Fenced In: No

Estimated Square Footage: 1500

Suitability: Not suitable for multiple families unrelated guests and persons with disabilities.
Primary renter must be at least 30 years old.

Pet Policy: Pets are strictly prohibited at this property.

Utility Disclaimer:
Normal usage of the following utilities is included in the total reservation amount:
Pool Heating (if applicable) Pool/Hot-Tub Maintenance (if applicable) Heating Oil/Propane/Natural Gas Electricity Cable/TV/Internet/Phone and Garbage Removal

If the cost of utilities exceeds $40.00/night guest will be responsible for the difference. Cleanings during a guest\s stay and pay-per-view orders are not included in the cost of utilities.

Cleaning Disclaimer: All reservations longer than one week must be professionally cleaned once per week the cost of which is borne by the guest. For clarity purposes the cost of in-stay cleanings are separate and above the fees collected at the time of booking.

Additional Persons: No additional persons beyond the max occupancy of this listing are permitted.

Events Policy: Events are prohibited

Off-Season Disclaimer: It is typical that spring cleanings and updates do not take place until late April / early May. If your booking falls outside of Memorial Day to Labor Day please inquire as to whether or not outdoor furniture and equipment will be available for use prior to booking.

StayProtected Insurance: Property damage insurance is procured for your reservation for this property. It is supplemental to not a replacement to any security deposit collected.

The guest experience for this property is managed by StayMarquis a local vacation rental management company. By booking this property you will receive a dedicated ‚ÄúGuest Experience Manager‚Äù who can help facilitate any request from grocery shopping to organizing a private chef. You will also have access to 24/7 support that can assist with any question that might arise during your stay. It is important to note that any maintenance tasks are performed by the owner of this property. The space The space

Title: Peace & Comfort within a Hampshire walled garden
Description:
Sleep in the round wake up with songbirds and sunshine in our Tubismo Tube. We transformed eight reclaimed concrete tubes into cosy rooms with a view. Plunge into our saltwater pool escape to our garden-like campground and embrace the fresh air and a great night‚Äôs sleep under a starry night sky. Wether you are seeking refuge looking to meet other travelers or hang out with friends: we have the right vibe for you! The space The space
Tamanco is a campground hostel in the green heart of the Costa da Prata between Porto and Lisbon. A unique base to explore the center of Portugal. Visit the many special monuments and places in the region browse local markets discover Portuguese cuisine and drink ‚Äòum caf√©zinho‚Äô in one of the many pastelarias. Go hiking in pristine green or along the secluded beaches or endless sand dunes that stretch from Figueira de Foz to Nazar√© which with the highest waves in the world can rightfully be called the mecca for surf enthusiasts. Guest access Guest access
A Cantina Caf√© & Eatery: a meeting point for everyone!

Title: Elm Park Barn, Chewton Keynsham, BS31 2SS
Description:
Come experience glamping at its finest in our beautiful yome! (FYI glamping is still camping just a little more comfy!) Locally made a yome is a yurt/geodesic dome hybrid. You‚Äôll love the ultra comfortable queen mattress mini kitchen dining area and the warmth of the propane heater*! Enjoy all the comforts of home plus the adventure of camping. Nestled in the woods yet only 10 minutes from downtown Weaverville 10 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and 20 minutes from Asheville. The space The space
Embrace glamping to the fullest! Our yome is off-grid: no WiFi no electricity no running water and spotty cell service. Instead we have battery-powered LED lights solar lights and candles providing mood lighting - if you need bright lights I suggest bringing a lantern - a solar shower with privacy enclosure and a very clean porta-John for your use.

There is a small grill that is BYOB - bring your own briquets :) (and lighter fluid). I do provide tongs.

The mini-kitchen consists of a 2-burner propane stove (with propane) frying pan tea kettle French press cooking utensils dishes/silverware grater peeler wine key organic coffee organic olive oil sugar creamer salt & pepper.

The driveway is not very long but it is gravel steep in places and can be very bumpy! Careful if your car is low to the ground! Any car will be able to make it - we have a Jetta and a Camry in our family - but those with AWD/4WD will certainly have an easier time.

We have two dogs that have free reign of our property including at night. While they fancy themselves watchdogs - and are sure to cause a ruckus when they first meet you - they are the biggest sweethearts and nothing to be afraid of! Nellie is the small one and Maisie is the larger.

Our house is visible from the yome however there is much more distance - about 150 feet - than you would find between sites in a campground. Or a neighborhood!

Please keep in mind that because this is a tent you will be more subject to the elements/nature that you would be in a conditioned space. So check the weather before you come and dress/pack accordingly! Expect bugs spiders etc... Despite the fact that I remove all of them each time I prepare the yome for a guest some will inevitably find their way back in.

*The propane heater is provided October-March. Includes (1) 1lb canister of propane per night of stay.

Title: Ivy's Sussex sleeps 8 Swimming Pool Pet friendly
Description:
Be under no illusion this is like camping under a wooden roof! Not glamping or an hotel.
Boatel guests share the boat roofed shed with other guests and residents and no one has exclusivity on this structure.
The boat is old and dusty with the occasional spider an unusual and quirky experience!!
The views are stunning. Sorry no dogs but there are two friendly dogs that live here. And cats and ex caged chickens.The space
Set in an acre of wild flowers and up a mountain in the beautiful Dyfi Valley Biosphere the Boatel is literally a bed in a boat! Not to mention a beautiful open plan cooking and living space ‚Äì all in a shed AKA the Boat Roofed Shed. Recognised for its amazing and unique qualities it even won the infamous Cuprinol‚Äôs Shed of the Year in 2013. It‚Äôs our absolute pride and joy and we love sharing it with our guests!
We‚Äôve hosted comedy festivals exclusive concerts and curious tourists in our little mountain hideaway and Alex (aka DJ Badly) uses it to prepare his sets for festivals such as Glastonbury.
We built the shed in 2012 using recycled materials and it was our first major project. Alex is normally a rubbish DIY person so designing and building the whole thing ourselves was a great achievement and we couldn‚Äôt have been happier to win both the ‚ÄòShed of the Year‚Äô Unique Category and the Overall category in 2013.
From the shed you can see across Cader Idris (part of the Cambrian Mountains of Snowdonia). It‚Äôs so beautiful even in the maddest of weathers you can close the door light the candles pop some kindling in the wood burner and be snug and warm in moments.
Our guests all love staying in the Boatel - they love the peace the location the structure the ambience and the curios (Alex is a big collector and has been on Antiques Roadshow with his Poole Pottery collection!). As well as the relentless throwing of Frisbees for the dogs!
We supply all bedding but do not supply towels or breakfast.

Title: Mill Coach House @ The Manor Mill near Exmoor
Description: Five minutes from the village Casa Naranja offers a magnificent view over the Alto de los Migueles Valley from the balcony in the living room. Three comfortable bedrooms each with its private bathroom and roomy closets are sure to make the sojourn of the travelers a pleasant one. The interior garden with unusual succulent plants and fossil stones faces the social area bathed in the colors that gave the house its name. A modern kitchen is available for those who enjoy cooking. The space The space\nGuests will find good books in three languages good cuisine if they wish and a welcoming hostess who will recommend the best restaurants the most original shops and boutiques fun gatherings and events. Title: Westcountry house, hot tub, & outdoor heated pool
Description:
726 square feet of one of a kind 1960s futuristic lodging set down on 5 acres in the rural Hockinson hills. The space The space
Next to a year around creek among trees with hills and meadows to explore
Spaceship amenities include a wet bar(Lunar Lounge) with fridge gamma ray microwave and Mr. Fusion coffee maker.
Two futon sofa/full size beds with up to four cots available bathroom with shower TV bluray Laser disc/CD player stereo and WiFi PLUS a pair of freezing tubes(for 5+ year stays). Guest access Guest access
The Spaceship landed only about 30 feet from the hosts living quarters and can be driven right up to its front door entry hatch after traveling down a 1/3 of a mile private driveway.
After unloading parking is provided via the lower deck hangar doors on the north side of the ship. Other things to note Other things to note
Friendly natives abound!
The nearest sign of civilization is only about 1 & 1/2 miles away due west and over the hill. The Hockinson Market provides fresh made pizza and has its own Tap room. The Chevron Market provides fossil fuel.
Hocinson Meadows and Alderbrook Parks are 3 & 1/2 and 2 miles away respectively.
Further afield and to the northeast is the city of Battleground featuring restaurants a library antique shops and several breweries.

Title: The Party Barn
Description: Main dwelling - 34 ft diameter rustic wooden floors & 5 1/2 ft round windows over looking great views! Large kitchen open plan space; king bed in main living area queen bed in open loft. Retreat-writing meditation yoga dancing playing fun! Location-location!! 4 miles to town The space The space\nArchitecturally elegant and unique design situated with beautiful views. This was a big home that has been duplex-ed and is about 1100 square feet. It was designed for privacy so the entry door for the other home is on the opposite side of the house from where you enter. Very peaceful and quiet - the only house on the street. I call the area country suburbia with houses peppered in the neighborhood about 1/4 mile away. This is a monolithic dome which means a huge balloon was blown up and sprayed with concrete before the balloon was popped. That part of the house is 34 ft diameter with rustic wooden floors & two 5 1/2 ft round windows over looking great views & yard. (The yard is not totally secure for pet safety.) Large kitchen very roomy open plan space; king bed/queen bed in the loft a smart TV and selection of DVDs for your entertainment. The picture shows a ladder going to the loft but it is now a stair case. The loft has an artsy 2 1/2 foot picket fence as a wall. There is sight privacy but due to it being a half wall there is no sound privacy. Parents note: Please look at the pictures to decide if this room is child-safe for your needs. About 2 % of folks decide its not right for them.I imagine it should be no problem unless they are climbers when youre not looking! Please ask for details if youre unsure. This is a wonderful space for retreats writing meditation yoga dancing playing fun! The sister dome is about 1000 square feet - and renting both sides is excellent for smallish events/retreats. There have been a few weddings held here. Location-location!! 4 miles to town.

Title: Villa for 8 people with indoor pool.
Description:
We don‚Äôt fit easily into the categories that Airbnb has so for a clear picture read on...
Loch Lomond Hideaways is an exclusive collection of individual getaway properties consisting of four luxury indoor/outdoor cabin rooms with sheltered decking and outdoor cooking and eating facilities. The Hideaways are dog-friendly. The space The space
Three of the Hideaways are wooden cabins which also have a secluded private outdoor bath while the fourth has a double sized indoor bath. All four surround a fairytale lit garden with private outdoor areas outside each one and you‚Äôll find individual listings on Airbnb for each one for booking- click on my pic top right and select profile.

The Hideaways are a short distance from Loch Lomond and even shorter distance from the West Highland Way the John Muir Way and the Devil‚Äôs Pulpit so plenty of opportunity to get out and about or to walk your dog. There is a restaurant in the village (Croftamie a couple of hundred metres walk) and shops restaurants and pubs in nearby Drymen (2 miles). If you‚Äôre arriving from Glasgow Airport it‚Äôs about a 40-minute taxi ride.

Each property overlooks the garden with its own entrance cosy indoors and even outdoors with their own individual outdoor wood burning stoves.

The rooms have a kingsize bed (the Garden Room has a kingsize four-poster and the others have the option of kingsize or two singles) an ensuite shower and w/c. The Garden Room has a fabulous double bath in the en-suite and the Tree House Oval and Arch have fantasy outdoor baths.
The Tree House

* Kingsize bed or two singles
* Ensuite W/C and shower
* Private secluded outdoor bath
* Luxurious dressing gowns and towels
* Wi-Fi and Bluetooth speaker
* Microwave toaster kettle Nespresso coffee machine tea coffee hot chocolate
* Outdoor barbecue dining table and chairs
* Outdoor wood-burning stove with cosy seating on the deck
* Blankets and hot water bottles for the evening chill when you‚Äôre sitting outdoors
* Breakfast of porridge pastries jam butter fresh milk shortbread

The recycling is here and there‚Äôs a collection point for your used dishes. You‚Äôll also find information about the surrounding area here. Guest access Guest access
Your parking is beside the main house (The Witches Hat) and signed Loch Lomond Hideaways Car Park. The house is on the outskirts of the village of Croftamie just a short walk away and a couple of minutes drive from the larger village of Drymen with shops traditional pubs restaurants etc. Loch Lomond is a further short drive to Balmaha on the east shore or Balloch on the south west. And we are only 45 minutes by car from Glasgow city centre or Glasgow International Airport.

Title: Self contained studio apartment
Description:
This is our second tiny house concept- Yurt! Glamping!

Wee in a gated community close to everything! Guests have been enjoying the view! The sunsets! The stars! The Ocean breeze! The off-grid feeling!

If you are thinking about buying a Yurt try ours out. You will enjoy the entire yurt by our baby lavender fields with a covered patio outdoor shower (it\s really insides) and a modern compost toilet in the attached restroom right by the door.

The Yurt is built in wonderful 2020~ New&FunThe space
Our Yurt is a 294 sqft comfortable room with a queen-size memory foam bed a sofa bed a kitchenette portable AC/heater unit and etc. Its linked to the 200+ sqft patio and the attached restroom right by the door.

Its about a 100 ft walk from the parking spot to the yurt on the boardwalk.

If you need an extra bed for the 4th guest we can provide a folding camping bed.

Title: Lower Mill Estate.Cosy 1 Bedroom Cottage with Pool
Description:
The Marais de Larchant a labyrinth of canals with a view on the medieval Saint Mathurin basilica lies just West of the Fontainebleau forest close to the famous bouldering spot of la Dame Jouanne. The house rented is fully independent with 5 bedrooms 4 bathrooms 1 kitchen 1 dining room and a large drawing room. It has its own linen kitchenware and cutlery. It also has its own internet connection. Wed be happy to host you (English spoken) ! The space The space
Based on an architects design the houses main feature is its vaulted hall. At the heart of the marais canals it is perfectly quiet.
The island on which it is located will be at your disposal but the rest of the natural reserve is closed to the public. Guest access Guest access
The entire house and the island on which it is located (surrounded by canals) is at the guests disposal. Walks in the marsh and canals can be organised depending on availabilities. Other things to note Other things to note
The house is already booked on the dates of your stay ? Try the other house on the property the Courtyard House of the Marais also on Airbnb.

Bookings of 5 days and more will be given priority during holiday season.

Title: The Duck Wing, quirky dog friendly apartment
Description:
One of a kind 4BR 3BA 5200 sqft home. Stunning views of the CO Ntl Mnt and entire Grand Valley. Our grandpa a home builder designed this rustic house as a masterpiece for his family. He wanted it to be part of nature so he fit it between trees and inside left exposed the massive sandstone slab on which it‚Äôs built. This large house has entertained our family and friends for generations and we‚Äôre thrilled that now you can share it with yours too. Be in nature but minutes from downtown! The space The space
Our grandpa designed and built this unique home in a way that captures the rugged terrain on which it sits and compliments the stunning natural beauty of the Colorado National Monument that serves as the backdrop. He made it so every room has its own stunning view. Look closely at the photos to see the rock and wood detail throughout. The sandstone slab of the hill on which it‚Äôs built actually makes up the entire wall of the downstairs family room and the floor of the room above. Grandpa had artistic vision creativity and the craftsmanship to put it all together and he built this house from his heart. (He was still building furniture for us well into his 90s!). It has served as a cherished place for family gatherings and we invite you to enjoy your vacation the way we have enjoyed this home throughout the generations. Have breakfast in the kitchen or on the giant deck while enjoying unobstructed views of the Colorado National Monument and the way the morning sun hits the red rocks. Spend evenings by the massive fireplace watching the sun set over the Bookcliffs and the Grand Valley. During the summers you might catch a lightning storm over the grand valley as the thunder echoes off the massive canyon walls behind the house. We also have a charcoal grill so you can BBQ outside and take in the views from the deck. Take leisurely walks through the neighborhood or drive/bike to get to everything that Grand Junction has to offer. (See list below!)

See our video tour: search House on the Rock and Grand Junction on that big video platform that everyone uses (stated in a way that gets around a ban on mentioning websites here). :)

While most of the home furnishings are rustic and cozy in a way that preserves the years of fond memories we made sure you had enough upgraded guest amenities to make your stay as comfy as can be: we just remodeled our showers have hotel-quality linens plush towels and plenty of toiletries. You get to enjoy a vacation with maybe the most gorgeous views in the Grand Valley in a house full of charmingly-old stuff spanning generations but you still get to sleep as if you were staying in a great hotel.

Please note- we try our absolute best to keep the house clean for you and all of our future guests. For this reason we ask that you note our rules for no pets and no groups or gatherings of over 10 people. Thanks!

Please make yourselves at home while being respectful of this family treasure and peaceful neighborhood. No rowdy parties. If you need anything at all during your stay please don‚Äôt hesitate to contact the property manager who lives just down the street. Also we are listed as five bedrooms because AirBnb doesnt quite have the listing options needed for a full picture of our house. There is one bedroom off of the master bedroom that has a bed but used to be a sewing room. Its a little smaller and has a little less privacy than a normal bedroom. Also the office has a bed but we didnt list that as a bedroom. Thanks for understanding. :)

Title: Apartment with pool overlooking the harbor
Description: The Eco Coconut is nestled on the banks of the dam overlooking the Mountains. It offers a fully equipped kitchen living room with fireplace dinning area with braai and a patio with wood-fired jacuzzi. 2x Ensuite rooms 2x Outdoor showers & bath. Extra sleeper coach with separate bathroom and shower. Sleeps 6 guests. The space The space\nThe one of a kind design of the Eco Coconut makes it truly unique experience in South Africa. It almost feels like you inside a coconut on a tropical island beside a lake and overlooking the Outeniqua Mountains. The interior is calming and neutral with a bohemian flavour. The fully equipped kitchen with gas stove oven microwave fridge and Woki Ware cutlery is the perfect place to create a family meal. Cuddle up at the fireplace or relax in the wood fired hot tub. Guest access Guest access\nThe Eco Coconut is totally private and is exclusively yours for your stay. The farm is a paradise with wildlife like Buffalos Rhinos and other animals.

Title: Farm View - tranquil retreat near hills & coast
Description:
The newly renovated magical turret on the Santarella Estate in the Berkshires Western Massachusetts. This unique loft with turret bedchamber offers guests a fairytale experience. The open concept living space filled with plants brings the outdoors inside and offers ample room to relax. Guests can spend the day exploring the grounds nearby lakes trails and many nearby Berkshire towns. The space The space
Enter through a second story entrance into a large open space with a sitting area with a sofa hanging chair television and windows that offer views out into the gardens. A bohemian bedroom with full-sized bed is hidden behind a sliding door. The Turret section has a suitable kitchenette with microwave fridge small oven hot plate and coffee maker. There is also a cozy eating area with table and chairs. A large bath contains a double vanity huge shower and private water closet. The third story bedchamber awaits up a winding staircase and sleeps two in a queen-sized canopy bed.

The Fairytale TreehouseTurret is situated on 4 acres including lovely gardens beautiful lily pond a running brook and wooded area. Absolutely unique storybook experience for up to 4 quests.

Our lovely grounds are open to our guests. There are garden paths brook with stone bridges loveliest of lily ponds stone bench seating area with chiminea and firewood for guests use.

While we do not allow pets we will consider requests to allow 1 small pet with prior approval and acceptance of rules and policies.

Title: The Potting Shed - cosy country cottage
Description:
Find peace and quiet at our large family property. Hidden close to the township of Adaminaby in the Snowy Mountains of NSW is our surprising and unique accommodation - two pyramids set in our 40+ acres of pristine alpine Australian bushlands and flowering wildflower style gardens all here for you to discover on your retreat from the city. A peaceful retreat hand built by our grandparents in the 90s located close to Cooma and a short drive from Canberra Airport. Privacy and peace await you! The space The space
Built from scratch by our grandparents this property is truly unique and special you wont find pyramids set in the Australian bush land anywhere else! Two self-contained pyramids rest within established gardens overlooking undeveloped Australian bush. Surrounded by tranquility use the pyramids as a base to explore the surrounding ski fields or use your holiday to completely relax away from it all. From the hand-cut slate tiles to the pink granite surrounding the property there is so much to discover at Rocky Corner. Please note there is mobile phone reception predominantly on the Telstra network but there is no WIFI. Guest access Guest access
The pyramids are fully self-contained buildings that sit within our larger property which is called Rocky Corner. Our house is a little further up the hill so youll have privacy if you wish so. Youll have your own parking at the front of the pyramid and there is plenty of space to park further vehicles as required. The road to our property is unsealed and is suitable for normal vehicles (2WD) to travel on.
Please note: The Snowy Mountains is a rural area. There is A LOT of wildlife around all the time....please be aware if you choose to drive in the dawn or dusk this increases your risk of hitting wildlife so please do not speed or take unnecessary risks travelling to visit our property. If you hit an animal please call the local council who can direct you what to do. Other things to note Other things to note

Title: Crocus at Stancombe Manor, pool and tennis
Description:
A most unique home in the lovely pines of northern Arizona. Foxbriar is historical charming and unlike any house youve ever seen. Nestled at the foot of Thumb Butte mountain Foxbriar has a million-dollar view and set in a beautiful rural neighborhood. It is only two miles from downtown Prescott . One-of-a-kind furnishings and all the conveniences of home as well as outdoor gardens and dining areas and a gypsy wagon too. Experience an original living adventure! The space The space
Staying at Foxbriar is better than a Disneyland adventure. It is unique and thoroughly charming with all the modern amenities. Guests may opt for a small charge a tour of a Pirate Ship treehouse off-site too which was featured on TVs Animal Planet: Ultimate Treehouses II. As well there is a Gypsy Wagon on-site at Foxbriar. It can be rented for sleeping too. It features a double bed but no bathroom. The additional charge is $80 charge per night. Guest access Guest access
There is a large parking area in front of the house which is off the street and private. Other things to note Other things to note
Foxbriar is close to downtown where there are many restaurants and other activities available year round.
