Title: The Old Dairy
Description:
Stay in a beautiful contemporary architect house in a case study house style with floor to ceiling windows our cats and nature on your doorstep its an absolute experience of living indoors/outdoors with nature. Close to farmers market in nearby towns concert halls and CCS at Bard music venues in Kingston and Basilica in Hudson its the perfect hideaway from the city. For true nature & cat lovers only!

MAY & JUNE 2022 open for longterm rental - ideal for remote work or nature retreat! The space The space
Our home is an architectural concept house and a gem though please note that it is a concept house and therefore not without imperfections so for the ones who appreciate architecture and design it is not a perfect airconditioned clinical space as its situated in nature and nature is very present which in the summer means that you have animals and insects around (and yes some come into the house the insects that is) and in winter there is snow and ice and in NY state that can be plenty. So not for the faint of heart or the squeamish as its a modern house but located as a cabin in the woods at the house you will truly feel nature and nature is on your doorstep for both good and bad. Note to dog owners we are big fans of dogs but sadly the house cant accommodate any dogs during your stay.
With our house come four companions - our cats will be delighted about every guest who loves and appreciates animals and is willing to take care of them. Nothing extraordinary but feeding twice a day and some of the usual care and attentionOther things to note
We have four lovely cats who live in the house. They go in and out and are fairly independent but look forward to your company and some care and attention.

We have fresh herbs in our front garden for you to enjoy and if you come in the right season also home-grown zucchini tomatoes arugula etc. Just water them in the evening and youll get all the great harvest as reward.

Title: Luxury Studio Apartment with Pool, near London
Description:
Welcome to the Boho Hideaway‚Äîa charming bungalow located in the sought after Montrose district! Minutes away from some of Houston‚Äôs best coffee dining & nightlife. What‚Äôs our favorite thing about this home? The location! There‚Äôs plenty to see and do within walking distance or bike ride! Quick access to I-59 I-45 & 610. Within a 10 minute drive or less you can easily get to The Galleria Downtown and Texas Medical Center. The space The space
Hip comfy and clean. Soak up the vintage flair of this 1920‚Äôs bungalow overflowing with art house plants and eclectic furnishings. Our home has a private entrance and keyless access for an easier check-in experience! Boasting 4 comfortable queen beds 2 full bathrooms & Roku TV‚Äôs High-Speed Wifi. We pride ourselves in stocking our homes with everything you may need for a comfortable stay including high-quality linens full kitchen coffee bar towels & so much more. Should you need anything else during your stay please contact us! We are more than happy to accommodate you & ensure you have the perfect #HideawayHouston experience!

PARKING: Parking is only available on the street directly in front of the home.

SLEEPING: There are 3 bedrooms total in the home. One of the bedrooms has two queen beds and the rest each have one bed.

COOKING: Use our pans & utensils to chef up something yourself or reheat leftovers in our microwave. We have K-cups and a coffee maker for those early mornings too!

CHECK-IN: Check in anytime after 4pm. We have keyless entry for a more convenient check-in process. Early check-ins are on a case by case basis depending on availability. If you need to drop off your luggage earlier please contact us and we can accommodate you.

CONCIERGE SERVICE:
Anything you need is at your fingertips with our concierge add-ons like stocking your fridge luggage storage or decorating for your celebration! Let us make your trip to Houston the best trip ever!

CLEANING FEE:
We pride ourselves on providing a clean home for our guests. We hire cleaners that not only work hard but are family and friends of ours. They treat the property as their own and we pay them well resulting in a slightly higher cleaning fee. It goes back to them not some major company paying their workers minimum wage. If during your stay anything isn‚Äôt up to your standard please let us know and we will address it immediately!

The home is located in a residential neighborhood‚Äîwe ask that you please be mindful of our neighbors. Please keep any noise down after 10pm. We do not allow parties or events! Max total guests is 8 people. Additional guests MUST BE APPROVED by the host. Failure to communicate with the host about extra guests will result in violating your booking terms. Please note we have security cameras on the exterior of the home to ensure the safety of our guests our home & your vehicles.

Pictures are worth a thousand words so please feel fee to browse through our photo gallery and message us if you have any questions! We look forward to hosting you for your next Houston stay!

Some of our favorite places nearby:
The Pitt Room - .3 mi away
UCHI - .9 mi away (The BEST sushi)
BCN Taste & Tradition - 335 ft away (One of our favorite date night spots)
Siphon Coffee - .4 mi away (Seriously best coffee ever!)
The Menil- .7 mi away (One of our favorite museums) Guest access Guest access
Keyless entry & street parking available directly in front of home. Other things to note Other things to note
We have worked very hard to make your stay as comfortable as possible. Please respect care and be mindful of the surrounding neighbors so that guests can continue to enjoy the space for many years to come.

- Quiet hours start at 10 PM. We do not allow loud noises/music parties in the house.

- There are security cameras at the perimeter of house. There are no cameras inside the house.

- Please do not smoke vape use marijuana or drugs in the house.

- Street parking available directly in front of home. No parking in the driveway.

Title: Hedgehog Lodge - Secluded Luxury Log Cabin
Description:
At the heart of the Ard√®che\s natural and cultural heritage Les G√Ætes de Sylilanse welcomes you to make your stay an unforgettable memory. Take the time to recharge your batteriesdo a cure for nature calm and freshness on the Coiron plateau in Ard√®che the secret of an excellent vacation !
For more relaxation the possibility of massages by a practitioner qualified in Ayurvedic only on appointment to rent mountain bikes elec. from April to September and to book food baskets. The space The space
Come and experience a stay in a Gout d \O all made of woodunique in our region . It is in the heart of nature and the lucky ones will have the joy of seeing foxes deer deer on the threshold of their Gout d \Oand of rubbing shoulders with our donkeys !

You can enjoy your meals in a kitchen open to a quiet and peaceful environment!

To make your stay perfect and not surprising we offer you free access to the pool and jacuzzi !

Title: Deluxe en-suite bedroom in Manor House
Description:
This uniquely constructed cob hut was crafted by sculptor Miguel Elliott of Living Earth Structures and is one of a kind. The thick walls provide natural insulation keeping it cool in summer and warm in winter. It was constructed out of Adobe bricks from the property and features a living grass roof while the rustic decor transports you to Middle Earth.

*Update : Sadly due to Covid-19 restrictions we arent able to host your beloved animal companions at this time. The space The space
We invite you to partake in the spiritual life which is the heart and soul of Isis Oasis Sanctuary by joining us for daily noon rites in the Small Temple Sunday Salons under the Great Tree or by simply meditating at any of the numerous shrines and altars at our beautiful sanctuary! Our temple and theater are always open if you seek a moment of peaceful reflection or a place to give offerings or prayers.

Isis Oasis Sanctuary is an exceptional place to stay if you are visiting wine country and looking for a singular spiritual experience. Our cob huts offer a unique approach to lodging that you wont find anywhere else! Crafted by sculptor Miguel Elliott of Living Earth Structures these small standalone structures are built with natural self-insulating materials and inspired by magical fantasy stories that are well known and loved by many. They live tucked into an intimate corner of our wooded campground with a small picnic area and bamboo privacy screens. Bathrooms and rustic outdoor showers are just a few meters down. Perfect for those who want a remote camping feel but with some added creature comforts!

Free Wi-Fi and a coffee and tea bar are available for all guests to use in our spacious dining pavilion. A small library collections of puzzles and games and a gas fireplace provide a cozy setting in which to relax and unwind.

Visit our community garden or request an animal tour to see our menagerie of exotic rescued cats birds and reptiles! We are a licensed 501(c) non-profit and any tax-deductible donations go towards the care and upkeep of our animals and grounds.

Whether you are coming alone or with company you will find Isis Oasis a refreshing departure from the traditional hotel or motel.

**NOTE: If youre coming as a group multiple spaces can be rented out simultaneously and some buildings can be rented in their entirety for larger parties. Ask about our catering options! Please note that if other huts or campground areas are rented you will be sharing the facilities/amenities with other guests. We do offer a number of other rental options on property if you prefer more privacy. See our full listing options by typing Isis Oasis Sanctuary in your AirBNB search bar.**

Title: The Duck House. A child/dog friendly rural chalet
Description:
On the 1000 Ponds plateau there is a small Hobbit style house on the edge of a quiet pond on the hiking trails. Its a small wheeled construction with a dry toilet.
For up to 4 people there are 2 140 x190 bunk beds.
Guests have a terrace and barbecue.
No fishing allowed. The space The space
Bilbon Sacquet invites you to its small Hobbit style house. The neighborhood is very quiet sometimes broken by a frog concert.
The accommodation has a dry toilet inside the bathroom. Other things to note Other things to note
We also offer for rent: the Elves cabin (2pers) a trailer (2pers) as well as a tiny house for 4 people.

Title: Romantic room in Charlton Court Manor House
Description:
Dont miss your chance to stay at this unique and exciting pyramid that features a natural spring water lake! ! This home is perfect for couples families or close friends who are looking for a fun vacation.
We are Located about 15 miles from most beaches and central to all local attractions in a quiet and safe community.

Some highlights-
* 2 queen bedrooms/ 1 bathroom
* self check in
* Free WIFI
* Beach gear washer/dryer full kitchen private grill patio Guest access Guest access
This pyramid is situated with just enough privacy while still being only a short walk to the lake. Your main patio from this unit overlooks the lake.

It is thoughtfully furnished with fun and cozy furniture that is sure to please everyone. For your comfort the pyramid is supplied with a hairdryer iron and ironing board beach chairs/ beach towels/ cooler coffee/tea appliances washer/dryer microwave and a gas grill. The unit is stocked with some mini starter supplies such as shampoo conditioner soap coffee and toilet paper. Additional supplies can be purchased from one of the many drugstores or grocery stores within a short drive away. We have a pack n play and high chair available upon request. If you would like to request these items please let me know upon booking and we will do our best to accommodate. Other things to note Other things to note
This pyramid is in a wonderful location in Southwest Florida. It is just a short drive away to many beaches shopping restaurants. Some of the highlights in the area include Sanibel Island Naples Ft Myers Beach Bonita Beach Coconut Point shopping center Lakes park and Miromar Outlet mall Koreshan State Park and a few local kayak places.

Please note- this is a quiet and relaxing community. We ask that guests respect the village and other guests on site. No excessive noise or parties will be allowedespecially at night .

*No pets allowed at this time No smoking/vaping sage inside


The village was built 20 years agoso please understand these pyramids have some slight wear and tear. Keep in mind it is a tropical and humid environment located on a natural spring lake. For those travelers who have sensitivities and allergies these pyramids might not be perfect for you. We are not representing these homes would compare to an elite hotel or resort but an alternative to other vacation options.

Title: The Bothy at Launceston Farm, cottage with indoor swimming pool & sauna
Description:
The Mirror Houses are a pair of vacation homes set in the marvellous surroundings of the South Tyrolean Dolomites amidst a beautiful scenery of apple trees just outside the city of Bolzano.
The Mirror houses offer a unique chance to spend a beautiful vacation surrounded by contemporary architecture of the highest standards and the most astonishing Landscape and beauty nature has to offer. The space The space
Mirror House South (45sqm) has 1 bedroom with 1 double bed 1 bathroom with a spacious shower and 1 living room / kitchen (all one space) with 1 couch bed. The location is ideal for 2 persons but can accommodate up to 4 people. If you are in 4 adults we suggest do book both Mirror Houses (North and South).
In addition there is a large terrace + private garden and a shared garden in summer with a shared pool and self service pool bar.
Also there is a storage room underneath the house e.g. for sports equipment. Guest access Guest access
In the summer months (beginning of June - end of September) our pool is accessible. Therefore the slightly higher price.

If needed a baby cot / high chair can be made available for an additional cost 20‚Ç¨ a day.

For any specific request do not hesitate to ask we can organize almost anything for you.Other things to note

Title: Jay cottage at Cwm Chwefru Holiday Cottages
Description:
If you fancy something completely unusual why not arrange to stay in our specially converted Lynx helicopter for the night - every childs dream from six to sixty!

We have 1 night stays starting from ¬£110.

Please Note:

We do not accept pets in our helicopter.
All Accommodation is Non Smoking.
All bunks are custom made beds - Please bring your own sleeping bags / quilts pillows and bed linen. The space The space
Our 1982 Westland Lynx XZ676 has been professionally transformed into overnight accommodation. The snazzy interior includes sleeping for up to 4 people (2 adults & 2 children) a kitchen sink mini fridge and microwave plinth heater LED TV and fancy LED lighting to compliment it. Use of the nearby on-site toilet and shower block is included.Guest access
Custom made low down double bunk sleeping up to two people in the tail of the helicopter.
Twin pull out bunk in the living area sleeping up to 2.
LED flat screen TV.
Kitchen area with small sink hot and cold water mini fridge and microwave.
Wi-Fi.
Plinth heater and roof ventilation.
Garden table and chairs.
Parking space.

Title: Large luxury house & pool in Henley on Thames
Description: The LOFT is a uniquely designed bungalow. The stairs to the loft bedroom are made from Cocobolo wood and beams overhead are exposed which add beauty to this space. Double bed/built in closet upstairs. The ground floor has a single bed (sofa) kitchenette with amenities and large walk in bathroom. Outside is a dive pool pond covered Palapa and lush gardens. The Loft suits 1-2 people. Linens towels purified water coffee included. Lock box. Please see our fb page for more reviews. The space The space\nThere are two cruiser Bikes for guests to use now while they stay at Casa Darcy. Our property has 3 bungalows in total and lots of space between each. Each is a private small home for guests varying in size from our Main bungalow which is two stories and has 3 terraces to our Loft and then our Pool suite for short term stays. Guest access Guest access\nGuests are welcome to sit outside the Loft in our gardens or sit upstairs in the large Palapa covered area with overhead fans. The dive pool is for all guests as well.

Title: Keepers  - Luxury for 4 people ( 2 couples)
Description:
Au rythme des mar√©es is a beautiful modern and luminous flat with a large 3m x 4m bay designed by an architect located on the Pink Granite Coast! The house is south-west facing with a large garden with a swing and a loggia spacious and functional it also has two wooden terraces. Located 100m from a beautiful family sandy beach and the GR34 is next door. A cocooning accommodation with all the comforts to rest come and enjoy the sea air! The space The space

The bed linen kit is included in your stay. It consists of a flat sheet a duvet cover and a pillowcase. The beds are also made up on arrival.
Please note: We do not provide a towel and bath mat kit.
If you forgot to bring it it is possible to rent the towel kit (a bath sheet and a small towel) for 10‚Ç¨ per person.

Title: The Pool House
Description:
The domes are uniquely inspired by an architect based on sacred geometric angles combined with sustainable building material without use of any metal within its dome structures in order to preserve its energy fields within. No outside microwave fields penetrate the dome structures. The structures also hold special acoustics for sound & music.

I am also available to cook delicious local organic vegetarian breakfasts for an additional charge of $5-10/person/meal depending on your selection. Other things to note Other things to note
The King Bed can comfortably fit 3 people though typically we host 1-2 people in the King Bedroom. There is an additional semi-private space in a separate room of the house upstairs that has a chaise lounge with a small single mattress where a third person can sleep if you have 3 guests and 1 bed is not suitable for all 3 folks. Please message your host in advance if this option is requested so we can be sure to have it appropriately setup for you. Thank you!

Title: Design Apartment Deauville with swimming pool
Description:
The double room with its separate access gives you a special feeling of living through the vault-like interior design.
In the room (approx. 17m¬≤) you will experience a special room climate which is achieved by the clay in the wall stones and floor.
The bathroom is plastered with blame act which gives it a noble ambience.
In the integrated small kitchen you can prepare your very own breakfast. You can use a fridge kettle toaster dishes etc. The space The space
Here on the edge of the Mecklenburg Lake District not far from Plau am See lies Wangelin. Welcome.

The description of the holiday room:
The double room in our guest house built of straw bales gives the visitor a special feeling of living through the vaulted interior design. It has a separate access from the outside and is equipped with a private bathroom (shower and toilet).
The 40 cm thick straw bales plastered with clay provide a very high insulation standard so that the heating energy expenditure is very low.
In the room (approx. 17m¬≤) you will experience a special room climate which is achieved by combining the clay-plastered walls the use of clay stones and a tamped clay floor.
The room is uniquely designed in its colour scheme ‚Äì warm harmonious natural tones give the room an almost Mediterranean atmosphere.
The shower room is plastered with a traditional Moroccan marble lime tadelakt which gives it a noble ambience that you can literally feel. Tadelakt cleaning surfaces fascinate with their color and surface structure - the shimmering slightly wavy and lively surfaces exert a great attraction.
The double bed (140 x 200 cm) was created by a wood designer from parts of ancient looms in combination with metal and stone to an experience place of all senses.
In the small kitchen integrated in the room you can prepare your very own breakfast. However a fridge kettle toaster dishes etc. is not available for this purpose. From May to autumn we open the simply equipped summer kitchen on the premises for our guests who do not have any cooking facilities in your accommodation.
Wi-Fi access is available in the Wangeliner Garten caf√© and is accessible during the day.
Unfortunately the airbnb booking system cannot be combined with our Wangeliner Garten system so you must first make an inquiry here. However you usually get an answer within an hour.
If you havent discovered it yet weve got other places to stay for you:
----G√§rtnerinnenhaus----: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/14053630?preview_for_ml=true ----Wohnwagen----:
https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/10164312?preview_for_ml=true ----Lehmkloster----:
https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/14117664?preview_for_ml=true First
of all please make a booking request so that there are no double occupancies as our Wangeliner-Garten booking system cannot be integrated here. Other things to note Other things to note
The village of Wangelin is located on the edge of the Mecklenburg Lake District off the main roads so very quiet. The nearest larger towns are Plau am See L√ºbz and Meyenburg all about 15 km away.

Title: Stable Les Tourelles  Indoor pool & spa
Description:
Stay at Coastguard‚Äôs Beach House and discover a landscape full of myth‚Äôs and legends surrounded by the haunting loneliness of Romney Mash The space The space
Coastguards Beach House Summary

Sleeps 4 + 1 people (single fold out bed in 2nd bedroom)
Sea views
Beach just 80 meters away
Pet friendly
High chair & travel cot supplied
Woodburning stove
6 miles to RSPB Dungeness Nature Reserve
6 miles to medieval town of Rye
Quiet and secluded location
South facing fully enclosed garden
Parking for 2 cars
Superfast broadband
Flat screen 32‚Äù TV
DVD Player
Selection of DVD‚Äôs board games and books
Ipod docking stations in living room and both bedrooms

Coastguards Beach House is so close to the beach you can see it from the upstairs windows. Yet you‚Äôre also not far from Camber Village and a little further on the pretty Cinque Port town of Rye.

Here at Coastguards Beach House views extend in every direction with marshland designated an SSSI (Site of Special Scientific Interest) to one side and the sea to the other.

A painstaking amount of care and attention was paid to renovating this traditional 1875 Coastguards property-turned-cosy-holiday-cottage. Find comforts like a log burner a comfortable lounge and a modern kitchen. We consider the Coastguards Beach House the perfect place for some well-earned R&R far away from the monotony of everyday life!

Dining & Lounging

Coastguards Beach House has a contemporary and sociable open plan layout downstairs ideal for enjoying the company of your holiday group. A log burning stove warms the space and sets the scene for relaxing with a good book and a glass of wine.

The newly equipped kitchen is fully stocked breakfast bar and farmhouse dining table for planning the day ahead. For ingredients that are fresh as it gets take a quick drive to Rye for seafood fresh from the boat and Romney marsh lamb from the local butchers. Talk to Beside the Sea for our recommendations!

Bed & Bath

Upstairs you‚Äôll find a beautiful modern family bathroom and two bedrooms.

The large comfortable master bedroom has a double bed with views of the sea coastal garden and adjoining coastguard cottages.

A family bathroom includes wash hand basin w.c and a raised shower bath with screen providing you a coveted choice between a relaxing bubble bath whilst stargazing or a refreshing shower with a view of waves lapping the shore.

The second bedroom has two 3ft beds and a single fold away bed with un-spoilt views over the marsh. This room also benefits from an en-suite shower room with marsh views.

Outdoors

The cottage has a fully enclosed south-facing and quiet garden the site of many relaxing holiday evenings after exploring historical sites walking the marsh and playing in the waves. The beach is just steps away over the seawall with a paved boardwalk spanning its length for easy walks and jogs. Guest access Guest access
Keysafe details are in the digital guide Other things to note Other things to note
Our bookings are protected by SUPERHOG you will be contacted by SUPERHOG directly to verify yourself. Once your booking is confirmed you can also go via their website superhog.com to start the verification or wait to be contacted.

Coastguards is located near to the Lydd Ranges a military firing range (its also a nature reserve).

It has been used for military training for over 150 years and is part of the Dungeness Romney Marsh and Rye Bay Site of Special Scientific Interest (it is home to incredibly rare plants and animals)

Because the range is used for live firing access is sometimes restricted - red flags are flown during these times access is prohibited along the foreshore.

When firing is not carried out it may be possible to walk along a designated path along the shore.

Throughout 2021 the Environment Agency (EA) will be working on improving the existing coastal defences between Jurys Gap and Dungeness and so will be utilising the compound to the right of the cottages (the area with the green containers on the photo) this will mean that the construction vehicles will be using the promenade to access the ranges on the MOD land.

Coastguards are old properties in a very exposed location and in the winter months the wind can really howl off the sea ‚Äì some guests love watching the weather go wild or the sea mist rolling creating an eerie atmosphere while some have found it a little unsettling.

So if you are not a fan of older houses that have history and character then this would not be for you ‚Äì we do have modern properties down the road that are in a more sheltered environment.

Title: Long Mountain View Tiny House with Hot Tub
Description: Beautiful spacious newly refurbished first floor one bedroom flat with floor to ceiling windows overlooking the beach on the border of Hastings and St Leonards. Walking distance to the bars restaurants and shops of Hastings old town town centre and St Leonards. Sleeps 2 in king size four poster bed; with a roll top bath shower and fully fitted kitchen TV and fast wifi. Nearby free parking. The space The space\nWe have a huge living/dining room with a 3 metre high bay window overlooking the sea. There are double doors opening into the bedroom so you can lie in bed and look out to sea. We have a roll-top bath in the bedroom and a separate toilet/basin. The kitchen is a separate room also with a sea view.

Title: Luxury Apartment with pool,indoor heated.
Description:
The Beach Hut Gurnard located in an enviable position is the perfect home from home for solo-travellers couples friends and small families. This beachfront property features fantastic Solent views; the perfect place to watch the stunning sunsets Gurnard is famous for. Well-equipped and with fast WIFI makes this the ideal choice for a chilled break enjoying the sea beach and all that goes with it all on your doorstep . The space The space
The two bedrooms can accommodate four people comfortably with one room being a double and the other a twin (2 single beds).
Benefitting from an open-plan living area the property has a well equipped kitchen including washing machine dishwasher and coffee machine .
A large island incorporates the induction hob and plenty of seating space for a breakfast bar with 4 upholstered stools.
A childrens chair and table set is available if the stools are unsuitable- please enquire.
Two large sofas make up the lounge area with coffee and side tables and a wall mounted TV (with SmartTV box). On opening the double doorsyou have a decked outdoor space with picnic bench for alfresco dining plenty of seating and magnificent viewing platform for watching the nearby sailing club set sail and also the many windsurfers and paddle boarders that are drawn to the area . If you fancy joining in - there are local hire companies who will supply any equipment required.
Relax and watch the world go by and enjoy a pizza delivery from one of our local businesses who deliver to the area.
We are happy to accommodate one small dog to join you on your holidays but we please ask to refrain from allowing them on the furniture or beds. Please bring their own bed and bowls.

There are some points to advise before booking the accommodation- there are steps to the bedrooms and bathroom and care should be taken - one bedroom has a reduced head height in the doorway . The upper roof terrace is unavailable to guests. Finally there are some building works been carried out at present in the vicinity and may be some noise during the week days. The neighbouring property was demolished over a year ago and is waiting rebuilding. No work has started on this site - should this situation change I will notify any guests affected.
Ferry discount codes are available please enquire when booking.
We operate a self check in system for your convenience using a key safe. All codes will be sent before travel.

Title: NEW 'Bluebell Beach'  Luxury Lodge @ Hoburne Park
Description:
Soak up the British sea air in our newly refurbished two double bedroom beach house. Enjoy an open plan down stairs living area with views of the sea. Enter in from the busy road to an unexpected magical high spec seafront property. Enjoy a large outdoor garden area with decking and balcony. This really is a hidden gem with unavoidable beautiful views of the sea. If you can bare to leave then Worthing Chichester Shoreham and Brighton are easily accessible by walking bus or even Swimming!! The space The space
We have worked hard to make this place as lovely as can be. Downstairs you have a carefully planned living space perfect for friends and family get together\s.
Upstairs there are 2 bedrooms both doubles with a Jack and Jill bathroom which is accessed via each bedroom so don	 forget to lock both doors !! The master bedroom has a King size double bed and is luxuriously decorated. Large patio doors out to a large balcony. The view is mind blowing. You can see to Worthing and Brighton from here and look over the beach. Your own little private suntrap. At night the wind farm is even more spectacular and the lights from Brighton twinkle away.
The 2nd Bedroom with a Double bed is equally luxurious. Smart TV for viewing however no view slightly smaller and on the main road side of the house. Noise is minor but not silent all of the time.
The kitchen is designed that even whilst the chef is hard at work they wont miss out on any conversation or interaction. They even have the best view in the house whilst chopping their onions.
The lounge area is comfortable and has a large open fire where you can enjoy cosy evenings.
42 large screen smart TV gives you plenty of choice for viewing.
Dining room to the rear with dining table for 4 and a nice chesterfield arm chair if you would rather just read a book and watch the sea. Dining room leads out to the garden. Partially decked and partially paved completely enclosed so if you wanted to bring your pooch then you can be sure of their safety. There is a gate in the garden side wall that you can get straight onto the beach with.
The beach in Lancing is just amazing you will be sure to take endless photos and go on endless walks. 2 minutes to the left (east) of the house is an amazing restaurant/cafe called The Perch. They serve everything you would need. The food is excellent here. They also do one of the best breakfast bacon sandwiches i have ever tasted. Takeaways available also.
We are always at hand to help however you are on your own here we dont interfere or even come and say hi unless you want us to.
This place is perfect for a summers get away water sports weekend winter hibernation. A real break from reality.

Title: A luxury unique home spa - White Stones Retreats.
Description:
Awesome weather boarded beach house on the stunning sandy beach at Camber East Sussex under 2 hours from London. Enjoy barefoot beach living in a gorgeous house where the beach is your front garden. Up to two well behaved dogs welcome at ¬£35 per dog per stay. Dogs have free run of the entire beach from October to May. Between May and September you will need to walk 50 metres along from the house to reach the dog friendly section of beach. The space The space
Barefoot brings you closer to nature and offers an idyllic escape from the stresses of everyday life. Cosy up by the old wood burner or toast marshmallows on the deck surrounded by your own private dune. The house has plenty of character with stripped wooden floors and doors but combines this with modern luxuries for a once in a lifetime experience of true beach living. Guest access Guest access
The sandy dune fringed beach stretches for miles. The gorgeous cinque port town of Rye is less than 10 minutes away and Dungeness The UK‚Äôs only desert is just 15 minutes away. Hastings and Dover are easily within an hour Other things to note Other things to note
In high season bookings are for a minimum of 7 nights (commencing fri). In mid and low season there are options to book a 3 night weekend (fri/sat/sun) or a 4 night midweek (mon/tue/wed/thu) as well as week stays or longer. Check ins are on either Friday or Monday depending on length of stay.

Title: Silverwood Coach House, with Indoor Swimming Pool
Description:
The Beach House West Wittering Beach.
An airy bright home shares a garden with the main house sitting directly on the beach. A perfect getaway an hour and a half from London.
It is self-contained and is close to Goodwood Chichester Theatre great bike routes local pubs and of course the sea is on your doorstep.
Open-plan fully-equipped new kitchen big comfortable sofa TV/Wifi separate shower room.
Super king double bed plus 2 single beds on large mezzanine floor with a sea view. The space The space
Ample parking by the house.

Local surfing club has all you need to learn/rent
paddle-boarding kite-surfing wind-surfing with friendly staff to help. (www.2xs.co.uk.
Shore Water Sports (22 Shore Road East Wittering) sells clothes and equipment.

For newspapers and daily fresh bread/croissants we have Sayas our brilliant local mini-mart in West Wittering open early til late most days.

For all your day-to-day needs East Wittering a five minute drive (but nicer bike ride) has two supermarkets (Tesco and The Co-op) also numerous independent shops and great local produce. (Try Something Fishy for the daily catch or Horrocks for fresh fruit and veg).

Anything you may need for a day on the beach is sold in quite a few places in East Wittering. (Eg. Crocs beach balls boogie boards etc).

There are also many local pubs and places to eat and/or get great take-out. From a traditional fish-and-chip supper to delicious Indian meal to tapas pizza a pub lunch a big fry-up at The Boulevard or we even have a pancake breakfast place (check out Drift-In). Just ask me for details I can let you know. We also have a new beach cafe just up the beach about a 5 minute walk (to your right) as you access the path outside. It serves hot food coffees and ice cream in the main restaurant or from the take-out section.

Title: Barton Le Clay, the Gem of the Chilterns
Description:
A truly spectacular beachfront home with direct access to Bracklesham Beach is ready to delight up to 9 guests. Ideal for families or groups of friends here‚Äôs a stunning property with amazing views that‚Äôs bright and welcoming. Among its many highlights are the private indoor heated swimming pool the extensive balcony with sea views and the patio and garden with direct access to the beach. This is the kind of place dreams are made of. The space The space
Shell Seekers is an amazing house with a unique history. It‚Äôs actually built around a classic railway carriage which dates back to the 1920s. Extensively modernised and extended over the years the house is now an eye-catching home-from-home that‚Äôs ready to make groups of friends families with children even work colleagues warmly welcome for short or long-term stylish stays by the sea.

And when we say this is a beachfront home we mean it. Check out the amazing sea views from many of the home‚Äôs rooms and the fact that you will enjoy direct access to the beach from the beautiful garden. With so much to see and enjoy let‚Äôs start a quick tour of this Bracklesham Bay beauty by the beach:

OPEN PLAN LIVING ROOM / DINING ROOM
There are actually two spaces designed for you all to gather to relax or socialise one on each floor. Both have comfortable seating on which you can all kickback and live like you do at home - maybe watch the wall-mounted flat screen TVs read or just take in those amazing views. The upstairs sitting room gives you direct access to a balcony that will afford you yet more sea views. The downstairs lounge also has a dining table with space for everyone to gather and experience the delights you‚Äôve created in the home‚Äôs exceptional‚Ä¶

MODERN KITCHEN
You‚Äôd expect such a stunning home to have a smart kitchen with high specification appliances and that‚Äôs precisely what you‚Äôve got here. Everything you need to prepare snacks and meals and to wash clothes and dishes is here for you.

4 BEDROOMS
Three of the bedrooms are situated on the ground floor of this magnificent beachfront home including the master bedroom. Here‚Äôs a sleeping space that has it all an ultra comfortable kingsize bed its own dressing room and ensuite bathroom plus simply spectacular views. There are two other bedrooms on the other side of the house on the ground floor. The fourth and final bedroom is upstairs with a stunning dual aspect that includes a sea view plus access to the balcony. We‚Äôll leave you to decide between yourselves who gets what room. Rest assured they‚Äôre all gloriously comfortable with plenty of storage space for your belongings.

BATHROOMS
Take your pick from a stylish bath tub in which you can relax in bubbles or standalone showers that will invigorate you at the start or end of the day. There are various bathrooms and dressing facilities that are available on both floors of this stunning home by the sea.

INDOOR POOL
Fancy a dip before breakfast or a refreshing swim in the afternoon? Undoubtedly one of the highlights of this home is its 25ft heated indoor swimming pool. Enjoy the chance to relax in private around and in a beautiful pool always a popular feature for guests of all ages. And it‚Äôs all yours.

OUTSIDE SPACE
The inside is certainly impressive and so are the outside spaces you get with this home. As well as the extensive balcony on the upper floor and the parking spaces at the front at the back of the house there‚Äôs a large decked area with plenty of seating space for everyone to gather and enjoy the views. There‚Äôs also a garden which gives you direct access to Bracklesham beach. But you‚Äôd expect no less from a beachfront property as stunning as this!

CHILDREN‚ÄôS PLAY AREAS
This beautiful house is perfect for kids. There‚Äôs even a kids‚Äô playroom and an outdoor shed area for them to explore plus plenty of child-friendly facilities laid on by your hosts.

HIGHLIGHTS
* Direct access to the glorious pebble beach
* Private indoor pool
* Amazing sea views
* Recently refurbished
* Child friendly with kids play room
* Free parking on premises Guest access Guest access
Guests have access to the entire property. Other things to note Other things to note
‚òÖ COVID-19 SANITIZATION ‚òÖ
Heath safety and wellbeing of our guests are of utmost importance to us. For this reason we use a thorough process of cleaning after each check-out.

‚òÖ NOISEAWARE ‚òÖ
Please be mindful of our neighbours during your stay. Our property‚Äôs quiet hours are in place to ensure that everyone can enjoy a peaceful night‚Äôs sleep. We care a lot about maintaining good relationships with our community so we appreciate you following our ‚Äúhouse rules‚Äù during your stay.

We are committed to Rent Responsibly standards. This means we follow best-in-class guidelines to ensure you have a peaceful safe and memorable stay with us. We use smart home technology to improve your experience. NoiseAware is a smart home device that measures volume levels throughout the property and allows us to respond to noise nuisances without disrupting your stay. NoiseAware is 100% privacy compliant and is required on this property. If you have any questions please ask. We are committed to your comfort so please let us know if we can do anything during your stay to make it more enjoyable.

Set in a beautiful period building on Brighton seafront it blends spectacular sea views with luxurious interior style. The unique interiors will spellbind you and you will not want to leave! The space The space\nThe Hollywood Regency interiors combined with spectacular direct Brighton seafront views. All in easy walking distance of the town centre shops Brighton Palace Pier & Kemp Town.

Title: Curlew 3 - The Cove. Sea views, patio, swimming pool and parking.
Description:
Prime central seafront location by Brighton Pier with arguably the best sea views in Brighton!
Free off street private parking space for 1 car.
Luxury second floor 2 bedroom apartment in a Central Residential Regency building with uninterrupted panoramic sea & pier views from lounge bay window & 2nd bedroom. Master bedroom & en-suite with views over New Stein Gardens to the sea. Close to all major attractions & Inside the Pride village zone
Midday check out available for a small fee
No parties! The space The space
Please state your reason for staying in your booking message. We do not allow any kinds of parties or groups of guests that may disturb or upset our neighbours. It is a residential building and any noise must be kept to a minimum.

This is a prestigious and well equipped Luxury 2nd floor apartment right on Brighton seafront and we want you to enjoy the very best that Brighton has to offer you in both style and comfort!We hope that staying in our apartment will help you to fulfil that to the utmost.

Check in time is from 4pm but you will be messaged if it is available beforehand. Parking will be available to you from whichever time you check in. We will be parked in the space whilst we prepare the apartment for you. The space is privately owned and marked \FLAT 4\.
If you will be arriving early to Brighton there is free parking for up to 4 hours at Brighton Marina car park if that might be helpful.

Check out is by 11am however if agreed to and paid for in advance this can be extended to Midday for an extra fee. Please enquire for this.

Parking:
The apartment comes with its own single private parking space on the forecourt at the front. It is the left side space by the path to the entrance door marked \FLAT 4\. The space must be vacated at check out to make room for me to park my car whilst i service the apartment for new guests arriving.

Communal Entrance:
Access to the apartment is through the main communal entrance at the front of the building and up the stairs to the 2nd floor. The key to the main communal door is located in a Masterlock key safe padlocked to the black railings to the right of the door. The code to access this will be sent shortly before arrival. Please close this and scramble the code after taking the key. The door to the apartment has an electronic keypad entry code system that is randomly generated specifically for each guests stay. This will be 4 digits and sent together with the key access code.

Apartment Entrance Hall:
Cupboard with hooks on back of door for coats etc. In this cupboard we store the sofa bedding a spare dining chair iron & ironing board.
Shelf with Internet hub and above is the heating thermostat.
CCTV camera monitoring the entrance hall.

Lounge: Size 14\ 9 in to bay x 14\ 1
This is open plan with the kitchen(kitchen measurements separate).
The room is laid with varnished solid oak flooring.
There is a leather 4 seater sofa with King size bed pull out with real sprung mattress. There is a leather strap under the middle headrest to use to pull the sofa bed open.
A large 65 Samsung UHD smart Tv with Freeview hangs on the wall opposite the sofa. A solid oak coffee table sits nicely in front of the sofa. A solid oak extending dining table sits in the double glazed bay window space with a professional telescope on top for those that would like to star gaze look out to the sea etc(not for use by young kids!). The bay window has beautiful white shutters and overlooks the beach and sea to the South East and West. To the East you can see the Marina and clifftops and on the right you can see Brighton Pier West Pier sealife centre Volks railway and Zip line just outside. There is a double socket with 2 USB charging points next to the sofa for charging/power for your electrical items.
The main lounge lights and pendant light are dimmable and remote controlled. The remotes are kept in the coffee table drawer.

Kitchen: Size 11\ 3 x 5\ 3
The kitchen area has luxury silver/grey real stone floor tiles. The main kitchen lights are also remote controlled and dimmable. The remote controls are kept in the coffee table drawer.
The kitchen has been fitted with the highest quality fully integrated appliances by brands such as Neff Siemens & Elica etc. and finished off with a sublime Tiger walnut worktop for a truly luxurious feel and is equipped with everything that anyone would require including a Kettle matching 4 slice toaster and Nespresso coffee machine. The appliance user manuals for everything are kept on the shelf above the fridge.
Various kitchen utensils cutlery glasses cups pots pans etc are all provided in the drawers and cupboards.
For laundry there is an integrated washer/dryer and the Siemens Oven is also a microwave that can be controlled via WIFI. All instructions on how to use the appliances will be found in the kitchen cupboard above the fridge freezer.
The bin is located in the cupboard next to the washer/dryer.
Tea coffee and sugar are provided as are some basics like washing up liquid some cleaning materials and capsules for the washing machine and dishwasher.
The newly fitted and insured Vaillant combi boiler is located in the cupboard at the end of the kitchen. A small fire extinguisher is also next to it.

Master bedroom: (15\ 1 x 9\ 4 max to 7\ 1 min)& Ensuite toilet: 5\ 1 x 3\ 6
This room has been fitted with a luxurious silver carpet and has been furnished with exquisite matching white French style furniture and solid King size bed. The bed has an award winning Sealy Nostromo Posturepedic mattress with a large silky soft velvet headboard and topped off with quality bed linen so a great nights sleep should be guaranteed!
The bedside table has 3 small drawers with a lamp and DAB clock radio on top.
The large wardrobe with its mirrored doors has hanging space a shelf and 2 large drawers under for storage.
The dressing table has a large folding mirror 2 drawers and chair. Under the dressing table is a double socket with 2 USB sockets for charging/power for your electrical items.
The lighting is remote controlled and dimmable to suit your mood. The remote is kept in the bedside table drawer.
The view through the white window shutters is over New Stein Gardens and towards the sea and Marina.(The balcony outside the window does not belong to this apartment and cannot be used).
A hair dryer is provided in the room.
The Ensuite toilet has fully tiled walls in luxury travertine and a black and silver grey Slate floor. Again the sash window looks over New Stein Gardens and to the sea and Marina. The mirror has LED lighting that can be turned on/off by waving your hand underneath.

Second Bedroom: Size 11\ 8 x 6\ 7
This room has been fitted with a luxurious light brown carpet and has been furnished with top quality painted solid oak furniture. The bed is a double size with headboard and sits snuggly between the side and end walls under the window so please take this in to consideration if you are tall as there is no space to hang your feet out of the end of the bed. The bed has a highly rated Casper memory foam mattress. At the foot of the bed is a 40 Samsung UHD Smart Tv with Freeview TV. To the side of the bed is a double glazed window with its wonderful white shutters and large window ledge that looks out directly to the beach Brighton pier and sea.
The double wardrobe has hanging space with a drawer under.
The dressing table has 2 small drawers freestanding mirror lamp and DAB clock radio on top and matching leather upholstered solid oak chair.
Under the dressing table is a double socket with 2 USB sockets for charging/power for your electrical items.
A large mirror hangs on the wall above the radiator cover.
A hair dryer is provided in the room.
The lighting is remote controlled and dimmable. The remote is kept in the dressing table drawer.

Main Bathroom: Size 5\ 9 x 5\ 6
The bathroom has been fully tiled with Luxury largeTravertine wall tiles and silver/grey slate flooring.
This room features a double length shower enclosure with a Luxurious Rain or Waterfall shower option from the shower head above. There is also a hand held shower hose.
The mirror is LED lit.
Top quality soap shower gel and shampoo/conditioner are provided as are Quality towels.
Some cleaning materials and a first aid kit are kept under the sink.

Hall:
The hallway has solid oak floors and is where the entry phone internet router and Hive heating thermostat are located just by the lounge door.
To the left of the entrance door is a large cupboard that houses a spare oak dining chair hoover ironing board iron broom dustpan & brush spare towels and the bedding for the sofa bed etc. as well as the water stop cock(bottom far right corner) and consumer unit(main electric switches inside left wall).

The apartment features exclusive stunning Commissioned Original & limited edition artwork throughout by up and coming local artist Richard Berner. His ‚ÄòBeasts of Brighton‚Äô work/collection is particularly interesting as it is of local famous Brighton landmarks/subjects. His intricate and alternative style is unique to his vision and as far as we can tell there is nothing else in this style around.

Next door property:
We also own a Luxury 1 bedroom apartment that sleeps 4 at the next door property(39B) which has permit parking for 1 car. If you are a group of up to 10 people it is possible to book both together providing it is also available. You should be able to find this in our other listings from our page. Guest access Guest access
Guests have full use of the apartment. If less than 3 guests are staying the 2nd bedroom will only be made up on request.

There is an apartment information sheet provided containing useful info. regarding the apartment and surroundings. This is found on the kitchen worktop at check in along with the parking permit. Please return the parking permit at your check out.

WIFI is unlimited. The password is on the router in the hall.

Both Tvs have Freeview and internet so guests can log in to their own Netflix or similar accounts.

At the very front of the building is a private off street parking space for 1 car. Only the left side space belongs to our apartment(Flat 4). The space is available from check in until check out and you will need to use the parking permit provided to display during your stay. We will need to park in this space and use the permit in our car after your check out. Please return the permit back to the kitchen worktop in the apartment at check out. A ¬£35 fee is chargeable from your deposit if the permit is lost or taken/not returned.

The key for the main entrance is kept in a key safe box next to the front door. You will be given the code to access it shortly before your arrival. Please close it and scramble the code after taking the key. At the end of your stay you may leave the key on the kitchen worktop and just close the door behind you.

The apartment door has a special code lock. The code is changed between each guest remotely and will be given to you shortly before your arrival. The lock has a safety feature whereby it will not accept any codes for 1 minute if a code is entered too slowly or incorrectly 3 consecutive times. If it flashes red please leave it for 1 minute before trying to enter your code again. If you pause between a key press for too long the lock will reset and you will have to wait a minute before entering your code again so please have your code to hand and ready to enter.

Unfortunately this apartment has no disabled access and is not suitable for those with mobility impairments.

This apartment is self check in and out.
24 hour check in is available.

A Midday check out may be available upon request for an extra fee. Please check. Other things to note Other things to note
After both residents and Airbnb complaints due to guests abusing thier stays at the apartment a security camera has been professionally installed monitoring the entrance hall inside of the apartment.
The camera is maintained and looked after by the company that installed it(Brighton CCTV). The camera records 24/7 on a loop recording over old footage with new and is alarmed. It is not to be obscured or tampered with in any way.
The camera is not monitored however should we receive any complaint from a resident authority or suspect that any guest is not using the apartment in an appropriate manner we may use any footage as evidence in any case or claim.
Please remember that the apartment is for the sole use of the guests on a booking only. People that are not a part of a booked group may not stay at the apartment. The apartment is in a residential building and as such the residents must be respected. No parties of any kind or any noise that may disturb a resident is allowed during a guests stay. Thank you.

This is strictly a no smoking apartment.

11am Check out means the apartment must be vacated on or before this time. We will be in a few minutes past this to park and service the apartment for our next guests.

If you have a car parked this must be removed at your check out and return the parking permit. We need to use this space for our car whilst we service the apartment for our next guests.

If you need to empty the rubbish bins during/at the end of your stay the communal bins for general rubbish & recycling are on the street just outside the building to the left and the right.

We charge ¬£10 for a lost/missing front door key.

The fire alarm panel is located inside the main entrance lobby. If a false alarm sounds there are clear instructions written next to it on how to silence them.

The safety and wellbeing of our guests is paramount to us and therefore we are taking some extra measures to keep both ourselves and our guests safe during this difficult time.
Due to this we have taken the following measures to help avoid transferring/catching the virus.
We are wearing disposable gloves and using disinfectant for the cleaning of the apartment. We have also provided a large bottle of disinfectant in the hall cupboard for guests use if required. All bedding towels and dishcloths are washed at 60 degrees.
Thank you Lee & Sue.

Title: Relaxing pool house
Description:
Within site of Hastings pier and the ever changing coast line this ground floor garden apartment has everything you need for a wonderful seaside break. This flat has the benefit of outside space whilst still being on the seafront. The space The space
There is a wonderful Hobbit House in the garden for children to explore and play in with a little kitchenettechairstabletoy crockery and cupboards sure to entertain them for hours. There is also an outside seating area for children and a hammock for the grownups! The garden is well lit at night so can be enjoyed in the evenings.

Situated between St Leonards and Hastings this apartment is well placed to easily reach the heart of both communities and is only a 15 minute walk from St Leonards Warrior Square station.
New shops barsrestaurants and galleries are opening up at a fast pace and the two towns are fast becoming a mecca for artists and creatives alike but still retains its charm and appeal for family holidays. Guest access Guest access
Full access to everything in the flat & private garden

Title: Homely Rustic Country Retreat within National Park
Description:
Offering stunning sea views this beach house is perfect for a holiday or work space (super fast fibre) on the south coast. Step onto the beach from the garden and enjoy miles of shingle and sand depending upon the tide.

Designed to maximise the incredible sea views the bedrooms are on the ground floor with living areas above. It has an enclosed patio garden and off street parking. BBQ sea kayaks kids bikes toys games buckets & spades provided! For rainy days x box Sky & BT sport The space The space
Seascape is perfect for families group getaways water sports enthusiasts or those working remotely with super fast broadband. The island is a great place to try out a new water sport or take a course. Kite surfing windsurfing stand up paddle boarding kayaking and sailing can be arranged for groups or individuals (see contact details below).

The house offers a great base for walkers who can enjoy the beautiful walks around the island and in Chichester harbour.

For those who just want to get away from it all the views whatever the weather are incredible and ever changing. You dont need to go anywhere just relax on the sofas on the balcony; have a bbq in the garden or snuggle up round the fire pit at night.

Seascape is kid friendly with its enclosed patio garden stair gates high chairs and travel cots. Baby sitting is available on request. There is no road to cross to get to the beach. The promenade which is on the other side of the gate goes from one end of the island to the other making it particularly suitable for buggies scooters and bikes as well as walkers. A ten minute walk along the promenade takes you to the ice cream parlour and the best fish and chip shop. From here you can catch the light railway along the coast to the funfair at Beachlands.

Ground Floor:
2 super king/twin bedrooms one with en suite
1 double bedroom
1 bunk room with 2 sets of bunk beds
Family shower room
Utility room
Garage for storage
Enclosed patio garden

First Floor:
Open plan living/dining/sitting area with patio doors onto roof terrace and panoramic sea views.
Kitchen with electric oven gas hob microwave fridge/freezer dishwasher & coffee machine.

WHAT TO DO:

At the house‚Ä¶

Sit and watch the world go by. The seascape is ever changing with the wind and weather. You will see sailing boats sea kayaks cruisers and tankers pass by. You may see light aircraft playing in the sky above or a lifeboat and coastguard helicopter practising a rescue out at sea.

Read relax watch a film listen to music do a puzzle play a board game (find them in the tv cupboard)

Have a BBQ in the garden (briquettes in the garage)

On the beach‚Ä¶

Eat fish and chips (from The Coastguard 10 mins walk away)

Sit in a deck chair at the water‚Äôs edge (deckchairs in the garage)

Take a dip (towels in utility room)

Paddle in a sea kayak (stored in garage please wear a buoyancy aid!)

Build your masterpiece in the sand at low tide (buckets and spades in garage)

Go Fishing (tackle and bait can be bought from tackle shop on Creek Rd 5 mins walk away)

Fly a kite (one in garage)

Stretch your legs‚Ä¶

Go for a stroll cycle or scooter along the promenade on the other side of the garden gate.
10 minutes walk west takes you to Eastoke corner with its fabulous Coastguard fish and chip shop and Pepperelli‚Äôs Ice cream parlour. From here you can‚Ä¶

Follow the seafront exercise trail or take a ride on the little steam train which takes you along the sea front to‚Ä¶

The traditional seaside fun fair at Beachlands or take your skate board to the hayling skate park. From here you can‚Ä¶

Walk further along the beach to Inn on the Beach which has fabulous food and spectacular views and you can watch the windsurfers and kite surfers at play.

If you take a stroll east from the house you‚Äôll pass the nature reserve (take your binoculars it‚Äôs a haven for birds and birdwathers!) the life boat centre and the sailing club to Sandy Point at the mouth of Chichester Harbour. Views of the south downs the Witterings and East Head are stunning and at low tide you can walk onto the sand bar ‚Äòisland‚Äô.

Go crabbing (nets in the garage). If you walk all the way round sandy point past the sailing club you reach an inlet. There is a little bridge back to the mainland and if you cast your nets into the muddy water below with a little bacon the crabs will be unable to resist‚Ä¶.

Away from the house‚Ä¶

Cycle or walk the Hayling Billy Trail. You can cycle or drive to the end of the old rail track which ran from Havant to West Town. It is an easy coastal trail and The Ship Inn in Langstone Harbour makes the perfect place to stop for refreshments before you head back to West Town.

At Ferry Point on the western point of the island board the Rosie K for a fabulous harbour boat tour of Langstone Harbour. It‚Äôs best to book at low tide to increase your chances of seeing the harbour seals.

Swing a golf club at the pay and play Hayling Island golf club on the coast or Tournebury.

Swing a racket at the pay and play tennis courts at Hayling Community Centre

Hire or book a lesson on a paddle board windsurf or kite surf (contact andy biggs watersports west town)

Dine out! There are many great places to eat on the island‚Ä¶

Explore further afield‚Ä¶

Drive east to Chichester with its Cathedral Roman Villa and the beach at The Witterings and East Head Nature Reserve. Take a boat cruise with Chichester Harbour Water Tours.

Go to an event at Goodwood or the races at Fontwell

Drive west to Portsmouth. Visit the Historic Dockyards to see the HMS Victory & Warrior and the Mary Rose and a Harbour Tour around the active naval base. Check out the views from Spinnaker Tower at Gunwharf Quays shop at the outlet stores bowl or watch a movie. Drive further west to visit the Maritime History at Southampton.

Take the kids to the Inflatables water park at Chichester Marwell Zoo the Blue Reef Aquarium in Southsea or Peppa Pig World at Paultons Park

Take a day trip to the Isle of Wight by car ferry from Portsmouth or on foot by hovercraft from Southsea

Take a walk on The South Downs Way or visit Queen Elizabeth Country Park or Stansted Park

Take a steam train ride on the Bluebell Railway in Sussex or the Watercress Line between Alton and Alresford Other things to note Other things to note
If you are planning to stay for the weekend please enquire about a later checkout on a Sunday. Whenever possible we will delay the changeover until Monday so that you can check out as late as you like on Sunday. However this is only possible out of peak season.

Title: Cosy Coach House with Private Garden and Pool
Description:
Rare opportunity to enjoy a truly special holiday in an outstanding converted Victorian boathouse. The Boathouse sits in a totally unique setting in one of the most sought-after premium locations on the Isle of Wight. The house itself commands central position in the bay and fronts onto a magical beach with far reaching views across to The Solent.

Seagrove Bay embodies the notion of a far-off sandy cove and is simply magical and alive with sailing boats of all shapes and sizes. The surrounding area ouzos blissful tranquillity with buttery soft sands and glistening clear water punctuating the landscape.


The Boathouse is an upside-down house that is set over three floors sleeping 6 guests on the ground floor maximising the picturesque views of the beach and Bay to the other two floors. The sitting room is simply a gorgeous space contemporary light extremely comfortable and those VIEWS! The dining room can sit up to 8 guest and has direct access via stairs to the front balcony area on the ground floor. The Boathouse also has the added benefit of having an enclosed rear lawned garden plus the luxury of garage parking for one car.





Accommodation:
Ground Floor:
Three bedrooms: 1 King Double with a large wardrobe 1 Double 1 Twin. Family bathroom with roll top bath and a separate shower WC and basin.
First Floor:
A central staircase takes you up to the living area where the sea and beach views are simply stunning.
The living area consists of a thoughtfully fitted kitchen with bar stool seating for three
A gorgeous sitting room with log burner plenty of comfortable seating looking towards those panoramic Solent views.
A separate dining room seating up to 8 guests.
Off the kitchen there is a utility room with WC basin and laundry facilities.
Second Floor:
Sitting area with a freeview TV a perfect retreat for the teenagers.
Outside:
Outside to the rear there is an enclosed lawned garden with an outdoor shower. To the front there is a balcony area overlooking the beach and Solent. Garage parking for 1 car.


Amenities:
Gas heating and hot water log burner with a starter pack of logs
Cooker - electric double oven with a gas hob microwave
Dishwasher fridge freezer toaster kettle cafeti√®re
Wifi 2 x Freeview TV‚Äôs DVD bluetooth DAB radio
Travel cot highchair attached stairgates on all the stairs (top and bottom)
Hairdryer iron ironing board. Linen and towels inc in rent (not beach towels) heating inc in rent
Charcoal BBQ
Note:1 Dog is welcome on request ONLY
Note: Sorry no parties
Note: The property is set over three levels with the bedroom being on the ground floor.
Note: Children must be supervised at all times while on the front balcony area. Note: The front balcony area is used at your own risk please always take care. Garden furniture will be outside from the Spring to the early Autumn

The seaside resort of Seaview was built by the Edwardians due to the stunning panoramic sea views and great sandy beaches and these assets are still very much true today. The Boathouse sits in the middle of Seagrove Bay which is a much sought-after holiday destination to be desired as you can quite simply gently melt into the sands for a long day of sun basking. The property itself faces a shallow bay with a host of water sports and inviting turquoise blue water to explore. A short walk along the beach and you find yourself on Priory Bay. ‚ÄòTreasure Island ‚Äò always comes to mind as you turn the corner from Seagrove Bay into Priory Bay a view you simply cannot get board of and just as wonderful in the winter months especially on those crisp winters morning - simply breath taking. Look for the many oysters and scallops that regularly get washed up from these sparkling waters. Explore along the beachline and let the children‚Äôs imagination go wild play cricket or boule at low tide or just relax and enjoy a delicious picnic. The Boathouse looks straight across the Solent to Portsmouth and the Spinnaker Tower and the famous Solent forts. It is only a short walk into Seaview where you will find The Old Fort a newly refurbished gastro pub AA award winning Seaview Hotel Seaview Yacht Club the wonderful Lilys Cafe the new Lime & Chilli Indian restaurant (bring your own bottle) chemist post office community store stocked with delicious local produce and a couple of boutique shops.
Shop Pub and Restaurant 1.6 miles by car or just a short walk along the beach or costal path which is directly outside of your rear gate. Nearest beach 0.0 miles Ryde 3.6 miles by car.

Outside of Seaview discover English Heritage‚Äôs Carisbrooke Castle and Osbourne House. Take the family to Dinosaur Isle and the activity parks at Blackgang Chine and Robin Hill Country Park.
Alternately a host of activities tempt the more adventurous visitors such as hiking horse riding or mountain biking across the famous Tennyson Downs all the way to the far West point of the island discover the island‚Äôs greenery exploring the breath-taking landscapes on route. Why not take the family and explore our caves by kayak or challenge yourself with some paragliding from our chalk cliffs? For the water enthusiasts the island offers something for the whole family from sailing paddle boarding kitesurfing windsurfing kayaking. Or simply just enjoy a picnic or bbq and enjoy some spectacular sun sets on one of the many beaches from Bembridge to Brook. Oh the possibilities The space The space
Three bedrooms all on the ground floor: 1 King Double 1 Double 1 Twin. Ground Floor family bathroom with roll top bath and a separate shower. Stairs take you up to the living area so you can benefit from the most stunning sea views. With a fitted kitchen sitting room with log burner and a separate dining room both with those breath-taking seaside views. Off the kitchen there is a utility room with cloakroom facilities. Up the second set of stairs takes you to another sitting area a perfect retreat for the teenagers. Outside to the rear there is a lawned enclosed garden with an outdoor shower. To the front there is a balcony area overlooking the beach and Solent. Other things to note Other things to note
1. Please do not leave children unattended at the front of the property there is quite a drop down to the beach.
2. No Smoking
3. No Pets allowed in the bedrooms or on the furniture. Pets must not be unattended in the property or garden area. All No 2s to be picked up before you leave. We would appreciate if you could hoover up any excess dog hair before you leave as well.
4. No Parties
5. No parking in-front of the garage - Access is required at all times.
6. Please remember you have neighbours so please be courteous and respectful - Thank You.
7. 2. There are storm doors in-front of the beach fronted windows please close when windy or if a storm is expected. The doors can be used as blackouts as well.
8. Please use the front balcony at your own risk there is a big drop down to the beach.
9. Small children must be supervised at all times while out on the front balcony area.
10. Please advise on booking if bringing dogs then we can get the property dog ready.

Title: Holiday Home in Poole
Description:
Beautiful seafront first floor south facing apartment recently re decorated to a high standard. Direct sea views. The space The space
First floor sea front flat centrally located by Hasting Pier and walking distance to all the amenities of St Leonards On Sea and Hastings. Warm comfortable and welcoming.

LIVING ROOM
South facing with direct sea view. High ceilings with large sash windows and a door leading to private balcony. While the flat is no smoking am happy for you to smoke on the balcony. Large sofa which can also act as additional bed. (Extra duvet bedding available) TV with normal Freeview and also Amazon Fire Stick that includes Netflix Amazon Prime and Disney+. The room also has 2 high quality Blue Tooth Sound Systems available. Raft wooden dining room table with 4 chairs.

Please note the fire is not operational and can not be lit.

International Plug adaptors and extension cables available.

Flat is fully gas central heated.

BEDROOM
Double bed with new mattress and lovely view from the bed through large window to hillside at the rear of the flat. Cupboard and chest of draws are empty and available to you. Bedside tables bedside lamps. There are USB double plugs next to each bed.

KITCHEN
Tassimo Coffee machine with some welcome pods available. Fridge Freezer Washing Machine Microwave Gas Hob and Electric Convention Oven Kettle Toaster and all utensils including pots and pans. Outside the kitchen is a lovely seating area.

BATHROOM
Bath shower and toilet with soap toilet paper provided.

Title: Cosy and modern with outdoor pool open in summer
Description:
Set in an idyllic location just steps from the beach this bungalow is perfect for families couples and friends alike.. 3 steps to entrance. All on the ground floor.
Living/dining room: With Freeview TV and patio doors leading to decked area.
Kitchen: With electric oven induction hob microwave fridge/freezer dishwasher and washing machine.
Bedroom 1: With kingsize bed and patio doors leading to decked area.
Bedroom 2: With twin beds.
Shower room: With shower cubicle and toilet.. Gas central heating electricity bed linen towels and Wi-Fi included. Travel cot. Enclosed decked area with garden furniture and charcoal barbecue. Outside hot shower. Private parking for 6 cars. No smoking. Please note: There are 4 steps down to the beach. . Enjoying a wonderful coastal location Salty Lodge is a light and airy single-storey detached property with fantastic sea views across to the Isle of Wight. It has a large decked sitting-out area to the rear ‚Äì ideal for alfresco dining or enjoying a drink on a warm evening and where beautiful sunsets can also be viewed. At the end of the back garden there are steps over the low wall directly onto the pebble/sandy beach and fishing is available nearby. When the tide goes out it makes a great crabbing area with many pools along the sand. Salty Lodge has been refurbished in 2018 and offers modern and tastefully presented accommodation for couples or families.
Hayling Island is well known for its sailing activities it is sheltered by the Isle of Wight making it ideal for watersports activities. It is renowned for its windsurfing kayaking power boating jet ski-ing kitesurfing and wake boarding. Local paddle boating and windsurfing lessons are available close by. Every year there is a national windsurfing event and a hive of sailing and nautical activity can be seen along the coastline. Walk the Hayling Billy Trail which starts at the former railway line where the theatre now is or take a pleasant amble overlooking Langstone Harbour.
Many activities can be enjoyed locally for all ages including a seaside railway and a small amusement park for the children. For the sports enthusiast Seacourt is also worth a visit with 5 racket sports including real tennis. Also nearby activities including golf horse riding boat trips and scenic walks along the water‚Äôs edge or scenic walks along the South Downs National Park which are within easy reach. Chichester with its beautiful cathedral festival theatre pedestrianised shopping leisure centre Roman Villa and Goodwood or Fontwell races it‚Äôs definitely worthy of a visit. Visit Portsmouth with waterside dining ferry trips to the Isle of Wight designer outlets Natural Museum leisure facilities Spinnaker Tower HMS Victory or the maritime history at Southampton. Winchester with its cathedral abbey and The New Forest are within easy driving distance. Plenty of National Trust homes and gardens can also be discovered nearby. Beach 4 yards. Shop 220 yards pub and restaurant 330 yards.
Free WiFi

Title: Shepherds Hut with use of Pool, Hot Tub & Sauna
Description:
Stunning newly-renovated open plan apartment on the 1st floor with floor to ceiling windows looking out to sea. Hastings Pier and St Leonards train station are 5 mins walk and there are plenty of restaurants & bars within easy walking distance.

Contemporary kitchen with central island where you can have a cup of coffee or glass of wine and watch the sunset...

In the bedroom open the huge double doors and you can lie in bed and still see the sea!

Modern en-suite bathroom. Other things to note Other things to note
For the first time I‚Äôve had to add a cleaning charge due to COVID safety requirements.
Please note heating is via guest- controlled radiators which switch off automatically between midnight and 6am.
