Title: Cosy rural retreat with hot tub and indoor pool
Description:
A stunning 2 bedroom seaside apartment in the Grade II Listed building of Pelham Crescent.
Perfectly located in the Old Town with direct sea views and great local amenities. The space The space
We are very happy to host our recently renovated apartment in the Grade II Listed building of Pelham Crescent in the Old Town with amazing direct sea views through beautiful Georgian Windows on to the main strip of the beach.

The property is located within the oldest part of Hastings a beautiful and exciting part of town full unique and stunning architecture and history. The apartment is also located next to the gothic St Mary Church. The property is a historical building with all its charm and is nestled amongst the apartments is Gothic St Marys Church. Pelham Crescent and the Church was built in the late 19th century and still remains a beautiful and iconic building perfectly located facing the sea.

The apartment is the perfect option for short lets or longer stays in Hastings. For singles couples friends or small families.

The flat is located on the second floor of a four storey building. There is a large open lounge which faces directly onto the sea with a brand newly fitted kitchen fully equipped at the back of the room.

The apartment is full of character and rustic charm and provides all the basic home comforts.

The kitchen is well stocked of cooking utensils cutlery crockery and spices.

The lounge has a seating and dining area (with an extra dining table in the kitchen if needed) as well as a record player books and TV for entertainment. There is ample space for 4 or more people to share the room at any given time.

The lounge runs through into the hallway which leads on to the two double bedrooms and bathroom. Both bedrooms face directly on to the ancient cliffs of Hastings and are very private with nothing but the cliffs and seagulls onlooking.

The small bathroom has also been fitted with a brand new toilet and bathroom set and was newly decorated with a new high pressure shower. Please note this is not a luxurious bathroom as it has taken pressure from leaky roofs from above is decorated when needed and is functional and clean.

The larger bedroom can accommodate a travel cot. Please request this via the enquiry option and specify you have a child so we can arrange accordingly.

The following is also available and provided during your stay.

Free wi-fi - very strong speed - password can be found on the router box on the shelf in the lounge.
Full use of all utensils condiments spices etc in flat including bathroom kitchen lounge.
Full kitchen utensils etc
Fresh sheets
Towels
Hair dryer

The vintage record player is unfortunately not working anymore but we have a vintage radio which you can enjoy.

Please can you remember to always use cup holders and place mats for the surfaces on the dining table and the nest of small tables as they stain pretty much immediately with heat or wine : )

Feel free to use anything you can see in the flat and feel comfortable in the flat as your own home. There will be a variety of condiments for you to cook up a nice meal and there will be towels etc.

Parking should be easy as its just opposite the flat on the beach front at Pelham Place car park.

Please do not invite any unannounced guests to the flat. We may consider docking from your deposit if guests are found to have done so.

Please also remember to keep the noise down after 11pm sharp out of respect for the neighbours. The building is also an old building so please note as expected that sound does travel through the floors. Please also be mindful not to let the front door bang or to make noise in the hallway as noise travels easily through the building.

If you have a pet your would like to accompany you please enquire in advance as there is an extra charge of ¬£15 for cleaning. I will also require that your pet comes with bedding and is not allowed on the fabrics and sheets in the flat.

Many thanks.

There is parking in the Pelham Car Park directly opposite the building (but across the road so there is no road noise or traffic). Parking in the other Old Town is difficult but we have never had any problems with this car park. All day parking costs ¬£8. Evening parking is ¬£1 from 6pm until 8am.

There are an array of great quirky shops cafes and restaurants at a stones throw away from the flat. The High Street in the Old Town and St Leonards have the most and best options for independent food and drink venues shops and galleries.

Opposite the flat on the beach front there is family entertainment such as crazy golf volley ball and a cycle hire shack.

All of Hastings events such as food festivals bonfire night carnival and Pirates day and much more all happens in this part of the town and the parades take place just outside the window facing this stretch of the seafront so you can also have the best view and can enjoy the atmosphere from the comfort of the apartment if preferred.

George Street and the High Street as well as Jerwoods Gallery are minutes walk from the flat where you can take the lift to the Cliff Tops or start your adventures around the Old Town from.

The new town is also a stones throw away. St Leonards (Norman and London Road) is approx 15 minutes walking along the beach front towards the opposite the opposite direction from the Old Town. Its definite worth a visit! Guest access Guest access
Please note all bookings for 2 people will be assumed as using one bedroom. Please let me know if you need both bedrooms as the bedding will need to be made up for the extra room.

Free wi-fi - very strong speed - password can be found on the router box on the shelf in the lounge.
Full use of all utensils condiments spices etc in flat including bathroom kitchen lounge.

Full kitchen utensils etc
Fresh sheets
Towels
Good quality travel cot plus mattress but you will be required to bring your own bedding. Please inform us that the cot is required on check in so we can organise. Other things to note Other things to note
(Important - please read)

*please be mindful of noise on the communal stairs as some neighbours do night shifts and may be sleeping.

*please notify me if you wish to bring a pet. One pet is allowed with an extra cleaning fee of ¬£15. The pet is required to sleep on their own bedding and should not use be allowed on the beds and fabrics.

*For two people bookings who require the use of the additional bedroom please let me know on enquiry so we can ensure the 2nd bedroom is made up on arrival.

Do let us know if you have any questions how big or small.

Further information to follow on Hastings and St Leonards and check in details to follow on booking.

Title: Self Contained Studio The New Forest National Pk
Description:
Our vintage shabby-chic one bedroom Victorian flat with breathtaking panoramic sea views across the English Channel is only minutes from the beach and picturesque Old Town with its boutiques art galleries restaurants bric-a-brac shops cafes and bars.

Follow us on Instagram on: @flatwithbreathtakingseaviews The space The space
The Flat:
An elegant 1 bedroom flat with unobstructed panoramic sea views across the West Hill Common the East Hill Nature Reserve and the English Channel.
Boasting dark wooden floors throughout an open marble fire place high ceilings tastefully decorated in vintage seaside charm making it a very attractive and convenient one-bedroom holiday apartment to suit 2 (or 4) people.

Bedroom:
Has a relaxing and extremely comfortable double bed with plenty of light during the day and black-out curtains at night.
The bedroom has two windows facing the back of the house which are double glazed allowing you to have a quiet nights sleep.
There are a selection of books and magazines to read on the vast shelves of the bedroom (please leave the books and magazines in the flat or have a chat with me about borrowing any if you are too engrossed in a story to leave it behind ;-)
A cot bed can be provided for babies/ toddlers with prior warning.
Just outside the bedroom you will find an iron and ironing board as well as a useful umbrella for those rainy English days and a sun tent to protect the little ones when it\s too hot on the beach.
In this same cupboard you can find a laundry hanger a wooden baby\s high chair a Henry Hoover mop broom and a wicker mat for the beach.

Living Room:
With a gorgeous grey marble fireplace as its centrepiece and TRULY unobstructed breathtaking sea views across the West Hill East Hill and English Channel. The living room also benefits from a double sofa bed to cater an additional two people.
I have also provided a wicker basket of children\s toys to entertain little ones should they also be our guests and a backgammon/chess set plus Trivial Pursuit for bigger kids.
A retro DAB radio - with iPod/iPhone dock - can be found on the gramophone to add a bit of ambience to your stay (and charge up your iPhones).
There is also a selection of magazines for your browsing pleasure in the magazine rack.
(Please leave the books and magazines in the flat)

*Please note there is NO TELEVISION in the flat... although there is an active TV license so you can enjoy all licensed channels on laptops iPads and other mobile devices.

Kitchen:
A tidy and intimate kitchen with gorgeous reclaimed teak work surfaces which benefits from a washer/dryer fridge double oven 4 hob gas cooker and all the conveniences of a modern home.
You can find a kettle toaster hand blender a wide selection of glasses mugs plates and vases as well as a few cook books to inspire you (if you are thinking of eating in).
A selection of Take Away menus can be found on the rack in the hallway - If you are a fan of Indian food Jali is a favourite of ours.
Under the sink you will be able to find any cleaning products you may need during your stay.
A fire extinguisher (in case of fire) is located to the left of the kitchen on the counter.
Next to the kettle you will find an HONESTY JAR for you to add a contribution if you break or misuse anything. Please be as generous as you feel is right to so that guests after you can also enjoy these added perks.
In the kitchen I have added a folder (grey/blue) with all my favourite places to eat drink see and do in Hastings.

Bathroom:
A light and modern bathroom with toilet sink bathtub and hand held shower. Body soap shampoo/conditioner can be found here too.
In the bathroom you will also find a small first aid kit in case of bumps and grazes (and in case of Hair Emergencies a Vidal Sassoon full power hair dryer a curling wand and BabyBliss travel hair straighteners can be found in the bedroom on top of the red cupboard).

Recently I have ensured that all beauty products (Shampoo Conditioner Body Wash Hand Soap Washing Up Liquid etc...) provided in my property are Vegan Organic Chemical & Sulphate Free. FAITH IN NATURE is the company that ticks all the boxes and I purchase their products in bulk (which I then use to refill the glass jars in the bathroom and kitchen).
I have done this to play my part in reducing my (our) plastic waste chemical consumption & impact on the environment - as well as the more obvious animal welfare issues which I feel passionate about. www.faithinnature.co.uk

The flat also uses 100% renewable energy from a company called Bulb (who provides 100% of its electricity generated from Wind Solar and Hydroelectrics). Click this link to join up in your UK property: www.bulb.co.uk/refer/bindud7875 Guest access Guest access
Guests will have the flat to themselves at all times.

It is situated on the first floor and of course there are neighbours on the floors above and below who need to be respected. Many thanks for understanding this...

Guests have access to the flat via the main front door and up the stairs to the first floor.

An entryphone is situated inside the flat to the right of the front door for your convenience.

The Middle Bell outside the building pertains to the First Floor Flat. Other things to note Other things to note
We can provide a travel Cot Bed and a Highchair should you need one.
Please let us know of your requirements when you make your booking.

If you are 2 people who wont be sharing the double bed and you require the sofa bed as well please make your booking by stating you are 3 people (as this required more linen preparation etc).

All beauty products in the flat are Organic Vegan Sulphate and Chemical free from FAITH IN NATURE. www.faithinnature.co.uk

The flat uses only 100% renewable energy from a British provider called Bulb.
By switching to Bulb youre making the world a greener place to live in. Join the movement now with this link/code: www.bulb.co.uk/refer/bindud7875

Children under 2 years of age can stay for free. Please state the total number of people staying in the flat when you make your booking.

Certain weekends (during high season or when special festivals are taking place in Hastings) we may require you to book a minimum of two nights.

Here are just a few of the many Festivals and local Events to note down for 2018:

February ‚Äì Fat Tuesday - from 9-13
March ‚Äì Hastings Half Marathon ‚Äì 18 March
April ‚Äì Beatles Day 19 ‚Äì on 8th at White Rock Theatre
May - Hastings‚Äô Jack in the Green
June ‚Äì Stade Saturdays - cultural events every Saturday on Stade Open Space; and free!
July ‚Äì Hastings Beer and Music Festival The Oval
August ‚Äì Old Town Carnival Week
September ‚Äì Seafood & Wine Festival
October ‚Äì Hastings Bonfire ‚Äì 13 October
November ‚Äì Hastings Storytelling Festival
December ‚Äì It‚Äôs Christmas!

Please follow us on Instagram - @flatwithbreathtakingseaviews

Title: Stunning Cotswolds Water Park
Description:
Stunning modern apartment right on the beach with unlimited views of the sea and beach. 20 minutes outside of Brighton.

The apartment has a 15 meters run of floor-to-ceiling windows facing south directly out to sea. Huge open plan living dinning kitchen and entertaining space. We have installed an apple home pod and a large TV with Netflix.

This apartment is not suitable for loud parties stag or hen dos. It has steps up to the entrance. We ask guests to be respectful of everyone. The space The space
Open plan kitchen and living area and three separate bedrooms to the back. The flat is an eco building with triple glazing - its is quiet inside.
The apartment has access to the balcony that wraps around the South aspect of the apartment.

Three bedrooms one with an ensuite bathroom and two with additional sofa beds. The apartment can sleep up to ten people. Guest access Guest access
The apartment is self contained and the guests have access to all parts. The balcony isnt segregated from the other apartments. But 20m is for exclusive access of this apartment. Other things to note Other things to note
On Friday Nights in the summer we put on an outdoor cinema on the beach for a local charity. The balcony has the best view. For the films being shown please look at the facebook page of the perch cafe.

Title: The Burrow - Luxurious Pet Friendly, 3 Bed Lodge
Description:
Our seafront chalet Beachcombers is situated in the pretty village of Gurnard.

Beachcombers is part of an eclectic mix of chalets and bungalows - come the evening you can take in some of the finest sunsets across the Solent. The space The space
Beachcombers includes three bedrooms two with king size double beds and one with a standard double bunk bed and pull out mattress.

We have a spacious kitchen with a cooker fridge and washing machine.

Also included: Corner sofa central heating two bathrooms wi-fi and tv.

The beach is pebble and shingle and the front is lined with pretty beach huts and the beach currently holds a Seaside Award.

We are a stones throw away from Gurnard Sailing Club - water sports and sailing are a popular past time in this area.

There are a few small shops in Gurnard as well as two pubs both of which serve food and offer a selection of drinks including Island ale. The Woodvale is located right at the seafront and serves food all day. Also located on the front is a sloping green and kids play area located near a small cafe serving snacks and ice cream.

There are some great walks and cycle routes to be explored in the area and for those wanting a little more life in the evening Cowes town is a short walk away.

By walking:

Beach< a minute
Woodvale < 5 minutes
Shops < 10 minutes
Cowes < 30 minutes

Our chalet has been handed down the generations and was recently renovated. We love the Isle of Wight and hope you will too.

Title: Idyllic country cottage with Heated Pool (May-Sep)
Description:
Sea to Sky- great sea views & Isle of Wight from upstairs lounge & balcony.
Sleep 6 max (including children) in 5 beds
Two level townhouse has stairs
Courtyard onto beach over flood defence stairs
Shower rain & hand over bath
Bath towels provided per guest numbers booked and 4 hand towels
2 wifi TV‚Äôs
Travel cot & highchair if requested
Garage bike storage
3 Car off-street parking
Key safe check-in after 4pm
No 3rd party bookings
NOT wheelchair or walker accessible
No animals on property.The space Guest access Guest access
Sea to Sky Cottage is a two storey townhouse style residence in a quiet neighbourhood on the bus route;
- free off street parking for 3 cars;
- enclosed back courtyard with direct access stairs over wall onto the beach;
- garage to store bicycles wind & kite surfers and kayaks which is for guest use for the duration of their booking.
Closest local pub is 1/2 mile.
Childrens park 1/2 mile west opposite The Nab parking area.
Walk/Cycle beach promenda west from Sea to Sky courtyard gate to outdoor fitness equipment area ice cream parlor pizza fish & chips beach railway Funfair and amusment hall. Other things to note Other things to note
No additional guests in addition to the number of people listed for the booking are to be invited to Sea to Sky.
No family and/or friends gatherings and no parties inviting people who are not booked guests to join you at the property.

This is a residential neighbourhood so please respect the quiet hours between 10pm to 9am and no loud music at anytime.

A travel cot and/or highchair is available if requested at the time of booking as these items are only made available in Sea to Sky when requested.

The heating/hot water is adjusted on the Hive thermostat next to the front door. Press buttons on top left and right for boost of hot water or heating.

If the temperature is warm due to weather please open windows and sliding door for a through breeze. A high volume fan is located in the dining room.

For heating check that radiators are turned up to 6 in each room and a large free standing oil heater is located in the conservatory for additional local heating.

Hot water is by a Solar Water Panel on the roof which is supplemented by a gas boiler when dark.

Title: Stylish converted Stables in Dulcote nr Wells
Description:
Enjoy a beautiful newly refurbished one bedroom apartment in the heart of Rottingdean. The flat has sea views and direct access to the beach with no road between. Sleeps 2-3 people. Located steps from Rottingdean Beach and close to coffee shops restaurants pubs and shops. Brighton is just 10 mins away. It‚Äôs the perfect getaway! The space The space
Conveniently located on the ground floor this one bedroom flat enjoys direct access to the beach and Undercliff Walk offering 5km of traffic-free walking running and cycling. The comfortable living/dining area has a large southwest facing window and there‚Äôs a compact well-equipped kitchen. The spacious modern bathroom has a bath/shower and the cosy bedroom has a double bed and fitted wardrobes. Guest access Guest access
Guests have sole use of the entire flat. Other things to note Other things to note
There is visitor parking which you can use for unloading. Public parking is 5 mins walk from the flat with charges capped at ¬£5.40/day.

Title: Contemporary Georgian Coach House with Heated Pool
Description:
STUNNING AND TOTALLY LUXURIOUS 6 BEDROOM AND 5 BATH HOUSE DIRECTLY ON THE BEACH (ONE DOUBLE BEDROOM WITH OWN SHOWER ROOM ON THE GROUND FLOOR IDEAL FOR EASY ACCESS) WITH HOT TUB BBQ PLUS SEATING FOR 12 ON THE DECK OVERLOOKING THE SEA. LARGE BALCONY WITH 2 FRONT BEDROOMS OVER BEACH. SEPARATE SITTING ROOM AND GAMES ROOM WITH LARGE TVWII and WIFI. LUXURIOUS FITTINGS AND FURNITURE BEDDING AND LINEN DRESSING GOWNS & TOWELS. Beauty therapist & babysitter available.
1 WELL BEHAVED DOG ALLOWED The space The space
YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED - THIS IS A LITTLE PIECE OF PARADISE WITHIN JUST OVER AN HOUR OF LONDON (FULHAM) - with all home comforts you can totally relax and sleep to the sound of the sea. Take it one step further with our excellent masseuse/beauty therapist coming to the house offering many treatments use our recommended baby sitting service and head out for a lovely supper at the end of a beach fun day! Guest access Guest access
3 parking spaces outside the front of the property. Other things to note Other things to note
Bedroom locations and set up
Ground floor - 1) double bed with own shower room
First floor - 2) King size bed and 3) King size bed (with balcony) 4) double and single bunkbed. These 3 bedrooms share 2 large family bathrooms both with bars and separate showers. 4) 2 single beds with ensuite shower room.
Second floor - Super king size bed and ensuite bathroom

Dressing gowns now provided - The White Company soaps etc all complimentary.

Chef available on request
Known nanny for babysitting available on request
Massage available on request
Balloons and champagne on ice for your special occasion available on request

Title: Under the Walnut Tree Shepherds Hut with Hot Tub
Description:
This property has luxurious private accommodation. It sleeps up to 4 people - perfect for either 2 people 2 couples or a family and an option of an additional single bed if 5 people wish to stay.
It is close to West Wittering beach has many coastal walks numerous family activities and restaurants.

Please note that there is another listing Spindles Annex which sleeps a further 2 people. Therefore if available it combines to make an ideal stay for a family and parents too. The space The space
Everything within the property (‚ÄòSpindles‚Äô) has been finished to a high standard. Upon entering through into the gated property there are secure allocated parking bays off the beautiful original driveway - one for each bedroom. A path leads you alongside the decked seating area to the private oak front door. Inside there is a large entrance hall with doors leading to the bedrooms (both with luxury en-suite facilities) and the kitchen/diner/living room. Guest access Guest access
The rented part of Spindles is a very private 2 bedroom house with its own front garden. Within the garden there is a shed which residents may use to store their bicycles and other beach equipment. Behind the shed there are 2 kayaks (single and double) which you may use (obviously at your own risk!!). Inside the entrance I have provided a selection of games (for all ages) for people to relax and enjoy. A selection of brochures will be available for those wishing to venture a little further from the beach.

Title: Romantic Secluded Cottage
Description:
A contemporary waterside home overlooking the sand dunes and Bembridge Harbour.

Whether it‚Äôs sundowners on the sunny terrace watersports or watching the world go by this is the perfect spot.

The idyllic village of Bembridge is within 5 minutes walking distance as are the many beautiful beaches. The living area terrace and double bedrooms all have great Harbour views.

Off road parking for two cars and a large garage to safely store bikes or watersports toys. The space The space
All areas are available exclusively to guests. Guest access Guest access

Title: Rural Getaway ‚ÄúStaycation‚Äù Bliss
Description:
This is our family holiday home. We absolutely love to go down there for a chilled out weekend with the kids.
We have three young children who Iove to play on the beach when the tide is low.
The beach is almost private even in the high season there is barely anyone there. And the beach is the back garden! Im sure your family will love this place as much as we do!
Please note that school holiday and summer it‚Äôs a minimum of seven nights stay. The space The space
The house has three bedrooms one king size one double and the kids room has four single beds. The beds are very comfortable ( mattress bought for our personal use)

New log burner and central heating system installed for the winter months. Please bring logs if you wish to lit up the fire.

There is a large living/ dinning room and a sun lounge downstairs kitchen and a toilet.
Please note the house is a bit outdated( cosmetically) but it has everything a family need to have a great and comfortable holiday in a the perfect location! It‚Äôs all about The Location!!!
It‚Äôs fully equipped with dishwasher washing machine a large fridge freezer microwave Nespresso coffee machine TV DVD player wifi bed linen are provided but not towels( please bring your own) lazy chairs toys books trampoline swing.
Travel cot and high chair available.

The beach is the back garden with amazing sunrise and sunset. And the full moon is my favourite!

Title: Hamlet of converted barns with shared indoor pool.
Description:
Sea Scape luxury apartment above Hastings Old Town with sea views over the green all the way to France. The seascape apartment has just been completely refurbished to a high standard with everything you might need for you stay. It is bright and airy with amazing views from all windows. A large section of DVDs Parking is street parking with no permits. If coming by train arrive at Hastings station there is a Sainsbury‚Äôs next to the station for any provisions. A taxi is about ¬£5 to the West Hill The space The space
An outstanding one bed apartment with orthopaedic mattress and an added deluxe sofa bed in the open plan living
Fully equipped kitchen area. Dining area 4 chairs breakfast bar with 2 Stools.
Work Station to include a desk.
If you enjoy films there is a large collection of DVD‚Äôs for your stay. Guest access Guest access
Communal front door one flight of stairs to the apartment door situated is on the first floor. Other things to note Other things to note

Title: Footmans  - Outdoor Recovery Spa Available to Book
Description:
Welcome to our home-from-home opposite the English Channel and two minutes from Hastings pier. Enjoy big skies and stunning uninterrupted sea views from the living room & kitchen and serene cliff greenery from the bedrooms. Close to all local attractions its under 20 minutes stroll to Hastings Old Town situated between the heart of St Leonards & Hastings town centre. The space The space
The apartment is on the second floor and is simply furnished with modern mid-century and vintage stuff from and featuring the local area. It has recently been fully renovated and has new beds bed linen and towels.

The kitchen includes a microwave fridge with freezer section gas hob & electric oven digital/bluetooth/FM radio blender a washer-dryer plus all essentials.

Each bedroom has a fitted wardrobe and roller black out blinds behind the curtains. All bed linen is 100% cotton.

The bathroom has a heated towel rail a bath with rainfall & handheld showers and a steam-free mirror with light. All towels are 100% Egyptian cotton.

In the living room there are two armchairs a three-seater sofa and a dining table to seat four. The TV includes a DVD player and there are a selection of DVDs books and board games.

Sorry the apartment is not suitable for children under the age of 12 years.

The apartment is served by a lift accessed via eight steps from the pavement to the ground floor lobby area. Please note the lift is quite old and isnt guaranteed to be operational during your stay.

Title: Bwythyn Cerrig (W41454)
Description: Featured in The Times 50 Great British Beach Escapes- 25th April 2015 ‚ÄúDriftwood‚Äù is a charming end of terrace two-bedroom house in the pretty town of Seaford on the Sussex coast. The space The space\nLocated directly on the esplanade with unspoilt views overlooking Seaford bay it is decorated in fresh neutral shades and furnished with simple yet comfortable New England style furniture. It features a courtyard-style beach garden which links to a large decked terrace perfect for enjoying a cocktail at sunset or for al-fresco dining. Large garage at the back of the house allows for safe storage of bikes or surfing equipment.The interior of the house is comfortable and cosy with bare-wood floors and white walls which frame the stunning view. The open-plan reception room includes an area for relaxing or watching a movie on the 40inch flatscreen Smart TV equipped with complimentary Netflix and BT Sport. The house has free WiFI for those who like to stay in touch.There is a round-farmhouse style dining table for four and a fully-equipped kitchen with washing machine fridge/freezer micro-wave and breakfast bar. Upstairs on the second floor are two bright and airy double bedrooms. The ‚Äú shabby chic style‚Äù master bedroom boasts a spectacular ocean view and is furnished with a king-size bed and double wardrobe. The second bedroom overlooks the town and features two twin beds and ample storage. Crisp white linen and nautical stripes create a chic contemporary look.There is a family bathroom with WC basin and bath which is fitted with a shower mixer and overhead shower. Linen and towels are provided and gas central heating is fitted throughout. Sleeps up to 4 ( a collapsible guest bed is available for a 5th guest)Pets welcome with prior arrangement.Guest access\nDriftwood‚Äù is in an excellent location being only a 10 minute walk to the centre of Seaford town with its diverse range of shops and restaurants including the excellent ‚ÄúTrawlers‚Äù for fantastic fish and chips. ‚Äú Olivers‚Äù a small family run restaurant offers a more discerning choice of menu and there is also a good selection of tea shops for cream tea lovers.Seaford is surrounded by stunning scenery villages and countryside and is very popular with hikers. Nearby is the famous Seven Sisters whose seven cliffs form part of the Seven Sisters County Park at Cuckmere Haven and which starts at the end of the beach just a few hundred metres from the property.

Title: Nutkins Retreat, Whippingham, East Cowes
Description:
Boutique style! Ideal for exploring St Leonards on Sea & surrounds & working from home. 2 mins from the sea 5 from the station easily accessible by car & free on street parking. Private entry spacious open plan living private gardens.
We respectfully ask for guests who are happy to observe a quiet time after midnight & do not mind hearing the odd voice or footstep above. The space The space
The living area is large and open plan for cooking in the kitchen space sociable dining and relaxing and watching TV in the lounge area. Guest access Guest access
Guests can access all spaces described within the flat including the back and front basement gardens. Other things to note Other things to note
Currently we are following a self check in procedure.

Ebb and Flow is a flat in a converted house so please bear in mind people do live above and you may hear the sound of footsteps and voices sometimes. Equally we respect our neighbours by asking for a quiet time after midnight.

It is a NON SMOKING apartment.

Although I have never charged for small breakages i will have to charge for larger damages.

Title: Paignton pet friendly holiday lodge c/w hot tub
Description:
Beautiful 3-bedroom beach house (double twin bunk). 100m to Winchelsea Beach. Sea views from lounge and master bedroom balconies. Garden with deck area and outdoor table and chairs. Walking cycling water-sports bird-watching (Rye Harbour Nature Reserve). The Ship deli (great butchers and bread!) and the Red Pig food truck. Good pubs restaurants and cafes in Rye and Icklesham. The space The space
Fabulous \New England\ style beach house with stunning sea views!
The house is set on The Ridge just yards from Winchelsea Beach near Rye in East Sussex. The house was featured in Coast Magazine in 2008 and Real Homes magazine Aug 2010. Located in the small village of Winchelsea Beach - where marshland meets the sea the shingle beach gives way to flat wet sand at low tide. A wonderful four-mile walk is to follow the sea wall eastwards- stopping at the Bird Reserve then following the River Rother towards Rye and returning across the field tracks past Camber Castle. Whether you want to go surfing cycling walking or beach-combing Bramble Tye is the perfect place to sit back and decide - either in the summer house or gazing across the sea from your balcony. Shop: 0.1 mile Pub: 0.1 mile Coast: 100m.

Ground Floor:
Entrance porch
Kitchen/Dining Room - an extremely light and attractive space with wonderful oak flooring. There is a family room which can be closed off from the main living area furnished with a three seater sofa occasional table a variety of chairs a gas woodburning stove and a flat screen TV. In the main room there is a dining table and six chairs plus sideboards and cabinets and the superbly stocked bespoke Kitchen provides an electric oven and gas hob dishwasher fridge freezer microwave.
Rear porch/ Utility Room houses a washing machine and tumble dryer.
Bedroom 1 with bunk beds bedside table and clothes hanging rail.
Bedroom 2 with twin beds bedside table chest of drawers and double wardrobe
Bathroom with oak flooring a bath over-bath shower heated towel rail washbasin and w.c

Stairs with stairgates top and bottom to.

First Floor:
Sitting Room with oak flooring. This glorious room has a spectacular galleried roof with open rafters and fabulous sea views from the balcony and the dual aspect windows. There is a three seater sofa antique leather and cane armchairs occasional table TV with DVD and gas woodburning stove
Bedroom 3 with double bed bedside tables wardrobe and private balcony with stunning sea views. En-Suite Bathroom with a bath heated towel rail washbasin and w.c.

Garden: Fully enclosed pebbled decked and lawned areas with summer house and wooden garden furniture.
Parking: Parking for one car in the drive plus parking for two cars outside on The Ridge.
Heating: Oil central heating and gas woodburning gas stoves for boost.

Wifi available. Mobile \phone reception poor
Highchair available (attaches to adult chair)
Removable bed-side barrier available for toddlers.

All linen and towels provided.
All heating and electricity costs included.

Facilities for Babies and Small Children:
Mamas and Papas travel cot (please bring own linen blankets and pillow etc. The cot mattress is thin so you may wish to bring your own thicker cot mattress).
Safety-rail for bed (secured under the mattress)
High chair (secured on to dining chair with straps) Guest access Guest access
Guests have access to the whole house and one off-road parking space. Additional parking on road by pedestrian gate. Other things to note Other things to note
Short breaks are available. 4 nights minimum.

The house sleeps a maximum of 6 and no additional people can be accommodated.

The Beach House enjoys a beachfront position. Our light and bright holiday home enjoys panoramic and uninterrupted views of the sea. A moments walk from the garden gate is the pebble beach which will take you down to the waters edge. A weekend break or a longer stay is possible all year round. The space The space

Title: The Country Retreat - fabulous holiday lodge
Description: Check our reviews! Self check-in free parking. A big bright and sunny 1 bed flat located directly on Marine parade. Panoramic sea views from the huge open-plan living kitchen room. Big windows and high ceilings. Recently refurbed. Double bedroom with a king-size bed ample storage and double sofabed in the lounge. Perfect holiday pad and offering easy access to the Sth Downs Nat Park Arundel Goodwood Chichester Shoreham and Brighton. 80mbps WiFi. 43inTV Netflix M&S foodhall 200M. The space The space\nThe flat will be fully sanitised by our professional team before check-in. IF YOU ARE USING AIRBNB FOR THE FIRST TIME PLEASE MESSAGE US WITH YOUR REQUEST GIVING THE NAMES AGES AND OCCUPATIONS OF YOUR GROUP A LITTLE BIT OF INFORMATION ABOUT YOURSELVES AND THE NATURE OF YOUR TRIP. Please have your verification process complete. We will provide free parking vouchers for your full days but not checkout day. Just let us know when you book. The flat is situated directly on the seafront and is only yards away from the beach. The flat is on the ground floor and gives easy access with two small steps from the pavement. The front door and common parts have motion sensor lighting to assist while you enter the property. Worthing pier and the town centre is a couple of minutes walk (400m). Go and see Russell at the pier cafe for a freshly brewed coffee and an ice cream! Worthing mainline station is approximately 1km away. The fabulous Worthing Splashpoint leisure centre is also just 1km away along the promenade. The flat has a lovely big sunny South facing living room measuring 21 feet long by 15 feet wide and has a newly fitted corner kitchen area. The kitchen has a slick black ceramic hob a Bosch fan oven grill and a Leibherr fridge-freezer - all new in 2020 a washing machine and microwave. The flat has been recently refurbished and has a bay window four seater dining table area a large double sofabed two coffee tables a new 43 inch LED flat screen SmartTV with Netflix and YouTube and fibre optic 80mbps WiFi when hard wired. The flat benefits from gas central heating and double-glazing throughout. The flat has lovely high ceilings and large windows to let all that lovely seafront sunshine pour in! The rectangular 11 x 9 foot double bedroom comes with a pocket sprung luxury ¬£900 king-size double bed with two bedside storage drawers a chest of drawers and a wardrobe. Weve put a superking-size duvet on the bed and four pillows. Pure cotton bedding completes the opulent finish. The separate WC bathroom with shower finishes the private accommodation. There is access to the communal front and rear garden areas. The beautiful South Downs park is accessible only 3 km out of town. Superbly located for access to all the main attractions of the town. Bicycle hire is now available on the promenade via the Donkey Republic app. Theres an M&S food hall a couple of hundred metres along the seafront heading into town and theres a Co-Op at the top of the road 2 mins away. Montague Street and Rowlands road which are one block behind the flat are the hub of the town. Theres a superb selection of shops coffee shops restaurants takeaways and pubs

Title: Lilly Pad
Description:
Lovely modern maisonette that is part of a seafront complex neutrally decorated throughout3 good sized bedrooms 2 new bathrooms newly decked spacious garden with wonderful views. Fabulous situation with direct access to the beaches at Seagrove Bay and Seaview with wonderful walks at Low tide round to Priory Bay. You can fish off the sea wall at high tide.
We are 5 minutes walk to the centre of the village which has a local shop cafes and a popular pub. The space The space
A secure home in a stunning position within a beachside complex. The apartment is on 2 floors and is spacious and comfortable with direct proximity to the sea. A much loved holiday home. Guest access Guest access
Guests have full access to the property and garden. The complex has direct access to the beach. Other things to note Other things to note
The property is secure and there is a full time maintenance person on site.
PETS ARE NOT ALLOWED.

Title: Apple Cottage - Barn with Log Burner, Private pool/spa sessions & Alpacas, Nr Beach
Description:
Central yet oasis- like residential area to return to after making the most of all the fun and festivities found virtually on the doorstep.
My home was rest rooms for the actors on location during the 1940s/50s when connected to the erstwhile film studio‚Äôs next door.
Delightful small double bedded lockable ground floor room with wash basin - desk - unlimited WiFi large tv.

Decorative and quirky JPG wall coverings. Give the room a lovely nostalgic feel with pleasant view to the patio garden. The space The space
Female led household. You can be confident that thorough cleansing takes place between stays using premium products such as Method soaps and surface cleansers. Fairy soap and conditioner is used on laundering your 100% cotton bedding.

Great little bolt hole with handy desk.
Convenientconvenient convenient in central Brighton yet a quiet residential oasis.
Pavilion Dome North Laines The LanesTheatre Royal Brighton Station local buses serving Seven Sisters and beyond are 5 minutes away.
i360 The Brighton Centre and the beach is 10 minutes walk
This charming small double room (4x3.5 m) is ideal for Le Weekend or an ample cave/large screen tv for one.
Essentially Victorian in style juxtaposed with some modern objects such as the large screen television. Also conveniently this room contains your very own hand basin and an Arts and Crafts writing bureau for penning your memoirs. There are books for your enjoyment in the antique bamboo shelving. Hanging space and drawers for your clothing. The Victorian style iron bed is situated - leaving approximately 2x2.5 of clear floor space and a view to my delightful patio garden.
The room has a lockable door.

Title: Stunning Coastal Apartment with Parking & Pool
Description:
My seafront flat is set back from road and enjoys fabulous sea views in a very convenient location.
There is an underground carpark directly in front (cost about ¬£8 per day).
The flat is in the newly trendy America Ground area of Hastings close to the pier ten minutes walk to either the Old Town or St Leonard‚Äôs. The space The space
You will have the principal rooms of the flat to yourself. The rest of the flat is locked off.
There is a bedroom with super-king (6 foot) bed a small cupboard for hanging your clothes and a small sofa.
The main room of the flat (7m x 5m) has a large dining table with benches a very well equipped kitchen and a sitting area with sofa armchair and a 43‚Äù Samsung TV with Netflix and other internet stations.
There is a shower room.
There is a balcony running the entire width of the flat at the front with a small table and chairs. The balcony gets sun in the morning through to
mid afternoon. Guest access Guest access
There is a lockbox by the front door where the keys will be ready for your arrival.
The flat is on the first floor up the spiral staircase. Other things to note Other things to note
This flat is my own home which I enjoy letting through Airbnb when I am travelling (which I LOVE to do and am away often). You will have the flat to yourself but some of the rooms (with my personal stuff in them) are locked off.
I have another dedicated Airbnb in the same building which is let all through the year.

Title: The Shed
Description:
The Beach Side is a well maintained comfortable two bedroom chalet just 50 yards from the beach which gets regular good reviews...

Fresh linen and towels are included.

With one double bedroom and a twin The Beach Side sleeps up to four people and has a shower wc wash basin etc.

Theres a sitting room that leads to a fully equipped kitchen. The space The space
The Beach Side has many return visitors who enjoy the location and peaceful aspect an easy flat walk to the village and as well as the beach fifty yards away just three hundred yards away is the free to use Hersey Nature Reserve...

Latest Reviews:

The Beach Side is an absolutely delightful little holiday home. The location is perfect - steps away from a gorgeous beach and lovely walks in both directions. The bungalow itself is small but very cosy and was perfect for our family of four plus dog for a weeks stay. The communication and welcome we received from Roger was exceptional and most definitely set the tone for a special week on the island. Thank you Roger! Sally & Family 30th October 2021

Thank you for renting us your holiday home we had a lovely two weeks. The location is superb and fell in love with Seaview. Karen & Adrian 10th October 2021

My parents had a wonderful weeks stay here on their first holiday in 8 years! Roger was really helpful and easy to communicate with and we were grateful for the discount booking ferry tickets. Very nice bedlinen and towels and fully equipped accommodation. Had everything needed. The place was clean and quiet and location is faultless. My parents enjoyed long evenings sat on the decking enjoying sea views. Would not hesitate to recommend to others or stay here ourselves again. Viktoria 23rd September 2021

What a great place! Would highly recommend. The deck area in front of the house has a beautiful view over the beach towards Portsmouth. We had a great time with our 2 year old son popping over to the beach and back all throughout our stay. Roger was the perfect host helped with ferry bookings and told me everything I needed. Gary and family 19th July 2021

A nicely decorated tasteful cosy cottage just by a wide spanning beach. There are a number of relatively close shops if you dont mind a short walk through the nice seaside town of Seaview. The place itself was well fitted with a full kitchen and all the bits and bobs you need on holiday. There are a multitude of sites to visit around the property with a beautiful nature reserve just a hundred metres from the front door. The shore changes from sandy beaches to shingle beaches with a welcoming setting no matter your preference. Inside The Beach Side youll find all you need with a TV and stable WiFi . The two bedrooms were comfortable and quiet at night and the living space has a modern sliding window out onto the communal gardens and the path out to the sea (only 30m or so away). Overall a great place to stay while you explore what the Isle has to offer. Monica 12th July 2021

We had a lovely stay on the Isle of Wight. The accommodation was perfect for our needs. The location was fantastic in a very quiet peaceful area with lovely coastal walks nearby. Roger‚Äôs communication was fantastic he rang before our trip and arranged discounted ferry tickets. Helen 30th June 2021
Seaview is pretty with local eateries that are very good. Not too far a walk to Ryde where there is the bus station and hovercraft giving access to the whole island and a 10 minute trip to Portsmouth.Beach in Ryde was glorious in the sunshine.We had a lovely week ate out had take away and cooked at The Beach Side too.Would recommend and hope to return Margaret & Friends 22nd June 2021

Hi RogerMany thanks for everything.We had a great stay and really enjoyed staying at The Beach Side. Lovely place to stay 2 minutes from the beach in a quiet complex. Best Ian. 12th June 2021

Great stay at Seaview. Lovely accommodation.Very clean. Would definitely book again. Marilyn 29th May 2021

The Beach Side has everything you need - Fantastic stay. Very good location for a getaway. Beach is very close. Martha 30th April 2021

We (family of four) had a great stay at The Beach Side. Its very well appointed and the extra folding chairs and fluffy blankets for cool evenings were a nice touch. The location is absolutely perfect and although you cant see the sea from the deck unless you are standing up its only 50yds to take your morning or evening coffee over the road to the sea wall. Lucy & Family 17th April 2021 Guest access Guest access
The whole bungalow

Title: 17thC  thatched cottage in farming hamlet
Description:
A beachfront dream on the coast of Pevensey Bay. This property offers a truly tranquil getaway with amazing views over the English Channel.

Pevensey Bay is a small town located just outside of Eastbourne it has its own delicious restaurants and cafes that are just minutes from your front door.

The property has four bedrooms sleeping up to eight in total and dogs are considered.

Parking and free WiFi is also included. The space The space
Enter by your own private door and up a flight of stairs to the first floor. On this level youll find a glorious open-plan living space with incredible sea views - plus a balcony where you can really soak up the sea air.

The modern kitchen is fully equipped and includes a dishwasher fridge-freezer oven hob and microwave. A separate utility room houses a washing machine and tumble dryer.

This floor also boasts two bedrooms and a bathroom. One bedroom is a kingsize while the other can be set up as a super king or with twin beds. The bathroom on this level has both a bath and a separate walk-in shower.

Up on the top level youll find a huge master suite. This has a super kingsize bed (which can be split into twin beds if preferred). There is an ensuite shower room and also an adjoining twin bedroom with gorgeous sea views that is ideal for children wanting to be close to their parents (as guests to this room have to walk through the master bedroom to reach it).

The property also has its own private garden which directly extends onto the glorious stretch of beaches for outdoor lovers this property is a must. There is bench seating up to eight people plus a parasol to enjoy - you will want to take in those views as often as you can! A well-behaved small dog may be considered - please discuss in advance (supplement applies).

There is private parking for one car off road and more on street parking available nearby. This stunning Exclusively Eastbourne property is booked from Saturday to Saturday in peak season but flexible arrival days and/or short stays may be possible last minute or out of season. Guest access Guest access
Both floors of this private split-level maisonette are yours to enjoy. The owners live in a separate flat below this maisonette so are on hand should you need help.

Title: Bramble Pye - New Converted Barn In The New Forest
Description:
Sea Dreams has wonderful views over the English Channel and is literally moment from the promenade and beach.

It is ideal for friends and families who want to escape to the sea for fresh air a dip in waves and a break from hectic lives.

The apartment is located in a prime spot close to the beach theatres and town centre and also the sought-after Meads area with independent shops cafes and restaurants.

WiFi provided plus towels and linen. The space The space
The open-plan living area has the windows facing the sea and there are doors out onto a balcony overlooking the sea.

The lounge includes a large Smart TV with FreeSat (so comes with access to channels such as YouTube and iPlayer as well as traditional TV) and the kitchen with a huge window provides arguably the finest views whilst washing up you are ever likely to encounter!

The kitchen is fully equipped with oven and hob microwave and washing machine and there is even a Nespresso machine for coffee lovers (bring your own capsules).

It has a master bedroom with a double bed while the second bedroom has a single bed plus an extra pull-out single that can be set up for families of four (or combined into a second double). Both bedrooms have picturesque inland views over Lower Meads and the distant South Downs.

There are two bathrooms. WiFi is provided along with all towels and linen. Parking is unrestricted on street. Bookings run from Sunday-to-Sunday in peak season although flexible arrival days may be possible out of season.

Talk to the Exclusively Eastbourne team if youve any questions that can help you reach a decision or check out our own website for more photos and alternative places to stay in the area.

Title: Silverlake, Dorset - Eco House - 2 bedroom
Description:
Get your Nantucket vibes in Casa Blanca an exquisitely styled New England beach front home bought and refurbished during lockdown. This stunning property is deceptively large and sits discreetly on the Camber Foreshore. It has been sympathetically and cleverly styled to create the most wonderful space for guests to enjoy the best of both the house and the landscape. The space The space
Sleeping 10 guests in four bedrooms and the possibility of another two in the reading room on a sofa bed it is the perfect home to celebrate or gather with friends and family for a truly memorable escape.

Arriving at property you enter into a roomy hallway sit down kick off your shoes hang up your coat and let the stress of life melt away.

If you want to cook up a storm you won‚Äôt be disappointed ‚Äì the large open plan kitchen boasts a Range Master oven with 2 ovens separate grill with an 6 ring induction hob including induction griddle plate; a microwave; two Bosch dishwashers; a large double Samsung fridge freezer with ice machine and a separate wine fridge. A nutribullet bakeware but more importantly for those coffee lovers a Sage Oracle touch coffee machine bean to cup (full on arrival) with an integrated milk frother ‚Äì you won‚Äôt be needing to go anywhere for coffee (you won‚Äôt be wanting to go anywhere).

A bespoke 3 metre oak table that seats 12 invites long lazy lunches or decadent dinners. If the cocktail hour takes hold there is a plethora of options from the Honesty Bar ‚Äì cocktail shakers and martini glasses glint in the sunlight waiting to be shaken and stirred all we ask is you top it up when you leave! The bifold doors allow the outside in.

Moving into the sitting room the soft muted tones with large corner sofa and natural planters is the perfect place to while away the hours staring out to sea. There is a 75‚Ä≥ smart TV together with all the apps Netflix Amazon Prime etc if you feel the need for some downtime if you can drag yourself away from the view. Sonos provides the sound throughout the ground floor.

Casa Blanca is an all year round property ‚Äì with its large conservatory with hot tub overlooking the beach (it is serviced and water changed every week if ordered). To the rear of the room is a pool table and darts board for extra entertainment. There is access into the garage which has been converted into a small gym (at your own risk) and has a table tennis table permanently set up. Two paddle boards are available for your enjoyment.

Taking yourself upstairs you will find four bedrooms and a reading room two ensuite walk-in shower rooms and a large family bathroom. The master bedrooms and reading room all enjoy access onto the upper terrace ‚Äì an amazing place to sit and watch the kitesurfers fly by.

The rear double with a four poster King bed with built in cupboards and dressing table is next to the sizeable family bathroom with walk in shower a large oval bath with hand shower and double basin vanity unit. A haven for kids with its four cabin beds (all 3ft wide) is the fourth massive bedroom each bed comes with their own lights and USB plugs. You will also find a Playstation 5 (a number of games) and 42‚Ä≥ smart TV to keep the little (& big ones) entertained and a three seater sofa to chill. For the little ones the house is equipped with a baby monitor stair gate high chair bottle steriliser & travel cot.

The reading room is a small beach front room where you can sit for hours and indulge in a chapter or two ‚Äì the sofa turns into a sofa bed and whilst the most amazing spot to wake up is not promoted as a bedroom but as an add on if you want a guest for an odd night or two.

Outdoor living is just as stylish as the inside; with a dining area (with the same table as the dining room) a built-in BBQ and Pizza oven you can enjoy eating alfresco whilst enjoying the breath taking and ever changing scenery or collapse in the comfy sofas hammock or loungers. Every inch of Casa Blanca has been thoughtfully styled. Given the wealth of activities both on and off the water you may never want to leave!

We also welcome up to two dogs to the property - it is ¬£35 for the stay. You can add these at the time of booking.

Title: The Pool House
Description:
This memorable place is anything but ordinary. Formally the old coastguard tower on Littlehampton seafront this small and unique stay is a little gem. Newly renovated the space is modern light and airy. Situated directly on the seafront next to the harbour entrance with incredible views from the 3rd and 4th floor balconies.

In the heart of West Sussex only a 90 minute train ride from London & 15 mins from near by attractions Brighton The south downs Goodwood Chichester & Arundel. The space The space
Originally built in 1931 the tower was left derelict for over 10 years or so before being fully renovated and refurbished with the works only recently completed by ourselves in June 2021. The space has been cleverly split over 4 floors each floor accessed by the new addition of a spiral staircase extension. As you enter the ground floor level you will find a small entrance hall that leads into the kitchen which is a bespoke handmade plywood kitchen finished off with a super cool gold Lusso Stone sink and tap and stunning stone worktops. On the first floor is the luxurious bathroom in herringbone marble stone with a walk in shower and a full sized bath tub looking out to the sea & the river mouth. On the third floor you will find the bedroom with double doors leading out onto a cosy balcony lay in bed at night and listen to the calming sound of the ocean and finally on the top floor you will find the beautiful vaulted ceiling living space with widows either side and double doors leading out onto a larger balcony again over looking the sea and the river mouth. There is a super comfortable double futon sofa bed on the top floor that can accommodate extra guests.

Each floor is carefully thought out and styled to a high standard with gorgeous throws and soft furnishings so even on a dark and stormy day you will still enjoy curling up and soaking in the incredible sea views.

Title: Birch Cottage located on a country working farm
Description:
Kings View is a stunning town house with water front views in the centre of the charming and popular village of Emsworth. On your doorstep you can enjoy the fantastic restaurants including Fat Olives 36 on the Quay or treat yourself to a night at JJs restaurant and bar. All of the village pubs offer wonderful food and there are many independent cafes to enjoy too. The village has many independent shops with PO10 being a must visit featuring beautiful pieces made by the many local artists inspired by this scenic area.

Entering the property there is a utility area with washer/drier and shower and WC to the rear. Going up to the first floor into the sitting room you are greeted by the direct views of the water this room is filled with comfortable furnishings to relax in while you enjoy your surroundings. Of an evening you can sit out on the balcony in the sunshine with a glass of wine or in the winter months snuggled under a blanket taking in the stunning views across the marina and over Chichester Harbour. To the rear there is a kitchen dining area overlooking Slipper Pond. The kitchen has been thoughtfully equipped with everything you will need to self cater including Krups coffee machine dishwasher large 6 ring range fridge and freezer and a kettle and toaster.

Taking the stairs up to the second floor there is a beautiful double bedroom with ensuite shower. The second bedroom has twin beds and the third has a single. There is a family bathroom with shower over the bath on the second floor.

Outside to the rear there is an open paved garden looking our over slipper pond

There is parking to the front of the property on the driveway for one car.

Title: lower grange park ,chacombe banbury ox17 2el
Description:
This 2nd floor flat is located on the seafront 100m from the beach. You will be in the heart of Kemptown village 12 minutes walk from the centre of Brighton.
5 fantastic local pubs all within 5mins from the flat The Palace Pier is 8mins walk from the house along with many other sights of Brighton.
There is a Bus stop literally opposite the house (just after Bedford Street) that can drop you off from the station or take you into town and many other destinations in the area. The space The space
The entire flat

Title: The Stables - easy access and a swimming pool
Description:
Fabulously located between the beach on one side and a woodland nature reserve on the other this cottage is perfect for families who like the outdoors or couples and friends looking for an idyllic getaway retreat. The cottage has fantastic sea views from both master bedroom and living room; gardens to both front and rear where there is a small gate that open directly onto a woodland nature reserve and the Isle of Wight coastal path; and in the winter months a lovely cosy log burning fire. The space The space
The cottage was built to house married officers stationed at the Victorian-era coastal fortress next door and many original features remain. It has been recently renovated to a very high standard with a new custom-built kitchen new bathroom modern electric heating system double-glazed timer sash windows and full redecoration throughout.

The rear (woodland-facing) garden receives sun in the morning until mid-afternoon so is the perfect spot to enjoy al-fresco breakfast or lunch. In the late afternoon/early evening the sun is out at the sea facing garden where you can enjoy a glass of wine (or cup of tea) watching the yachts sailing by. Sunsets over the fort are fabulous.

Title: Shillings Cottage,  Hemyock, Devon
Description:
A bright welcoming and family-friendly four bedroom house right on the East Beach of Selsey. Enjoy sea views from the lounge balcony and two of the second floor bedrooms and a gorgeous sunset in the garden at the end of the day.
Guests can enjoy use of the whole house with wifi smart tv and a fully equipped kitchen.
Follow us on Facebook @No4Kingsway for more info pictures and updates. The space The space
No. 4 Kingsway is the perfect place for family and friends to relax and enjoy time together. The owners have catered for families and groups of friends alike.
An amazing local photographer and an incredibly talented artist feature throughout to brighten the walls of the house.
Three bedrooms on the second floor offer a Super king bed King sized bed and Bunk Beds. The ground floor bedroom has a Double bed and double doors onto the patio. There is a family bathroom with separate shower on the second floor and a separate toilet and wash basin on the ground floor.
The kitchen is fully equipped with plenty of dining space with plastic plates cutlery and cups for the kids.
The lounge is spacious and bright the perfect place to relax with breathtaking views from the balcony.
The garden is simple and provides a relaxed area to spend time with a large dining table our fabulous mud kitchen for the kids will keep them busy for hours!
There is also a large shed that guests may use during their stay which is perfect for your water sports equipment or bikes - you will need to provide your own padlock.

Title: Secluded luxury in New Forest with heated pool.
Description: The Lookout is situated directly on the sea front between Southend on sea and Thorpe bay. We have stunning sea views and our balcony is the perfect place to watch the sunset over Southend pier. The beach is right outside our front door and a 15 min walk along it will take you to Southend sea front with its many arcades and Adventure island.\nThe 1 bedroom luxury apartment has a king size bed south facing balcony full kitchen stylish wet room 50 curved tv free wifi and a log burner. The space The space\nRecently refurbished beautifully decorated and modern one bedroom apartment. Perfect for couples looking for a romantic break. Located directly on the seafront where you are able to take a nice stroll to one of the many restaurants or towns nearby such as Southend on sea and Thorpe bay.

Title: Granary Cottage (6255)
Description:
Cool chic and newly refurbished bungalow on the beach.

All you need for a perfect holiday at home quiet road with magnificent views of the Solent and plenty of places to eat and drink nearby.

We are located down a quiet private road but within 100m of a convenience store pubs and takeaways. The space The space
An enviously unique beach front position with all new fixtures and fittings.
Fabulous outdoor facilities for that perfect staycation!! Relax in the comfy New England Chairs or sunbathe on the padded sunbeds book in hand and G&T in the other.

A charcoal barbeque at your disposal with outdoor table and chairs.

Inside the space is tastefully furnished with brand new comfortable chairs and sofas where you will be able to look out at the boats on the Solent.

The kingsize bedroom has its own patio door leading onto the deck with fabulous views again of the Solent which can be enjoyed with your early morning cuppa!

The well equipped kitchen has a fridge freezer oven microwave dishwasher and washing machine to make your stay easy and relaxing.

We have an outside 13amp plug for easy EV charging. This is by prior arrangement only and a fee of ¬£10 per charge needs to be paid directly to us.

Title: Traditional Sussex Barn with Pool
Description:
White Water House- a stunning 3 storey Edwardian property boasting 4 dble bedrooms plus 3 bathrooms. (Theres also a childs bed and travel cot available.)
This exquisite hideaway is ideal for families couples or groups of friends seeking sanctuary from busy bustling cities.
A peaceful location set in historical 1066 country the property overlooks Pevensey Beach & features a decked front garden with alfresco dining area plus Beach Hut leading onto a private beach. The space The space
a sleepy haven in which to take in the sea views as you wander along the shingle beaches and enjoy the invigorating air

Recently refurbished & set directly on to Pevensey Beach White Water House is ideal for beach side getaways & provides a cosy base all year round. Getting there couldn‚Äôt be easier with it being an hour and half from London by car plus Eastbourne or Pevensey rail links being just 15 minutes and 5 minutes away respectively.

The main Living Space is a large through reception room with two large sofas plus a love seat set around a fireplace. The dining area includes a 10 seater table complete with banquette seating. French doors lead on to the beach side garden.

The well equipped kitchen includes double oven coffee machine plus all other mod cons
and there are several farm shops nearby so you can cook some delicious local produce after a day spent at the beach.
Rear door leads on to a decked rear garden complete with Jacuzzi.

Stairs lead up to :

Master Bedroom: Stunning views directly on to the beach this beautiful light and airy bedroom has a central Kingsize bed and ensuite bathroom. Dressing table & wardrobe.

Family Bedroom: Again with views on to the beach this large bedroom includes a kingsize bed plus toddler bed. Dressing table & wardrobe.

Bedroom 3: Two single wooden sleigh beds with wardrobe overlooking rear garden.

Bedroom 4: Kingsize bed with wardrobe overlooking rear garden.

Two further bathrooms.

All bedlinen and towels are Hotel quality.

Title: Hoarstone - Cosy country cottage
Description:
At the end of a small cul de sac is a hidden gem. You will feel like you are holidaying on the beach itself with nearly every room having stunning sea views. This beautiful three story house has a very large open plan kitchen dinning and sitting room looking directly South opening out onto the sun terrace. It also has two additional balconies decadently furnished to watch the world go by. The space The space
The house has three floors.

It has a stunning top floor with top balcony. It‚Äôs bedrooms are all good sizes and furnished to facilitate two families very comfortably. The middle floor balcony accessed though the snug is such a comfortable spot for both dining and lounging. The ground floor has a large corner sofa and TV unit as well as dining and open plan kitchen with all the commodities.

This house is perfect for two families to holiday together as it is less than a stones through to the stunning Hayling beach with safe swimming and lots going on to see and do. Guest access Guest access
The house has space for off road 4 space parking.

Access to the beach at the bottom of the garden. Other things to note Other things to note
You are allowed one well behaved dog but please do keep it off furniture and be responsible owners on the beach.

Title: Coach House with private indoor Swimming Pool
Description:
Beach fronted large detached family house commanding spectacular sea views from the rear and superb far reaching rural views from the front. A truly luxurious getaway by the sea. The space The space
Key Feature
# Direct Beach Access
# Fenced Decked Area
# Outside Table & Chairs
# Charcoal BBQ
# Sun-Loungers
# One Dog welcome
# Travel Cot Stair Gate & High Chair
On entering the property there is a ground floor entrance hall separate utility room housing a washing machine and clothes airer a double bedroom with a king-sized bed and large wardrobe with views to the countryside. Adjacent to this bedroom there is a ground floor shower room with a walk-in shower cubicle pedestal wash hand basin and lower level wc.
The rest of the accommodation is situated on the first floor including a 19‚Äô1 x 10‚Äô8 lounge looking out to sea an impressive 23‚Äô8 x 8‚Äô3 second reception room with a dining table and chairs to seat 8 guests also enjoying sea views. The property boasts a good sized and well fitted modern grey kitchen housing a full range of utensils plates pots and pans along with a toaster microwave kettle American fridge freezer and microwave. The open plan kitchen and dining area leads into the spacious lounge which has a 70 inch flat screen tv a large leather corner sofa and additional lounge chair and a bar area with two raised bar stools with French doors opening onto a superb two-tiered sundeck with spectacular sea views and leading down directly on to a private beach. The sun deck has a modern rattan table and chairs along with four sun loungers.
There are three additional bedrooms on this level one has a king-sized bed one has a double bed and the other has two single beds a travel cot and all with plentiful storage facilities for clothes.
There is an additional family shower room with a shower area pedestal wash hand basin and a low level wc adjacent to one of the bedrooms.
At the front of the property there is off-road parking for several cars along with a mature garden with shrubs and plants and a raised sun patio enjoying a rural outlook.
Pevensey Bay has a dog friendly shingle beach it is a seaside resort in miniature a good place to take a holiday and really unwind. We allow one small dog to stay in the property but please note the stair gate must be put across and the bedroom doors need to remain closed to prevent the dog from going on the beds.
When booking with us your stay will be protected by a deposit guarantee and public liability provided by our risk management partner SUPERHOG. To benefit from this protection you will be contacted by SUPERHOG directly to verify yourself or you can also go via their website superhog.com to start the verification. To view the SUPERHOG privacy policy use this link: https://superhog.com/privacy-policydata-protection-policy/ Other things to note Other things to note
A damage deposit of ¬£200.00 is payable . For direct bookings with beachside holiday rentals this amount will be held on your payment card on the day that you check out and returned to your card after a full inspection has been completed and within 14 days of departure.
We allow one house trained dog to stay in the property but please note the stair gate must be put across and the bedroom doors need to remain closed to prevent the dog from going on the beds. For guests who may struggle with the internal 12 stairs there is a flat way into the property just a few houses down and along the beach which brings you into the back entrance. The majority of the house is then on one level. Please ask if you require any clarification on access or layout.

The cleaning fee covers all cleaning laundry/towels and bed linens which we provide for your stay.

Title: Culver Reach 33 - cosy and warm caravan by the sea
Description:
The Beach House is a tranquil space overlooking Climping Beach perfect both as a chance to spend some time on this lovely part of the coast at an unspoilt beach and as a great base for exploring. The light is stunning the air is clear and guests who arrive all feel the relaxing benefits of being so close to the sea.
With two large bedrooms peaceful living area and a light & airy bathroom the Beach House has views over the sea and South Downs. The space The space
Self contained and sleeps two or four the Beach House has views over the sea and South Downs.
Upstairs there is a large bedroom with king sized bed a bathroom with loo basin and bath (no shower) a second bedroom that can be made up as either twin beds or a double (this bedroom is open to the staircase) and a large dining area with a kitchenette with fridge kettle microwave toaster and crockery etc.
Our wifi is not the always the fastest because of the location down a country lane right at the beach but we are hoping you will come here for some time away from life online.

To be clear you will have a separate self contained unit whilst not the entire building. There is another room accessed separately but within the same building.

We are sorry but this space is not suitable for young children under 7. Other things to note Other things to note
The Beach House is not suitable for small children. We suggest a lower age of 7 years old but are happy to chat about whether it would be suitable for your child before you book.
The bedrooms and bathroom are up a flight of stairs so this not suitable for people who cannot manage stairs - sorry.

Title: Spacious cottage, indoor pool, sauna
Description:
Serenity is a luxurious two bedroom house with breathtaking views of the sea. The property is located right on the seafront which means you can go from the lounge to water within a minute.

This completely self contained property has access to one private parking space. The private decking area at the front of the property has views of the breathtaking sunsets and sunrises daily- perfect for alfresco dining or a peaceful morning coffee.

This property is managed by Air Premier The space The space
This property can comfortably host four adults as both the bedrooms contain double beds. This property has an open plan modern kitchen which leads onto the outside decking area. The lounge is bright and has stunning views of the sea- as does the master bedroom.

The master bedroom has a large private balcony and an electric fan.

Coffee machine Bosch tassimo

Title: Dellfield holiday cottage
Description:
Step straight on to the beach and enjoy spectacular views out to sea in this spacious property - perfect for a couple family or small group of friends to get away from it all.

The property comprises a large bright kitchen/living room overlooking Seaford beach a spacious double bedroom a second bedroom with bunk beds and a newly fitted bathroom.

Seaford is surrounded by stunning countryside. The train station is 5 mins walk and the property enjoys free parking outside the flat. The space The space
The flat has easy access on the ground floor. Its perfectly located for people-watching on the Esplanade or spotting the ferry to Dieppe.

It has been refurbished with a new bathroom and a well-equipped kitchen. Everything you will need for a comfortable break at the seaside is provided.

There is free parking on the road outside the flat. Seaford town centre is only 3 minutes walk away and many walks across East Sussex can be started from the door.

Title: Vale Hornbeam - Farm with stunning mountain views
Description:
Waters Edge is a nordic style water front house with its own private sea shore and panoramic views of the Solent. The house is suited for family holidays or groups with 5 bedrooms 4 bathrooms a large open plan sitting / dining room extending to a deck over looking the Solent.
It is ideally positioned on the edge of Yarmouth where beaches walks and various activities can be enjoyed. West Wight is fast becoming a foodie haven with a plethora of options from cafes through to fine dining. The space The space
This is our much loved ‚Äòhome from home‚Äô that is set up for our young family and guests to enjoy. Guest access Guest access
All areas except for the garage. Other things to note Other things to note
The coastal defence gabions are dangerous not for walking or climbing over.
The tide in the Solent is extremely strong therefore swimming off the jetty is at your own risk and children must be kept away from the seafront.
The gardens at the seafront are open. Guests should not venture in front of our neighbours houses and should respect their privacy.

Title: The Beach Huts: Unique home with indoor pool
Description:
Tucked away at the tipping point of Kemp Town this cosy apartment provides a great launch pad for a break-away to explore Brightons bohemian vibes.

The kitchen/living space filled with sunshine in the morning you can enjoy a coffee with a glimpse of the sea. A big cozy Casper bed in the bedroom which is a quiet sun trap in the afternoons. However you choose to take your break - this apartment allows you to explore retreat and nest all at the same time. The space The space
While the apartment is cosy it has everything you need. In the kitchen there is a fridge/ freezer washer/dryer and a dishwasher for those lazy evenings. The hob while its small can take 3 pans at once enough to cook a small banquet!

The apartment is set up and ready to go. There are USB charging points throughout the flat to charge your phone. Theres a Bluetooth speaker in the bathroom for a shower singalong. Theres an Amazon Fire Stick in the living room for accessing Netflix and Amazon Prime.

The bedroom has lots of storage so that you can unpack and make yourself at home. Theres a side lamp for late-night reading and goose-feather duvet and pillow to keep you sufficiently snuggled. Extra blankets pillows and central heating are prerequisite. Youll also find some bonus paddle boards and roller skates in the wardrobe youre very welcome to try out if the sea is calm for the weekend :)

Description:
We would love to Welcome visitors to our new ‚ÄúYarmouth Country Cottages‚Äù situated in the West Wight close to Yarmouth Colwell Bay Totland Bay and Freshwater Bay.
We are also pet friendly and on the door step to a Gift of Nature sight with 20 hectares of woodland and Parkland.
This is a brand new build with a warm and homely feel we are a family run business and look forward to welcoming you. The space The space
Whilst an excellent area for walkers and cyclists alike with the famous Tennyson Trail leading to The Needles. Annually a ‚ÄúWalk the Wight‚Äù takes place and there are annual ‚ÄúIW Cycle Fest‚Äù events. Other things to note Other things to note

This 2 bedroom Victorian Fishermans Cottage is tucked away in a Private Mews.

Nestled in Yarmouths Conservation Area Sea Drift is a 2 min walk from the Harbour and Coastal Path.

Perfect for sailing enthusiasts safe beach nearby boutique shops buses taxis and restaurants.
